23b4: chags gyur nas/ / rang bzhin gyis ni brtan par 'gyur// 'gro ba ma lus lus med pa/ de yi sems ni chags par bshad// chos rnams kun ni rang bzhin gyis// rnam par dben zhing gnyis su med// gang tshe dag pa'i bdag
23b5: nyid mthong / / de tshe rdo rje legs par bshad// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi po yis// ming dang brda ni sbyar ba'o// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// sdom pa mchog tu dam pa'o// khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che// tshogs
23b6: gnyis rdzogs par byas pa ste/ / sa dang pha rol byin mchog gtso// rdo rje dbang bskur las byung ba// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes te// rnyog pa med cing yi ge med// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid mchog/ brtan pa rtag pa nyid
23b7: du 'gyur/ / nam mkha'i mdzod ni mdzod chen po// chos rnams thams cad dbang bskur ba// yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje che// rdo rje tog ni bla na med// ye shes snang ba rin chen che// rmad du byung ba nges par mthong // de bzhin gshegs kun gsang
23b8: ba ni/ / rdo rje bzhad pazhes su grags// chos kyi bdag med las byung ba// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ chos nyid dam pa bsam du med// rdo rje chos zhes bya bar dran// rdo rje blo gros snang ba che// shes rab ye shes dri med mchog
24a1: zag med shes rab chen po pa/ / de ni rdo rje rnon por bshad// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos 'khor lo// gnyis su med las byung bar mtshon// yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel ming // rdo rje rgyu zhes nges par bshad// dgongs pa'i skad
24a2: ni spros pa'i mchog/ yul rnams kyis ni bshad pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyis bzlas pa che// de ni rdo rje sla bar bshad// sems can kun gyi don la sbyar// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che// gdong nas dag pa'i rnal 'byor che// de ni rdo rje las
24a3: su bshad/ / bla na med pa'i byams pa che// bsrung ba'i bya bgong na med// dag pa'i chos ni brtson chen po// rdo rje bsrung bzhes su grags// shes rab thabs kyi khro bo che// sangs rgyas kun dang rjes 'thun pa// nyon mongs thams cad zab che//
24a4: de ni rdo rje gnod sbyin brjod// lus ngag yid ni yang dag sbyor// sgrib pa med cing yi ge bral// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsang // de ni rdo rje mtshams sbyor bshad// rdo rje ye shes rnal 'byor che// sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs po che//
24a5: thog ma tha ma medo zhi ba// rig pa mchog ces bya bar bshad// de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i glus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs par mchod nas glur blangs pa// oM
24a6: sarba bud d+ha pa ra me shwa ra bad+h+ya shu N+ya la le hoHsu b+ha gaHsu ra taHma hA ma ha A ri ma hA bud+d+ha bud+d+hA yo gI shwa ra ta thA tA b+hA bi tAd ma ka ta thA ga ta/ byang chub sems bskyed las 'khrungs pa// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo//
24a7: mchog gi dbang phyug dam par chos// gdod nas zhi ba la phyag 'tshal// byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa po// rdo rje can kun la phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje che// sangs rgyas byang chub la phyag 'tshal// mi dmigs ka
24a8: 'phang la gnas pa/ / mtha' las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal// 'dren pa rnams kyi stobs pa che// hUM gi yi ge ma lus pa// thams cad mkhyen pa mtha' dag dang // shin du yongs su mya ngan 'da'// 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon
24b1: bang po/ rdo rje ye shes dri ma med// rnam par dag pa rdo rje mchog/ dngos grub thams cad bgasol byed// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams kyi mgon// dus gsum bsam pa dbang sgyur ba// sems can rnams la pan don du// byung brgyad/
24b2: la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ rdo rje snying po rgyan las dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang 'dus par gyu ri nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs khar
24b3: thugs te bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyag rgya do ched du bad/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ kyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rdo rje snying po zhes grags pa// sangs rgyas
24b4: kun gyi skyob pa'o/ / gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi ni rnam par mdzes// sgo khyud rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan dang // phyag rgya dang ldan rab tu mdzes// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// 'khor lo gnyis ni rab tu gnas// rtsibs
24b5: brgyad pa dang bcu drug rtsibs/ / rnam par dbye ba legs par brtag/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor nang gi ni// lte ba'i gnas su legs brtags pas/ pad ma chen po mdab brgyad pa// ge sar gtams pas rab tu mnas// de yi lte ba'i dbus
24b6: su ni/ / khyab bdag rnal 'byor dbang phyug che// rnam par snang mdzad brtson chen po// sems can kun la rjes brtse bas// de yi nye 'khor kun du ni// de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad rnams dgod// shar du dgod bya 'khor lo can// gtsug
24b7: tor dkar po nub tu gnas/ / gzi brjid phung po lho ru'o// rnam par rgyal ba byang du gnas// dbang ldan rnam par gsal bar bri// mer ni steng 'gro dgod par bya// steng 'gro chen po bden bral du// rlung du rgyal ba chen po gnas// sangs
24b8: rgyas gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rnal 'byor ldan pa 'di dag bri// mi bskyod pa ni shar du dgod// lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan no// nub du 'od dpag med par 'gyur// byang du don yod grub pa'i ming // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
25a1: brten pa'o/ / bang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bri/ thams cad zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas// 'khor rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lalo// phreng ba rnam par dgod bya ba// rang gi phyag rgya'o
25a2: zer 'bar/ / rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i// lha mo 'bad pas dgod par bya// rdo rje bdug pa la sogs bri// de bzhin gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs// rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa// sgo bsrungs 'bad pas bri bar bya// phyi ya~M dkyil 'khor la gnas
25a3: par/ / kun du bzang srogs rim bzhin bri// rang gi phyag rgya'i 'khor rnams dang // pho nya yi ni 'khor dag dang // khro ba rnams dang mngag pa dang // de bzhin pho nya pho nyam// rgya mtsho yi ni dkyil 'khor ni// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gsal ba'o//
25a4: phyi ru phyi rol rdo rje'i ming // dkyil 'khor la ni 'bad pas bri// dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas su// 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po bri// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen ming // dbang po la sogs lha thams cad// ma mo kun dang sring mo rnams/
25a5: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang klu// de bzhin lha rnams thams cad dang // brtson 'grus chen po nam mkha' lnga ri// 'bad po yis ni bri bar bya// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas su// khyad par du ni mchod par bya// me tog bdug spos rol mo sog/
25a6: de bzhin bza' dang ston mo sogs// phreng ba'i rgyan ni sna tshogs kyis// de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod par bya// dkyil 'khor kun gyi chog yis// mchod pa kun gyis thams cad nas// 'khor la kun gyi cho ga yis// sangs rgyas
25a7: thams cad mchod par bya/ / de nas slob ma thams cad gzhug/ yongs su dag pa khyad par du// byang chub sems ni bskyed nas su// byang chub bslab pa rjes spyod pa// cho ga shes pa'i sngags pas gzhug/ 'dren pa rnams la mchod
25a8: du gzhug/ rdo rje'i dbang bskur sbyor ba yis// dbang bskur ba ni de nas sbyin// seng ge'i khri yi steng du ni// dar dang me tog chun pos spras// dkar po'i gdugs dang rin chen che// bla re rgya che 'bar ba dang // de yi g.yas kyi drung du ni//
25b1: mkhas pa yis ni gzhag par bya// ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs ras kyis rab mchod pa// g.yon gyi drung du thams cad nas// 'bad pa yis ni gzhag par bya// rin chen sman kun gyis gang ba'i// bum pa
25b2: legs par gzhag pas te/ / rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur gyis// de la rang gis dbang bsgyur ba// rje ming gis dbang bkrung ga/ bas pa yi ba ni slar yang bya// kun gyi cod pan dbang bskur gyis// yang dang yang du dbang bskur bya// chos kyi cod pan dbang bskur dang / sangs
25b3: rgyas kun gyi skyob pa ni/ sna tshogs las kyi dbang bskur sbyin// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam mtshungs pa'o// chos kyi sku yi dbang bskur ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi sgron ma'i sbyin// de ltar slob ma dbang bskur ba// khyad par du ni sngags pas bya// de la
25b4: dam tshig tsheg yis/ / sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyar bar bya// slob dpon brnyas par mi bya zhing // sgrub po kun la smad mi bya// sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad la// 'da' bar mi bya smad mi bya// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang // grub mtha'i rig
25b5: pa thams cad la/ / smad par mi bya blad mi bya// de la mngon par dga' ba spangs// sdig pa thams cad rnam spang zhing // de bzhin bsod nams thams cad bsdu// bza' dang ston mo du ma la// bza' bar mi bya smad mi bya// 'dod pas bcom ldan
25b6: sems dpa' ste/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi sras bdag skyes// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad chags las 'khrungs// de bzhin zhe sdang rmongs las 'khrungs// mnyam dang mi mnyam chos kun dpa
25b7: dbu mi'i gnas la gnas nas su/ / nyid dam tshig shes nas su// sangs rgyas byang chub yongs mi spong // lus can kun la 'tshe mi bya// khyod kyis ser sna mi bya ste// phrag dog bya bar mi bya'o// dam pa'i chos ni spang mi bya// byang chub sem
25b8: ni mchog tu bde/ / chang gi btung ba spang bya ste// pha rol bud med rnam par spang // thams cad mkhyen pa yongs mi dor// rtag du srog chags gsad mi bya// sems can kun la snying rje dang/ byams pa yang ni rnam par bsgom// sems
26a1: can rnams la phan pa ni/ / yang dang yang du yongs bsdu bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa// dam tshig de nyid 'di dag ni// slob ma rnams la rjes brtse bas// mkhas pa yis ni bstan par bya// de nas phyag rgya rjes bcing ba//
26a2: gor rimis bzhin du bstan par bya// phyag rgya 'di dag khyad par gyi// mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya// thal mo brtan par bsdam par bya// me tog zum pa'i tshul du mdzes// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// pad ma'i thal mo zhes
26a3: su grags/ / rtse mo thams cad legs brkyang ba// pad ma'i phyag rgya zhes su brjod// re re'i mtshams su nges bcings pa// de ni rdo rje thal mor brtags// sor mo thams cad nges bsdams pa// rdo rje bsdams pas legs bcings pa// sor
26a4: mo brkyang ste steng du bstan/ / sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// khu tshur nang du byas nas ni// gnyis ka sbyar bas yongs su brtag/ 'khor los sgyur sogs phyag rgya'o// dam pa sbyin pa yin par bshad// sangs rgyas dpa' bo
26a5: thams cad kyi/ / dam tshig phyag rgya 'di yin no// ming med nang bcug khu tshur gyis// kun gyi rtse mor yongs su brtag/ rdo rje'i rnam pa legs par sbyar// rdo rje chen po zhes su bsgrags// mthe chung srin lag khu tshur las// gung mo legs
26a6: par brkyang nas su/ / mdzub mos mthe bong yongs su sbyar// 'khor los sgyur ba nyid gsol byed// brkyang pa'i rtse mo sbyar ba ni// gdugs dkar zhes ni rab tu grags// srin lag dang ni mthe bong sbyar// gung mo gnyis ni brtag par
26a7: gci brjid phung po'i phyag rgya che/ / gzi brjid phung po nyid gsol byed// de nyid ril gri lta bur spyad// rnam par rgyal ba zhes su grags// de nyid rgyal ba zhes bya ba// rdo rje ldan pa de bzhin gshegs// khro tshur snying po ldan byas pas// gtsus
26a8: tor rnam pa'i 'byung gnas te/ / thub dka' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// steng du 'gro ba zhes su bshad// rdo rje bsdams pa yongs su sbyar// dam tshig kun gyi 'byung gnas te// gung mo'i rtse mo mchog tu sbyar// mthe chung dang ni mthe bong brkyang /
26b1: lcags kyu mda' yi sbyor ba yis// legs so ba ni sbyar bar bgung mo rdo rje rin chen rtse// phye ba gzi brjid mchog gi mchog/ rgyal mtshan gnas su nges par sbyar// bzhad pa'i gnas su sbyar bar bya// rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che// dbu ma pad ma lha
26b2: bur bskum/ Ti 'dis 'jam pa'i dbyangs// 'khor lo sbyar ba'i 'khor los sgyur// kha ru phye ba'i phyag rgya che// rdo rje smra ba nyid du 'gyur// las kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya che// gar mtshungs rdo rje sna tshogs can// chos yongs sdud pa'i
26b3: sbyor ba yis/ / rdo rje bsrung bar brtag par bya// mche ba gnyis ni rnam par gtsigs// rdo rje gnod sbyin zhes su bshad// khu tshur bcings pa khu tshur gyi// rdo rje thal mo snying khar gzhag/ rdo rje sgeg mo zhes su grags/
26b4: yongs su sbyar ba spyi bor gzhag/ rdo rje phreng ba zhes su brjod// thal mo sbyar ba gdong du dgrol// rdo rje glu mar rjes su bsgrags// 'gyed cing 'dud pa'i sbyor ba yi// de ni rdo rje gar mar bshad// pad ma'i thal mo gdong du dbye// spyi bor
26b5: yongs su sbyar la gzhag/ snying khar mthe bo brtamapa pa dang / rab tu brkyang babyug pa'o// lag pa steng du yongs brkyang ba// gzugs kyi phyag rgya nyid du 'gyur// lag gnyis rna ba'i lam du gzhag/ sgra yi phyag rgya nyid du bshad// dri ni
26b6: brug pa'i sbyor ba yis/ / dri yi phyag rgya zhes su brjod// gdong du snyim pa bye ba ni// ro yi phyag rgya zhes su bsngags// mkha' la myur ba'i sbyor ba yis// reg pa reg bzhes su bshad// na chung gnyis ni yongs su sbyar//
26b7: mdzub mo lcags kyu'i sbyor ba las// de nyid zhags pa'i dbyibs dang ni// lu gu rgyud kyi rnam par brtag/ bzhi pa rdo rje dril bu zhes// rdo rje 'bebs par rnam par brtag/ phyag rgya kun dang nye ba'i rgya// blo gros ldan pa rang gis brtag/
26b8: thal mo yongs su sbyar la bsdam// mdzub mo gnyis po bskum nas ni// rin po che yi rnam par bcing // kun du bzang po blo ldan gyis// de las rtse mo rtse mo bskum// sems kyis byams pa bsgoms nas so// mdzub mo sbyar la btsug
27a1: nas ni/ / ral gri'i rnam par brtag pa ste// 'di ni nam mkha'i snying po yi// phyag rgyar sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags// de nas ral gri'i mtshon cha yi// rnam pa ru ni nyer gnas pa// phyag rgya 'di ni rnam 'gog par// thams cad kyis ni
27a2: yongs su brjod/ / gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje thal mo rab tu brgyad// pad ma'i lta bur rnam par brtag/ pad ma'i lag pa blo ldan gyis// de nyid me tog zom tshul dang / ud pal rnam par ltar mdzes pa// 'di ni pad ma sgrol ba'i rgya// pad ma'i
27a3: mgon po zhes su grags/ / mche ba gtsigs pa dang ldan pa'i// kha dang 'dra bar legs par brtag/ 'di ni rta mgrin phyag rgya ste// kha yi phyogs su rab tu brtag/ pad ma'i thal mo dpral ba yi// khro gnyer du ni nye bar sbyar// rdo rje thal mo 'bebs pa/
27a4: che// dpal gyi snying po rin chen ldan// yid bzhin nor bu'i rnam pa bzung // thal mo legs par rab tu brkyang // mi zad blo gros phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtags// gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// rin chen rdo rje snying khar gzhag/
27a5: nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya ste// nam mkha'i mdzod nyid ster bar byed// rdo rje chen po legs par brkyang // mthe chung mthe bong nges par bcing // lag pa gnyis ni nges par brtag/ blo gros rgya mtsho'i phyag rgyar 'gyur// rdo rje thal mo steng du
27a6: bsgred/ / mdzub mo gnyis po sbyar bar bya// 'di ni rdo rje snying po'i rgya// rdo rje snying pos bka' stsal to// khu tshur nang du byas nas su// mdzub mo gnyis po rtse mo bya// 'di ni 'jam dpal phyag rgya ste// rdo rje ral gri zhes su brtag/ de nyid shag ti'i
27a7: rnam pa ni/ / 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo ldan gyi'o// gshin rje mthar byed mdud rtser 'gyur// mdung rtse chen por rab tu brtag/ mdzub mo bskum par byas nas ni// gung mo'i steng du yongs su gzhag/ zhags pa'i rnam pa rab ldan pas//
27a8: gshin rje yang ni 'jigs par byed// de nyid ral grir byas pa ni// skra can ma ru rab tu bshad// khu tshur thams cad nges bcings te// mdzub mo gcig ni bskum par bya// 'di ni nye ba'i sgra can rgyar// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis
27b1: bka' stsal to/ / rdo rje bsdams pa steng bcings te// dbu ma gnyis ni rnam par spang // mdzub mo rdo rje'i rnam par bye// mthe'u chung dang ni mthe bong brkyang // 'di ni rdo rje 'dzin chen po'i// phyag rgya don kun sgrub byed yin// mdzub mo mthe bos bsdams pa
27b2: ni/ / mA ma kA ra ni yongs su bshad// mdzub mor lcags sgrog rnam pa las// gud mo'i dbu ma rdo rjer bya// 'di ni rdo rje lcags sgrog rgya// rdo rje lta bur yongs su bshad// rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa// khro bo gzegs mar rnam par bshad// mchog gi rtse
27b3: mo rtse gcig bya/ / rdo rje rtse mo nyid kyir bshad// lag na rin chen phyag rgya ni// lag gnyis legs par brkyang bar bya// ser mo pad ma'i dbyibs su bya// skul byed lha mor yongs su bshad// thal mo yongs su sbyar ba las// mdzub mo dang ni mthe
27b4: bong dag/ mig gi tshul du sbyar bar bya// sangs rgyas spyan gyir rnam par bshad// bkra shis kyi ni dkyil dkrungs bca'// rnal 'byor rig pas lus bsrang ste// lag gnyis lhung bzed 'dzin 'dra ba// bsam gtan phyag rgyar rab tu bshad//
27b5: 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad rgya// sangs rgyas kun gyi don mdzad pa'o// mi skyod pa yis la reb// rin chen tog gi mchog sbyin bshad// bsam gtan phyag rgya 'od dpag med// ngo bo nyid kyi don rtogs byed// don yod gzigs pa'i phyag rgya ni//
27b6: mi 'jigs 'jigs pa med pa sbyin// blo ldan rnal 'byor dkyil dkrungs gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ mnyam par gzhag pa phyag rgya kun 'ching ba 'a ma ni 'tshang du gzhug/ 'jig rten pa yi phyag rgyal// lag pa gcig ni rab
27b7: brkyang ste/ / dbang ldan gyi ni rtse gsum pa// mthe bos mtha chung mnan par bya// lha yi dbang po'i rdo rjer 'gyur// lag pa g.yas pas brtag par bya// me yi oM yig lag pa dang / mthe bo gung mo nyid la gzhag/ gshin rje'i rdo rje drug
27b8: pa ste/ / mdzub mo dang ni mthe bong sbyar// de nyid khyab 'jug 'khor lo ste// 'khor lo'i yi ge dgod par bya// lag pa gcig gis thod pa ni// ma mo rnams kyir yang dag bshad// sor mo gnyis bsgred ral gri ni// srin po bdag nyid chen po'i'o//
28a1: mdzub ma pathabang sbyar ba ni// chu lha'i nags pa nyid du bshad/ mdzub pa dang ni phung mo dag/ rgyal mtshan lta bur lags par brkyang // rlung la rgyal mtshan phyag rgya ni// lag pa gnyis kyis rab tu brtag/ dbum gcig bu lags/
28a2: sbyang ba/ drug to'i phyag rgya rab tu bshad// gnod sbyin kun gyi dbang phyug ni// lus ngan bdag nyid chen po'o// mchod phyir thogs kyi phyag rgya ni// tshangs pa yi ru legs par bshad// drag po'i gas la sha shes byaste// lha ba'i baTis ru brjod/
28a3: tshogs bdag gon snga ba gang // zla ba'i bdud ci dkyil 'khor lo// nyi ma'i 'od zer stong phrag ni// lag pa gnyis kyis bstan par bya/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor stong ba yis// dbang po'i rdo rje mdon ma sbyar// da na lharnams kun gyi ma/
28a4: kun gyis rab tu gnang // dri za rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// glu len lta bur rab tu bsgrags// dga' byed dbang phyug phyag rgya che// rdza rnga'i sgra dbyangs rab tu 'bar// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod phyir// lha chen pos ni rab tu brtags// ting ti
28a5: cag 'dzin sbyor ba yis/ / mi 'am ni rnams kying brjod bya// bi wang bsgreng ba'i sbyor ba yis// dbyangs can gyir ni rnam par bshad// rtag du dun du b+hi sgrog pa// rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi brjod// lag gnyis gdengs ka'i tshul byas pa// klu
28a6: rnams kyi ni legs par bshad/ / gar ni sdad pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'gyed dang 'du ba'i de bzhin no// lag bzhags pa'i nges bcings pas// de ni phyag rgyar rab tu bshad// 'di rnams dam tshig phyag rgya ru// de bzhin gshegs
28a7: rnams legs par gsung / / las kyi sbyor ba'i bad pa yis// 'di rnams kyang ni phyag rgyar bshad// phyag rgya dor nas sems kyi ni// rin chen yang dang yang du bsam// rnam par rtog med gdod nasa'i// chos dbyings mnyam zhing mi mnyam ga stong pa
28a8: maba' 'drar shes nas su/ / mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ 'di dag thams cad ma skyes shing // rmi lam lta bur rab tu gnas// dri za'i grong khyer lta bur snang // 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten yang dang yang // mig 'phrul lta bur shin du ni// 'gro ba thams
28b1: cad rab tu gsal/ / mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa ru// srid pa thams cad mdor bsdus pa// bdag med pa zhes mthong nas ni// sangs rgyas kun dang dpa' bo yis// sgyu ma smig rgyu brag cha dang // lA ba chu yi chu bur dang // gzugs brnyan
28b2: lta bur 'jig rten ni/ / de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyis dgongs// thams cad mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar// zo chun khyud mo ji bzhin du// gar gyi gnas kyi tshul 'dra ba// zla ba gnyis dang mtshungs par blta// rtag tu glog gi phreng ba
28b3: 'dra/ / sbrang bu'i sgra dang mtshungs par gnas// 'khor ba shin tu bslang ba ste// rgod ma'i kha dang 'dra bar gnas// 'di ltar shes shing rtags nas ni// bsgom pa'i stabs kyis rang nyid kyis// sems ni legs bsgrub rnal 'byor//
28b4: de la phyag rgya rab tu bshad// stong pa mtshan ma med pa dang // smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin las// lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ni// dam tshig gsum ni brtags pa'o// phyag rgya sngags dang lha nyid dang // de nyid gsupa ni rab tu gnas// bdag nyid
28b5: sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ / mtshan nyid gcig tu rnam par gnas// de 'di dam pa'i phyag rgya ru// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bka' stsal to/ phyag rgya yi ge bral ba ste// rnam par med cing snang ba med// dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la// dngos po
28b6: de nyid nyid du bshad/ / dngos med dngos po'i rang bzhin yin// dngos med nyid kyang dngos po yin// dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol// rnal 'byor ye shes mchog tu bde// rtog ga med cing snang ba med// 'khrul pa med cing yi ge med//
28b7: stong pa nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i sems// gang tshe de ltar nyid gyur pa// de tshe phyag rgya rnams dang sngags// lha nyid du yang rab tu brtag/ sngags las phyag rgya ma mthong zhing // phyag rgya las kyang sngags min la// rang nyid lha yi rnal 'byor
28b8: de/ / gnyis med sngags dang phyag rgyar brtags// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las phyag rgya'i rim par phye ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar
29a1: yang 'dus par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba chen po rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed par mdzad du gsol//
29a2: de nas bcom ldan 'das shAHthub pa de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gas na nas 'og min gyi gnas nas byon te dga' ldan gyi gnas su bzhugs nas dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lci'i bu rnams la chos bstan nas zas gtsang gi rigs
29a3: la mngon par gzigs te/ mngon par byung bar mdzad nas byang chub kyi snying po dag la nye bar mnan nas nye bar 'khod de// bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal bar bstan nas byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs par gyur te// bzhugs nas kyang kun nas
29a4: 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin sngon du 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin bya ba brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sa gol gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
29a5: spyan 'dren cing gsang sngags 'di gsungs so/ / // oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa mA dza A kaR+Sha ya sarba ta thA ga tA na hAM// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po rnams legs par byon te chos kyi
29a6: dbyings su spros nas phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams khyab ste/ nam mkha'i khams na gnas pa thams cad til gyi gang bltar 'dzam bu'i gling du 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan
29a7: 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis bkug cing bcug ste/ bcings nas dbang du mdzad de// de nyid kyi thugs khar rab tu bzhag par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas byin
29a8: gyi brlabs te/ sngags 'dis rang gi sems so sor rtogs pa mdzad do// oM tsit+ta pra ti be d+haM ka ro mi/ de'i rjes thogs nyid la sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs khar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
29b1: sprul pa'i sku las chos kyi sku rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba sems rin po tshangs par byung ste// spros par mdzad do// de nyid sems 'od gsal ba// thugs rje chen pos khyab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid/
29b2: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnyog pa spangs pa nam mkha' ltar gdod nas zhi ba// de las thugs rjes chen po la mngon par phyogs par byas nas sems can gyi khams thams cad la rnam par gzigs te/ mi shes pas rga ba dang / 'chi bas rnam par
29b3: khyab pa'i 'jig rten la gzigs nas slar yang sngags 'dis byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa nye bar bstan pa/ / oM b+ho d+hi tsat+ta ud pA da yA mi byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs khar
29b4: sems 'od gsal ba de yongs su rdzogs pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs khar rnam par gzhag go// legs par rnam par dag pa'i nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa/ spros pa tham
29b5: cad spangs pa me long lta bur brtan par byas nas/ / gnas te byang chub kyi sems chen po la sngags 'di brjod do// oM dz+nyA na ra smi bi dra dza n+d+ra/ de ni rjes thogs nyid la 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las rnam par
29b6: byung ngo / / de phyung nas kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi po drang du zhugs te/ shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gsal bar byas nas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi ri bo'i rtse bsnyil te rab tu rtogs par byas nas gcig tu 'dres te/ rdo rje'i sku chen
29b7: baM rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs gang rjes su zhugs nas tha ba'i kyil 'khor kyi dbus surabatuganas so/ / nam bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor kying dbang phyug chen pos sngags 'dis byin gyis bzlas so// oM ti/ badz+ra/ mA sa
29b8: sngags 'dis gos pa/ / oM swar badz+ra/ slar yang sngags 'dis bsdus so// oM sang ha ra badz+ra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ye shes rdo rje'i snying po 'di ched du brjod pa// oM dz+nyA na badz+ra/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal
30a1: 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badz+ra hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs mnyam pa nyid brnyes pas sngags 'dis byin gyis
30a2: brlabs pa/ oM badz+ra Ad ma ko ha~M/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan pa nyid du nye bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang / thugs gzigs nas
30a3: sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par mdzad do/ / o ya thA sarbata thA ga tas+t+ra thA a u0f7f/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'i rgyu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku bdag nyi
30a4: sems can gyi khams thams cad du nges par bstan to/ / de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang // 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis mthong nas lha dang mi rnams kyis mngon par byang chub pas bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa zhes smra
30a5: bsgrags so/ / de nas tshangs pas gsol ba btab ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor nas de dang des 'dul ba'i skye bo btul te gang gis slar ldog pa med pa nyid du gyur to// 'di rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bsgom pa'i rim pa'o//
30a6: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bstan te sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa nye bar bsgrubs nas de'i thugs ka las rdo rje phyung ste nyid kyi phyag tu gzhag par
30a7: gyur te/ / de nas 'od zer rnam par phyung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad nas slar log ste// bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs khar zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i skur byin gyis brlabs
30a8: te mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dar dang phreng bas dbang bskur ba// zla ba'i kha tog lta bu'i 'od zer can du byin gyis brlabs te rnam par gnas so// de nas thugs kha nas byung nas
30b1: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bsten te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga dang // rgyab dang drung du rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje chos dang rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje las la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i phreng bar rnam par
30b2: gnas so/ / de bzhin du sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams dang bdug pa la sogs pa'i lha khyad par du nges par bskyed cing gzugs la sogs pa rnams dang lcags kyu la sogs pa'i lha rnams bskyed de 'di dag gi dkyil 'khor bka'
30b3: stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// rdo rje snying po zhes su gsungs// grubazhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan// sgo khrud dang ni 'khyer dang /
30b4: rta babs kyis ni so sor spras// de yi dbus su khri chen po// kun nas yongs su gru bzhi pa// de yi steng du pad chen po// ge sar ldan zhing rab mdzes pa// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs dgod par bya// sangs rgyas kyi ni rlung
30b5: kun du/ / sangs rgyas thams cad dgod par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi nye 'khor du// 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs bri// phyi yi gnas ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas sras po rnam par dgod// kha dog ser po gzi brjid che// dbang chen dkyil
30b6: 'khor rab 'bar ba/ / thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan/ brgyan pa de dag dgod par bya// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi chog la// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang /
30b7: chu'i lha'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bas na// chos kyi 'khor lo zhes su brjod// de yi phyi rol gnyis pa la// zlum po ru ni rtogs
30b8: par Ta/ ri mo mang po sna tshogs pas// sgo dang sgo khyud brtag par bya// rta babs rnam pa sna tshogs pa// dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan// de yi dbus su pad chen po// ge sar ldan zhing rab mdzes pa// 'dab ma brgyad kyi ka ba'i mdun//
31a1: dkyil 'khor brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// rgyal ba thams cad dkar por mchog/ kha ba bzho ltar dkar gsal// shel dang zla ba lta bu'i 'od// kun da zla ba ltar dkar brtan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus
31a2: son par/ / de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// sangs rgyas sras po rnam par dgod// thams cad zla ba ltar dkar zhing // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// mtshon cha sna tshogs zla ba 'dra// zla ba 'bar mtshungs mnyam med pa// chu yi ming zhes bya ba ya/
31a3: dkyil 'khor dam pa nyid du 'dod// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las chu lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos me lha zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang
31a4: dag bshad bya ba/ / dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// rdo rje ye shes gzi brjid mtshungs// rdo rje gzi brjid ces su brjod// gru gsum rnam pa nyid du bya// sum mdo ris kyi rnam pa mtshungs// 'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs 'jigs pa'o// kha dog
31a5: dmar po stobs po che/ / 'jig pa'i dus kyi me 'dra ba// rtag tu pad ma rA ga mtshungs// de yi dbus su gzi brjid che// nyi ma'i kha dog stobs po che// rdo rje rtse gsum sna tshogs pa// sum mdo'i snying khar gzhag par bya// bal po se'u'i me tog
31a6: mtshungs/ / la ba'i me tog dag dang 'dra// pad ma pad ma rAg mtshungs// sangs rgyas dpa' bo yang dga' bar// bzang po mtshal dang mtshungs 'dra ba// rgya skyugs bcud dang 'dra bar gnas// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// de bzhin sa
31a7: rgyas sangs rgyas sras/ / khro bo dang ni mngag pa dag/ mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya// de dag thams cad kha dog dmar// gzi brjid khams la 'od ldan pa// 'od zer dmar po rab 'phro ba// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par/
31a8: thams cad dmar po'i mtshon cha can// dmar po'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// dmar po'i gos kyis bkab pa'i lus// phreng ba dmar po mchog 'dzin pa// 'di ni gzi brjid gter zhes bya// dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar ba'o// rdorje
31b1: snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las me lha zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs s+ho/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po yang yang rlung lha'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad byas
31b2: dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa/ / rlung gi khams dang 'dra bas na// rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes su bshad// zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa 'dra// dbyar gyi sprin gyi 'od dang mtshungs// a ta sI yi me tog 'dra/ in dra nI lI 'od dang mtshungs// de ya
31b3: dbus su pad chen po/ / bai DUr+ya yi 'od dang 'dra// shin du gnag pa'i mig sman mtshungs// sngon dmar gyi ni rnam par gnas// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// sangs rgyas dpa' bo rab 'bar ba// rgyal po 'khyil pa 'bar ba'i gzi// mtshan mo
31b4: nag mo lta bur gnas/ / u ta pal sngon po 'dab ma'i tshul// stong pa nam mkha'i lta bur gnas// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras rnams bri// khro bo rnams dang mngag pa dang // de bzhin pho nya pho nya mo// thams cad
31b5: sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ / de bzhin nag po'i gos gyon pa// kha dog nag po thams cad du// ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs bsnams// gdugs ni rnam pa du ma'i dbyibs// kha dog sna tshogs legs 'bar ba// bla re rgyas pa mnyam pa na//
31b6: kha dog nag po sna tshogs pa// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis// mdor bsdus nas ni bsgom par bya// dkyil 'khor chen po 'di lta bu// sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes skyob pa// bris nas shes rab can gyis bsgom/ gal te dngos grub rab
31b7: 'dod na'o/ / rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las rlung lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs to// bcom ldan
31b8: 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bskyed du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang
32a1: phyug chen po de rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas sgrub pa'i thabs kyis cho ga mchog tu gsang ba chen po bka' stsal pa/ sgeg mo sogs pas mchod pa kun/ yang dag mdor bsdus byasarba
32a2: ni/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen por// bdag gis rtag tu bsgom par bya// sngags kyi yi ge yang dag ldan// 'dod pa ster ba'i sku ru bya// sgra dang gzugs dang de bzhin spor// yi ger phreng ba de bzhin te// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus
32a3: gnas par/ / sngags pas thams cad rnam par bsam// hUM/ sngags pas snying khar son pa bsgom// gsang sngags dge ba brjod nas su// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag pa/ dung gi sma ru rab tu brjod// dril bu'i sgra ni rab
32a4: gsal ba/ pad mo rnal 'byor dbang phyug go// dus mini sprin gyi hUM gi sgra// tsa Ta tsa Ta'i sgra 'phro ba// rdo rje rin chen dbang phyug gis// sgra ru de bzhin gshegs rnams gsungs// nor bu las kyi rigs kyi yang // rnga chen sgra ru rab tu bshad/
32a5: piwang gling bu de bzhin glu// gar gyi rgyan gyi sgra dang ni// rdza rnga'i ngor sgra hUM gi sgra// spyi yi nyid du rab tu bshad// rtog pa kun la rnam par sbyar// sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las rnams dang // de nas gzugs kyi bzlas pa mchog/ go rims ji
32a6: bzhin rab tu bshad/ / dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // lha rnams dbang du bya ba ste// de la rang gi tshul rab sbyar// sngags dang phyag rgya rab tu sbyar// de rjes rnam pa kun gyi mchog/ rtag tu lus chen bsam bya bsam// lha yi sku
32a7: gzugs bsgom par bya/ / lag pa'i phyag rgya rab nges pa'i// phyag rgya'ang snying khar son zhes bya// rang gi rigs rim cho ga yis// de yi lus ni 'od gsal zhing // sgron ma'i 'od ltar gsal ba'i khyim// de ltar kun nas thams cad du/
32a8: kun nas baspu'i rtse dag nas// 'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng dag pas// gzugs kyi bzlas pa zhes su bshad// de nas sbyor ba'i bzlas pa ni// gsang sngags sgrub pos brtsam par bya// mchod dang byin rlabs dbang bskur mchog/ spro la stsogs
32a9: rami thams cad du/ / sbyor ba'i bzlas pa gtso bo 'di// 'bad pa yid ni rab tu bshad// snying kha mgrin pa mchu lho ma ni// rkan dang spyi bo nyid ma yin// nad ma ni phyi dang gnyis par min// tshes ni 'ba' zhig kho na la// bzlas pa'i sgra yang
32b1: 'byung ma yin/ 'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor che// shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba// bsgom pa'i bsngags pa de nyid gi rnal 'byor pa yi gnas su bshad// de nas steng du mdor bsdus te// snying kha'i dkyil 'khor rab zlum pa// zla ba gang ba
32b2: ltar bsam bya/ / dri ma med cing legs pa gnas// de la yi ge rnam par dgod// tshig gi phreng ba ma chad pa// mu tig phreng ba ltar rgyas pa// char sprin gyi ni me 'dra'i 'od// de tshe thams cad gsal bar byed// lha yi lus ni snang byed cing // ji lta
32b3: ji ltar yi ge'i phreng / / mchog gi lus la rab 'jug pa// de lta de ltar sngags kyi lus// lha yi bdag nyid nyid du 'gyur// mthu stobs lha dbang thams cad ni// tshangs pa khyab 'jug las cher lhag// bzlas pa de nyid mchog 'di ni// sangs rgyas
32b4: kun gyis bsngags pa'o/ / ji ltar sems ni bsgom pa yis// de lta dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las bzlas pa'i de kho na nyid kyi le'u'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos
32b5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa rin po che bka' stsal pa/ / mnyam med mig yo mnyam med mchog gi chos nyid can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad// yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin
32b6: mdzad pa/ / dri med mi g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i mchog chos can// yon tan shin du phra ba'i tsha la'ang tshad med de// dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod ma yin// dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams// sems can khams
32b7: la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol/ / rtag tu dri ma med pa thugs rje'i shugs las byung // smon lam grub pa 'gog pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don grub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu
32b8: rnam par snang / tshad med tshad dang bral ba'i shin tu rdzogs pa yi// bde bar gshegs pa go 'phang dam pa brnyes gyur kyang // khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi// thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yod
32b9: mi 'gyur/ / e ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan// mchog sprin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog brnyes pa// khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// mgon po dus gsum sgrub pa med pa rab
33a1: mkhyen pas/ / dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la gsol// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yang dag yon tan rgyas pa ste// lan cig tsam zhig brjod pas kyang // gsang sngags thams cad 'grub
33a2: par 'gyur/ / bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// de bzhin gshegs de kun bstod na// rab yangs dngos grub stsol 'gyur te// bskal par gnas shing bskal par bskul// lus ni g.yo ba med pa ru bdag nyid brtan par byas pa yis// mgo/
33a3: po chen po rnam snang mdzad// mi skyod rin chen 'byung gnas dang // rgyal ba dag pa 'od dpag med// don grub rgyal po thams cad du// dngul chu bcud len de nyid dang // mchog kyang rab tu gsol bar byed// dngos grub yid 'ong ma lus pa/ rgyas
33a4: pa'i don dang phun sum tshogs/ / re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// yid la 'dod pa ster bar byed// ye shes tshe dang stobs dang shugs// mchog tu dge ba gsol bar mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa'i rgyal po zhes
33a5: bya ba rdzogs s+ho/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bka' stsal pa/ tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med// spung bar gnas pa'i cho ga med// ji
33a6: rab shad patshogs ga gnas pa nanas rbu de/ gang yang rung ba'i yid dga' bar ji ltar rung ba'i dkyil 'khor byas ste// me rtogs lam bkram la 'drug slos kyis bdugs te/ de ba'i dig shegs pa thams cad 'jisar rus pa'i
33a7: me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyi mchod par byas te/ / sngags 'dis yid kyis kyang sdig pa bshags te// oM sarba pA pAtA kA yi kA bA tsi ka man song b+ha tAn rAg/ dre la mo ha ma d+ha mAn d+hi Sh+ThAn yang ke tu tan trekA li ka d+hA dz+nyAnA
33a8: badz+ra phaT badz+ra sar+b+ba thA lA~M s+phoT yA mi swA hA/ / oM sar+b+ba bA hA pra ti da sha yA me swAhA// do rjes thogs la bdag nyid kyi dngos po dbul bar bya ste/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ti nAn mA nyam b+ha ba ni yA ta yA ma/ khaD+ga ta thA ga tAr+Na ba ti shre bAn tu ma ma
33b1: denas de bzhan gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba ni/ / oM rar+b+ba tathA ga ta prat+ya dz+nyAn saM g+hA rA Nam nu mo yA mi swAhA/ yang dang yang du byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags kyis
33b2: byin/ / oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma man ta b+hadrA ma hA badz+ra sa ma yaM ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta Ad bA da yA mi swA hA/ mnas na na pa/ de nas byang du kyis paskyed pa thogs pan do// can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i bsod nams deng ye shes
33b3: tshogs yongs su rdzogs pas bcu'i dbang phyug nor bu rin po che chen po'i bad ma'i snying po seng ge'i khre'i steng du bdag nyid bas sa par bya'o/ / oM bud d+ho ha~M/ sngags 'dis bdag yongs su dag par byas te/ o swa b+hu ba shu
33b4: sar+b+hat+ta thA ga tA sru ba pa shung d+ho ga sngags 'dis bag nyid chos kyi dbyings yangs pa 'od gsal pa'i snang bar shin druganas par bya ste/ oM d+hamAt+kaHswA b+hA ba atA ma ko / de nas skyes byachen po'i mtshan srus bcu rgya gnyis kyis brgyan
33b5: pa bdag nyid bye gyis brlabs te 'jig rten thams cad las shin tu 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi skur bdag nyid sngags 'dis gnas par bya ste/ oM pra d+h+wa~M thad te/ de bzhin du rim pa 'dis chos kyi dbyings
33b6: rgya chen por spros nas bdag nyid sangs rgyas nyid do/ / zhes nga rgyal bskyed la bdag skye dgu ma lus pa'i dpung gnyen du byas la/ chos kyi dbyings yangs pa 'od gsal bar lhag par gnas par bya ste nye bar rgyas par thun mtshams
33b7: bzhir bzlam pa btsam par bya ste/ thun mtshams gsum du dus ji lta bar yi ge lo rjes su gzhol ba'i yid kyis 'bum phrag nyi shu bzlas par bya zhide nyis re rang stong phrag brgyad dam stong phrag re bzlas te ji srid mtshan mthong
33b8: pa de srid du'o/ / tsan dan dang ga bur dang / gur gum la sogs pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor byas te/ nye bar mkho ba thams cad kyis mchod pa byas nas cho 'phrul gyi zla ba 'ams ga'i ga ma gyisang dme stong phrag brgyad sA ral rdo rje
33b9: dkyil dkrungs kyi gnas te snga ma'i me tog gas me tog padam sa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / mchod rten la mchod de ji srid 'drug gi sgra sgrogs pa mthos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bdag lagasal
34a1: bar 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/ / de nas bsreg blu gas 'bum phrag cig dgang bar byas pas mtshan ma thams cad gsal bar 'gyur ro// bye ba phrag bzhi bzlas pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i sems can thams
34a2: cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ / de nas sgrub pa chen po byed par 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtho gang ba'i tshad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten bya ba la mchod rten re re'i mdun du stong phrag re re bzlas pa 'am/ yang na dri'i
34a3: mchod rten gyi drung du 'bum lhag pa'i bye ba phrag bdun bzlas so/ / bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang ba'i tshad kyi mchod rten nyid ma re re la re re ji srid bye ba phrag bdun bzlas pa rdzogs pa de srid du bya'o// tha ma yang mchod rten 'bar
34a4: ba'i 'od des sgrub pa'i lus la zhugs pas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs nas ji srid dag pa'i gnas kyi dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams me tog gi char 'bebs par 'od bar 'gyur ro// lha dang klu dang
34a5: gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci la sogs pa 'ongs nas kyang bstod par byed cing ji srid i bI tsi ma nar med pa'i bar gyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad bsil bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas rnams
34a6: kyang yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ / sdug bsngal ba rnams kyis sems can rnams la gdung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon par gzigs par 'gyur ro// de'i rjes
34a7: 'alus dang ba gser gyi mdog lta bu dang / lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam pa can dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes thob pa dang / kha dog dang / tshe dang / stobs dang / shugs dang / dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
34a8: bu rgyu ba dang / 'khor los babyung ba ltar che ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngon par bstod cing steng du 'gro ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i
34b1: rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor ba dang / lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba dang / phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang / de bzhin
34b2: gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis legs par mchod cing grub pa thams cad 'od kyis lhung bar 'gyur ro/ / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i stan phyed ster bar 'gyur ro// gzi brjid dang /
34b3: gzugs dang / dpa' bas rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yang so sor thob par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad 'dul ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// phyi ma'i mthar tshe
34b4: byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bya ba nges par ston par 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i sprin thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po
34b5: kun du bzang po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// // sgrub pa'i thabs gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa
34b6: thams cad mchod par byas te/ 'gi wad dam ldong ros pad ma'i snod du gzhag la ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum byung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ba dang / mi snang ba dang / rig pa thams
34b7: cad 'dzin par nyid do/ / rig pa 'dzin par gyur nas nyi ma stong shar ba'i kha dog dang // lo brkyang gnyis kyi rnam par skal zhing 'khyil ba dang // gdu bu dang ldan zhing lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing rig pa 'dzin pa'i
34b8: grub pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba dang / bskal pa chen po'i mthar gnas pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro// rim pa 'dis rtse gsum bsgrubs na dbang phyug chen por 'gyur ro// mchod phyir
35a1: thogs bsgrubs na tshangs par 'gyur ro/ / 'khor los khyab 'jug tu 'gyur ro// grog mkhar gyi rtse mo'i sa bzung ste sa bsrungs kyi bu byas la de la zhon te bzlas na dbang por 'gyur ro// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor byas te de'i
35a2: steng du bsdad na nyi ma dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zla ba'i ste 'di nyid kyis lha'i bye brag gang gi mtshan ma bzung ste// des de'i longs spyod la spyod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rim pa 'dis dngul chu'am bcud len/
35a3: gang bslabs pa de 'grub par 'gyur ro// gal te ma grub na de'i tshe sgrub pa lan bdun bya'o// bdun byas pas ci nas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bas bka' stsal pa// 'bum
35a4: phrag gsum bzlas pas ri lhun po'i tshad tsam gyi ri bo yang hUM zhes brjod pas ltung ba dang / rgya mtsho skems pa dang // ljon pa drung nas 'byin pa dang // bum pa nam mkha' la 'phen pa dang / glang po che rengs par byed pa dang / pha rol gyi sde
35a5: mngon par 'joms par byed pa dang / bar snang na gnas pa thams cad ltung bar byed do// sems can thams cad 'bebs par byed do// sgrub pa po las gang dang gang sgrub par 'dod pa de dang de thams cad byed do// yang zla ba gcig tsam/
35a6: mi smra bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bdag nyid bsgoms na sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// sgyu 'phrul dra ba thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la gnas shing 'chag par byed do// me 'bar
35a7: ba dang glog 'gyur ba la sogs pa ston par byed do/ / gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag kying g.yo bar byed do// sgrub pa pos bye ba bdun bzlas nas 'di dag thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// rim
35a8: pa 'dis lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / snam sbyar dang / mkhar sil las gang yang rung ba bzung nas ji srid rig pa 'dzin pa gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang / sbrel pa du ma byed
35b1: pa dang / 'dod na 'chi ba dang // skad cig tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nye bar gnas par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad kyang byed do// sgrub pa'i tha
35b2: g zhan yang bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshad kyi mchod rten 'bum phrag gcig byas te rma med pa'i ral gri blangs la cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed la nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod de brgyad pa 'am bcu bzhi pa 'am nya gang ba la
35b3: dkyil dkrungs bcas te ji srid du ral gri 'bar ba de srid du bzla bar bya'o/ / de'i rjes thogs nyid la rnga bo che rnams kyi sgra grag go/ steng nas me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro// lhan gcig pa ji snyed pa dang bcas pa steng du 'gro'o//
35b4: rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro// ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin pa chen po'i 'khor los sgyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i cha lugs dang rgyan 'chang ba 'dod dgu rgyu ba dang / skad
35b5: cig tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par spyod pa dang / / rga shi med pa dang nyi ma re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba mthong ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mchod pa'i
35b6: char 'bebs pa dang / bskal pa chen po stong phrag tu 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang 'khor lo 'am pa Ti sa blangs te 'bum phrag nyi shu bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang dpal gyi sgor song ste/ nim pa'i lo mtsha
35b7: ba'i mar khu la btags pa 'bum phrag gcig bsregs blugs bya'o/ / lha ma yin gyi 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// lA ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur ro// gal te ma grub na 'bum phrag gnyis sam
35b8: gsum du bsregs blugs bya'o/ / lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad bsregs bzhin du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// 'ongs nas kyang sgrub pa po la zhu bar byed de// kye skyes bu dpa' bo 'jug tu gsol zhes smra'o// de nas grogs dang bcas pa 'jug
36a1: par bya'o/ / la gri'am 'khor lo de bzung nas lha ma yin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// sa 'og gi rdzas rnams kyi mnga' bdag lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad kyi bdag po// gsang sngags grub pa gzhan thams cad
36a2: dang lha ma yin gyi ging 'dzin pa rnams kyi dbang phyugs 'og thams cad kyi bdag po/ / lha ma yin chen po'i sprul pa byed pa po bskal pa chen por gnas pa/ khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo hUM zhe khyab brjod pa tsam gyis rlag par byed pa/ khyab 'jug kyang
36a3: hrIzhes rjod pa tsam gyis brlag par byed na/ / gzhan lha mos kyang ci dgos// sgrub pa'i thabs gnan yang // bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'bum phrag sum bcu byas te mchod rten re re'i mdun du stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzla bar bya'o//
36a4: thams cad la nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la tha mar me tog can gyi lcags las byung ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa mtho gang tsam pa bzung nas cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed pa dkyil mo dkrungs bcings te/ ji srid 'bar ba de srid
36a5: du bzlas par bya'o/ / de blangs pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi mnga' bdag dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha thams cad 'dul bar byed pa/ bskal pa bye ba brgya
36a6: stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'tshe ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong rdzu 'phrul gyis gnon pa dang / mchod pa'i sprin brgya stong phrag gis mchod pa byed pa dang // sangs rgyas stong phrag mthong bar 'gyur ro// de rnams la nyi ma re re zhing
36a7: mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis mchod par byed do/ / sgrub pa'i thabs rgyas pa gzhan yang mchod rten 'bum phrag drug bcu byas te/ sngon du bsnyen pa byas la bye bag pa'o// de nas mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pa'i ro blangs la
36a8: khrus byas nas nye bar mkho ba thams cad kyis mchod de ji si de ma langs pa de srid du bzlabar bya'o/ / ngas nas dngu la chu dang bcud len dang mi snang ba la sogs pa thams cad de la star bar byed do// gal te mi ster na ji srid kha las lcem byung ba/
36b1: de srid du bzla bar bya'o// de nas mtshan rnon pos de bcad par bya'o// de gzung bas nyi ma stong gi gi da can rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba stong phrag drug cu'i 'khor can/ tshe bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag
36b2: drug cu 'tshe ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang / ri bo lhun po bye ba phrag stong skul ba dang gling stong phrag 'phen pa dang / rgya mtsho stong phrag skems pa dang / lha'i 'jig rten brgya stong phrag bsdigs pa dang /
36b3: tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams lhung ba dang sgro li zhing 'khyil ba dang / lo brgyad gnyis pa'i rnam pa dang / rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa ste/ sreg pa'i bskal pa na 'jig rten gyi khams
36b4: gzhan du 'gro zhing rga ba dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ / de bzhin du yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / dpag bsam gyi shing dang / bum pa bzang po dang /
36b5: nor gyi char pa dang / nam mkha'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin chen po dang / rin po che chen po'i lag pa dang / nor rgyun gyi rtog pa chen po dang / sems can gyi re ba thams cad rjes su 'gengs pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid dang
36b6: rin po che thams cad kyang sgrub par bya'o/ / de la 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyimi bdag rin po che dang / bsnyen bkur ba rin po che'o//
36b7: de nas sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang tsan dan dkar po las pad ma sor drag pa'i tshad byas la pad ma de lag par gzung nas zla ba drug tu dkyil dkrung bcings te nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod nas thun mtshams gsum
36b8: 'am bzhir grangs mi gzung bar bzlas par bya'o/ / zla ba drug yongs su rdzogs pa dang pad ma 'bum phrag bdun bsreg blugs bya'o// zla ba nya nas bsgrub pa brtsam par bya ste nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la dkyil dkrungs
37a1: bcas nas mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o/ / tho rangs kyi tshe rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sgra li zhing 'byil pa dang / lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam par rgyan gyi tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa// nyi ma stong phrag shar ba'i
37a2: 'od dang mtshungs pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag du mi'i 'khor can/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor ba// tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams mngag gzhug par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
37a3: du skad cig tsam gyis rnam par rgyu ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin du mas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par mchod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ud pa la'i sgrub pa dang / tsan dan dmar po'i pad ma'i sgrub pa yang ngo // sgrub pa gzhan
37a4: yang 'byung ste/ shel dang pad ma rA ga 'am/ mu tig gi 'bras bu 'am rin po che yongs su rtog par byed pa pos yongs su brtags pa la bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshad tsam pa'i mchod rten 'bum tsam byas te// gang
37a5: yang rung bar grangs mi bzung bar ji srid bdag yongs su dag par mthong ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o/ / de'i rjes su mngar gsum gyis spags pa'i pad ma 'bum dang sna ma'i me tog 'bum phrag gsum dang / a ka ru'i
37a6: ye shing 'bum dang / tsan dan gyi ye shing 'bum phrag gsum dang / tAl dang 'bras 'bum phrag bzhi dang // zho zan 'bum dang / mar gyi bsreg thugs stong phrag gsum dang / sman thams cad pa'i bsreg thugs 'bum phrag
37a7: gcig byas la sbyin bsreg yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dkar po'i tshes bcwa lnga la bsgrub par bya'o// dkyil mo dkrungs bcas te nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la// ji srid nor bu rin po che 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o//
37a8: 'bar nas kyang rig pa 'dzin pa gzhon nu gdong du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ska li zhing 'khyil pa dang / lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gsapa
37b1: bar byed pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi slar 'khor los bsgyur ba chen por 'gyur ro// yid bzhin nor bu'i dngos grub byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rig pa 'dzin pa zhes brjod do// sangs rgyas thams cad
37b2: mchod cing bsnyen bkur bar byed do/ / skad cig tsam la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can bskor nas slar de nyid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'dod na byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mngon par rdzogs par byas te lus
37b3: de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du sgrub thabs kyi le'u la bris sku dang shing lha ma dang / mu tig gi phreng ba yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i tshogs
37b4: bsgrub par bya'o/ / thams cad du 'grub par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang mchod rte bye ba phrag stong byas te/ 'bu ma phrag bdun bzla bar bya'o// yongs su rdzogs pa dang / me tog can gyi lcags sam/ lcags lnga'i rang bani/
37b5: gyi rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa sor bcu'i tshad ngam bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshad tsam cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed la mtshan thog thag lag pas rdo rje de bzung nas mdun du khri'i steng du lag pa bkab la ji srid 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzla bar
37b6: bya'o/ / de bzung nas rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po nyi ma bye ba brgya phrag dang rjes su 'tsham pa rdo rje 'chang ba ltar gzi brjid dang ldan zhing 'od gsal bar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu zhing dbang
37b7: phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams la ci bsgo ba nyan par 'gyur/ / lha ma yin rnams skrag pa dang / srin po rnams 'joms pa dang / sems can thams cad de'i ci bsgo ba byed par 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
37b8: pa thams cad kyis 'khor los sgyur ba chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzas kyi bya ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u yongs su rdzogs s+ho//
38a1: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad slar yang ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab
38a2: pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po kak+Sha sbyar ba ste/ mtha' yas pa kha sbyar ba zhes bya ba bka' stsal du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang/
38a3: bachen po gsang sngags kyi kak+Sha praT bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes su skyob// gsang sngags kak+Sha sbyar zhes bya// gsang chen mchog tu rmad du byung // grubazhi pa la tshad mdzes pa//
38a4: kun nas yongs su bzang zhing dag/ re mig bzhi bcu zhe dgu pa// mdor bsdus nas ni sngags pas bya// dang po'i phreng bzang gnyis la ni// a sogs blo gros ldan pas dgod// ka sogs lta / ma'i su mig la// sngags pas mdor
38a5: bsdus te bri/ / sbyor ba ji bzhin yi ge kun// go rims bzhin du dgod par bya/ 5 mig stong pa dag la ni// k+Sha yig dang ni rdo rje bri// rim pa 'di dag bkod nas ni// rang sde'i 'og bu 'bar ba mchog/ dang po dbyangs la de'i rjes su// yi na/
38a6: phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa// ka tsaT ta pa ya sha// dag cing chu yi dkyil 'khor ldan// 'di rnams myur du 'grub par byed// pad ma'i rigs kyi lha nyid do// don kun grub par yang dag ldan// me yi dkyil 'khor zhes su bshad// 'bar
38a7: ba'i med pa mtshungs pa'i 'od/ / kha tsha Sha tha pa ra Sha// dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor ldan// ga dza Ta da pa las// dngos grub kun byed rlung gzugs ldan// dbyar gyi sprin ltar shan tu 'jigs// g+ha dz+nyAn+ta d+ha b+ha wa ha// steng 'gros dngos
38a8: grub byed por brjod/ / slar yang nga nya Na na ma// chos kun dbang du byed pa mchog/ thog ma'i dbyangs yig gang yin pa// de ni de bzhin gshegs stobs bcu// khyad par yan lag bcu gnyis bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
38b1: sa bcu gnyis/ / ma ning yi ge bzhi po spong // ri rI li lI zhes bya ba// dbyangs dang sa bon de bzhin sngags// de dag yi ge ru yang bshad// dbang du byed pa'i sde tshan kun// thig le sgra gtsug zla byed ces// rjes dbyangs kyi ni phreng rje/
38b2: bshad// sangs rgyas de bzhin byang sems kyi// yi ger brjod pa de bzhin zhing // gsal byed ces kyis gsal ba'o// de bzhin yar la wa rlung // me dang dbang chen chu dag ste// 'byung ba chen po khams rnams so// rlung me bdud
38b3: rdzi'i bcud ces bshad/ / mnyam dang mi mnyam cha dbye bas// thams cad nyid kyi lam shes bya// phyag rgya dang ni dkyil la bor sngags// ting 'dzin mdor bsdus bshad pa'o// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// chos
38b4: rnams kun gyi sgom du brjod/ / stong pa mtshan med smon med pa// rnam par thar pa gsum du bshad// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya// de ni sngags kyi ka ka'i sbyor ba la/ rab tu btus
38b5: pa sbyar ba dang phral ba bshad par bya'o/ / yi ge rnams kyis byang chub spyod// sangs rgyas nyid kyang mya ngan 'das// lhan cig nyid du sbyar bar bya// dbyangs rnams yig rnams bsdus par bshad// mtshan nyid kyang ni rab
38b6: bshad bya/ / dpyangs ni byang chub gzugs nyid de// gzhan dang lhan cig sbyar bar bya// de la nges par sangs rgyas nyid// ster ba nyid du legs par bshad// thog mar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang sngags dri ma med
38b7: pa 'byung / / thog mar dbyangs ni thig le ldan// rdo rje'i steng du yang dag gnas// 'bar ba'i phreng can rab zhi pa// rnam par 'phro ba nyid du gnas// zla ba'i dbus su bsgom bya ba// kun gyi ye shes 'od chen po// kun du 'gro ba
38b8: rab tu thob/ / thams cad du yang rnyed par dka'// de nyid bral ba rtag pa ste// yi ge med cing dbyer med pa// byang chub sems zhes rab du bshad// dung dang kun da zla ltar dag/ gnyis pa'i sgra dang yang dag ldan// da ni shi
39a1: ring por shes/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod pa ste// sa dang pha rol phyin pa rnams// dro ba'i bzhipa sbyar ba ni// mya ngan 'das pa zhes su bsgrags// dbyangs dang yi ge khyad par ca// mtshan nyid rab tu sbyar bar bya// rang gi phyag
39a2: rgya sogs ldan pa/ / sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sngags kyi de nyid 'dir bshad bya// thog mar spyod pa byas nas ni// gnyis pa smra ba bo ru bshad// bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyis kun nas
39a3: mnan/ / gsum pa me yi ming can no// rgyu med pas te cung zad pa// bzhi pa yis ni gsal bar byas// drug pa'i sgra dang tha dad ma ni// de yi stong du thig le gnas// chos kun nam mkha' dang mtshungs par// yang dang yang du
39a4: bshad pa yin/ / de ni lnga par shes par bya// yi ge lnga pa stobs po che// yi ge lnga pa stobs lnga'i bdag nyid las skyes gtso// mthu stobs chen po khyab bdag srid pa'i bdag nyid skyes// mthu stobs chen po srid gsum
39a5: las rab grol byed pa/ / yi ge lnga ni 'gro ba drug las grol ba'i bdag/ mngon shes drug kyang rab tu ster byed dri mi med// de nyid bcom ldan spyod pa ste// mi bskyod pa zhes rab tu grags// byang sems rdo rje sems dpa'
39a6: ste/ / brtan pa'i sems dpa' rang byung ba// chos kun gyi ni de bzhin nyid// gang bsgrags de nyid thams cad du// 'bar ba me yi sa bon ldan// spyod pa yi ni steng du gnas// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// rin chen 'byung ldan zhes su
39a7: bshad/ / chos rnams kun gyi byed pa ni// med pa nyid du'ang bshad pa'o// me yi sa bon yang dag ldan// bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyis spyi bo ru// mnan pa rgyal ba 'od dpag med// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// sna tshogs de bzhin
39a8: gshegs pa kun/ / drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// don yod pa yi snying por grags// sde lnga pa yi bzhi pa ni// dngos dang dngos me darab rtogs byed// 'bar ba me yi sa bon gyis// 'khor lo'i dbus su rab tu gnas//
39b1: drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// thig le sgra yis rnam par spras// 'khor los sgyur ba ye shes che// rnam par rgyas pa'i nor ster byed// gang zhig sde lnga pa yi mtha'// sgyu ma'i chos la rab tu gnas// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor//
39b2: ni// gdugs dkar zhes su bshad pa'o// brgyad pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// byams pa zhes ni grags pa ste// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// spyi bor thig le mnan pa'o// 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang ye shes che// sA ba bI rA de bsgragaso//
39b3: lnga pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// 'jam pa'i dpal zhes rab tu grags// spyod pa'i gar mkhan rab rtogs ming // sdig pa thams cad rengs byed de// sdig kun rnam par sbyong byed pa// rnam par sel ba rnam shes bya// sde chen lnga pa'i
39b4: gsum pa ni/ / phyag na rdo rje stobs chen dang // gshin rje mthar byed khro bo che// yi ge gsum ni stobs chen po// thog mar dgu pa yi ni dbyangs// de yi dbus su spyod pa gzhag/ tha mar sna tshogs zhes bya sbyar// sku gsum du ni rnam par
39b5: bsgom/ / tha ma'i sde tshan gsum pa ni// gang yin kun tu bzang por bshad// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni// sangs rgyas spyan shes byaba'o// de nyid bcom ldan mgon po ni// nam mkha'i mdzod ces rab tu grags// rdo rje khro bo stobs po che// de nyid
39b6: rab tu grags pa'o/ / 'di kun thams cad stong pa ste// rgyu ni rab tu spangs pa'o// dbyangs lnga dang ni yang dag ldan// rdo rje hUM mdzad hU~M mdzad do// gang zhig bzhi pa'i sde dang po// me yis rab tu gsal bar byas// bzhi pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan//
39b7: gzi brjid phung po stobs pa che// de nyid gang dang ma sbyar ga/ la ba zhes su za / pa nin nyis pa gang / sa dpa pi la phyin pa ga/ thig pa lhan cigapa da / dang ldan pa'i mchog tu gyur// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa gang //
39b8: me nyid dang ni yang dag ldan// bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyi yang dag mnan// khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog/ de nyid bcom ldan shes bya ba// spyod pa'i gang mkhan zhes bya'i mtshan// de yi rjes nyid la ni me// dgu pa'i dbyangs dang
40a1: yang dag ldan/ / me dang dbang chen du brjod bya// gsum pa'i dbyangs kyis mnan pa yi// sde tshan dang po'i dang po'i yig/ de nyid bcom ldan mgon po ni// 'dzag rten mgon po thub pa che// ye shes rgya che bsgrub par bya// sangs
40a2: rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed/ / sde tshan lnga pa rin chen mchog/ bzhi pa'i sa bon dam pa de// 'og tu me yi yan lag 'bar// khro gnyer can zhes rab tu grags// dbang chen yi ge dag pa la// thig le sgra yis rnam par brgyan// sangs
40a3: rgyas spyan zhes rnam grags pa/ / sdig pa thams cad 'phrog par byed// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni// nam mkha'i spyan zhes brjod pa'o// sgyu ma'i chos la rab gnas nas// bsod pa'i don du rab gsol byed// mA ma kI zhes bya ba'i ming // rig
40a4: pa mchog tu gsang ba ste/ / rgyu mi dmigs pa'i chos rnams kyi// dri ma med pa stsol bar byed// gnyis pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya// dbang chen sa bon yang dag ldan// 'gro ba'i rdo rje deng sa byed na// gdug sems
40a5: gzhan kun lta ci smos/ / rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyar byas pa// rang gi sa bon gnas shing 'phro// 'gro ba thams cad skrod byed na// gdug sems can gzhan smos ci dgos// de Ti me dang ldan pas ni// dbang dang gdug pa'i las rnams dang //
40a6: bgegs dang dgra rnams zhi ba ni// khyad par mi g.yo ba yis byed// don dam bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs// rnam snang mdzad bya gnas las 'byung // gzhan gyi dmag dpung 'joms pa ni// rgyu ni me yis gsal byas pa// drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang
40a7: ngag lan/ thig le sgra yis rnam par brgyan// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par byed// rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis grangs pas// ti se man dA ra la sogs// de yi phye mar klog par des// rdo rje la gnas 'khor lo yi// dbus gnas 'gro kun rengs
40a8: pabapar byed/ / gnas nas bskyod par byed pa yis// 'byung po rnams ni dbang du byed// rtag pa'i gzugs su gnas nas ni// mi g.yo ba yi snying khar son// tshes kyi dbyings mtshungs thob nas ni// bdag gi bdag nyid bsgom par bya// rlung
40b1: gis bon rin po che/ / spyod pa'i steng du yang dag ldan// me las byung ba me la gnas// 'gro ba thams cad 'bebs par byed// sde tshan dang po'i dang po gang // sa yi yi ge steng du gnas// sde tshan lnga pa'i tha ma ni// drug pa'i sgra yi steng du gnas//
40b2: 'og tu me yi sa bon ldan// nyi mi'i dkyil 'khor dbus su te// sa gsum thams cad 'bar bar byed// me yi phyogs su gnas nas ni// phyag rgya'i bdag nyid thams cad bsgom// rlung lha me lha yang dag sbyor// rgyu ni byed pa mtshungs pa'o//
40b3: rnam par snang mdzad ye shes che// de nyid kho na bsgrub par bya// dbang chen me ni sbyor ba las// 'khor los sgyur ba'i go 'phang gnas// ye shes rgya chen bsgrub par bya// yang na phun sum tshogs pa'i don// rig pa 'dzin dang sangs rgyas
40b4: nyid/ / rnal 'byor ye shes phun sum tshogs// skye ba 'di la 'grub 'gyur te// 'di la the tshom mi bya'o// dbyangs dang yi ge thams cad la// sbyor ba'i dbye bas rnam par dbye// tshig dang ngag gi tshad rnams dang // ting nge 'dzin dang sngags
40b5: 'byung ba/ / slob dpon man ngag las shes bya// gzhan du bya ba ma yin no// rdo rje snying po'i rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud chen po las rdo rje ka k+ta'i sbyor ba mdor bsdus te bstan pa ste rgyas par slob dpon gyis mngon par spyad par bya'o//
40b6: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsung ngag gi dkyil 'khor gsol ba btab po// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis
40b7: gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gi rjes nyid la/ 'brug gi sgra mtha' yas pa'i legs par bsgrags pa/ nam mkha'i mdzod kun nas rdo rje rgya che ba tshangs pa chen po'i sgra yongs su rdzogs pa'i don dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams
40b8: cad kyi gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor so sor yongs su rtogs pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gsung gi 'khor
41a1: lo'i dkyil 'khor che/ / zlum po kun nas bzang po ste// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gnas// de yi steng du pad chen po// 'dab ma brgyad la ge sar can// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// yi ge mchog gi go 'phang nyid//
41a2: bdag gi dngos grub bsgom par bya// ngag gi dbang phyug 'od chen po// snying khar zla ba der pad ma// de yi steng du dung brtag bya// dung gi dbus su lho yin te// rdo rje'i rang bzhin dge ba'o// de yi steng du rin chen pad// yang na sangs rgyas
41a3: gzugs brnyan yang / / 'babrar zhing rkan gyi mthar khyab pa// bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni rab 'bab pa// pa yi yi ge spyi tshugs pa// sangs rgyas kyi ni steng du gnas// bdud rtsi'i thigs pa 'dzag pa ni// go rims bzhin du bsam par bya// zla ba byad
41a4: dang zla ba gsum/ / zla ba bzhi'am zla ba nyid// zla ba brgyad du rab mchog bsgoms// dkyil 'khor bzang po bsgrub par bya// skyil dkrungs kyis ni nyer gnas te// dang po'i sbyor ba'i dbang phyug skyes// chos kyi dbyings ni mtha' dag tu//
41a5: thams cad du ni yongs su gang // sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan bsgom par bya// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa'i// ji snyed rig pa thams cad ni// lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyi// phyag rgya
41a6: de rnams bdag nyid mchog/ de rnams thams cad bdag nyid kyi// lus kyi dkyil 'khor la 'jug bsam// dung gi sgra ni gsal ba bsam// pad ma'i khams la yang dag rten// pad ma'i ge sar thig le las// sgra yi rang bzhin rdul
41a7: phran rnams/ / mgrin par son nas sgra gur ste// sgra ni dbyangs nyid lhag pa'o// slar yang lce ru son pa dang // yi ge mchog tu dge ba'o// lce yi yi ge cher 'bar ba// gcig nas gcig tu rdo rje'i tshul// kun nas rab tu 'od gsal ba/ rdo rje'i
41a8: dag ni dam pa'i don/ / sgra yis nam mkha' kun gang bas// sgrub pos mdo ru bsdus te bzla// de bzhin du ni snying khar sgra 'am// lce la 'od zer nges 'phros nas// mchu'am so las rab bkra ba'i// gal te 'od zer mthong na ni// de tshe
41b1: par rnam par shes/ / grub pa'i ngag ni dam pa'i don// yang na lha ni gzhan pa yi// ngag gi sgrub thabs chen po mchog/ rang lce rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsam// bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yang // 'bar ba'i sgron ma dang mtshungs pa// rang gi snying gi
41b2: dbus kyi cha/ / yi ge mchog tu phra pa yi// a yi yi ge mnga' bdag mchog/ rnam par bkra ba nyi ma bzhin// rang gi sde pa'i mthar thug mtshungs// yi ge yi ger yongs su gzhol// phra mo mnyam pa'i mthar thug ni// 'bar zhing
41b3: thig le dang mtshungs shing / / snying gi dkyil 'khor gsal byed pa// de yi 'bar ba rab pra ba// ji srid rgan gyi bar du san// slar yang yi ge thams cad ni// yang dang yang du gsal byed cing // lce la rdo rje 'bar ba ni// rdul phran lta
41b4: bur bye bzhin pa'i/ / rdo rje 'bar ba stong phrag dag/ yang dang yang du rnam par 'don// 'jig rten kun du de song ste// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// yi ge'i rang bzhin rnam bkra ba// rang gis 'gro ba snang byas te// slar
41b5: yang 'ongs nas rang gnas su/ / 'jug pa ru ni yongs su brtag/ ji srid phyogs kun song ba yi// yi ge kha ru rab tu 'jug/ lus la lus can gyi gzugs brnyan// sems kyi phyag rgya legs par bsam// de nas sgra dang
41b6: yi ge ni/ lte bar song ste yongs su gnas// lte ba ru ni pad ma mchog/ pad mar rdo rje dri med mdzes// de yi steng du rung chen po// rab tu 'phro ba nyid du gnas// de las 'bar ba'i rnam pa'i sgra// brang gi gnas nas yongs
41b7: su byung / / slar yang mgrin par song nas su// rdo rje lce la yang dag reg/ 'gram pa sbyar ba'i dbus su ni// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dri ma med// kha ba bzho ltar dkar 'od// bcud len bdud rtsi'i thigs pa 'dra// rdo rje lce ni mtha' dag
41b8: rnams/ / yang dang yang du gsal bar byed// ting nge 'dzin gyi rtsar son te// slar yang snying kha nyid du song // thig le las ni gug skyed gyur// gug skyed ri mo ring po can// cha shas rnam bzhi 'dus pa las// de ni yi ger rnam par shes// yi
42a1: ge las ni sgra skye zhing / / sgra las nAd da las dbyungs// dbyangs las dag tu rnam par 'gyur// yi ge las ni cha shas tshogs// tshig rkang dang ni ngag tu 'gyur// tshig rkang las ni tshigs bcad dang // de bzhin du ni gA thA dang //
42a2: phreng 'dzin rgyud chags de bzhin te// 'di ltar sngags dang rig sngags dang // rang gi snying por rab 'jug 'gyur// de nas bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor re// blo gros ldan pas brtan byas te// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // dbang du
42a3: byas te bsgrub par bya/ / bzlas pa 'di yi sbyor ba yis// thams cad du ni brtan par bya// yid bzhin gyi ni dag 'grub bo// rmad byung mchog tu rnyed dka' ba'i// yang na lha ni gzhan pa yi// ngag 'grub thams cad skyob rnams
42a4: kyai/ yi ge gcig pa gsang chen po// ngag gi sgrub thabs mchog tu dge/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// rang snying zla bar rdo rje che// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// de las
42a5: bstan bcos thams cad ni/ / nges pa 'don pa nyid du bya// ngag gi sgrub ye shes 'dis// thams cad mkhyen pa thob par byed// bstan bcos thams cad rab 'don cing // de nyid kyang ni 'chad par byed// sems can kun gyis thams
42a6: cad du/ / dngos po cung zad gang bsams pa// de dag thams cad rnam shes te// skad cig tsam la smra bar byed// rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba las ngag gi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
42a7: pa rnams thams cad slar yang 'dus nas/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs chen po mchog gi dbang phyug la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi
42a8: mdzod kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i sgrub pa'i thas cad bka' stsal du gsol/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas de de bzhin no zhes bka' stsal nas de nas bcom ldan 'das
42b1: kun nas 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi rgyal po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi mdzod kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rim par phye ba'i cho ga rgyas pa bka' stsal pa/ / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'khor los sgyur
42b2: ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ / 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'am yang na// rtsibs bcu drug par rnam par bri// lte bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgod// 'khor lo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyad// mtha' ru rin chen rnam pa bdun// mkhas pa yis ni
42b3: spel bar bya/ / de yi lte bar bdag nyid ni// 'khor los sgyur ba stobs po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen po// chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i mchog/ de yi phyag rgya bgrang las 'das// skad cig ma ni nyid la 'thor// 'gro ba
42b4: thams cad snang byas nas/ / sngags kyi dbang phyug nyid la gzhug/ 'khor lo'i dngos grub gzi brjid che// 'khor los sgyur bar bdag nyid 'gyur// chung dang che dang dbang phyug dang // rang dbang 'dod dgur spyod pa dang // kun du 'gro ba
42b5: nyid dang ni/ / kun gyi dbang phyug phun tshogs 'bras// rga dang 'chi ba med thob cing // nges par 'khor los sgyur dang mtshungs// gser gyi 'khor lo ngan po che// de bzhin dngul dang shel nyid dang // me tog can gyi lcags kyang rung //
42b6: rang gi lag gis bzung nas su// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya// 'khor los sgyur ba gzi brjid che// mtshan rnams kyis ni rnam par brgyan// de ltar bdag nyid bsgoms na ni/
42b7: 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du 'gyur// de la de'i sngags kyi tshig tu gyur pa ni// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga toSh+Ti Sha a ba lo ki ta/ muSh+Ti tsakra wirti dz+wa la dz+wa la d+hu na bi d+hA na trA sa ya mA ra ya/ uts+tsha da ya ha na b+hany+dza s+tho khi ni kuN Da li ni a ba rA
42b8: dzitri sta d+hA ri Ni/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM oM a pa rA dzi tI d+hika sA hA snying po'o// na maHsa man/ bud d+hA nA a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM a ba rA dzi tA d+hi ka sAhA/ cho ga'i snying po'o// khor los sgyur/
43a1: pa rang grub ste// sangs rgyas nyid kun thob na ni// ye shes tshe dang stobs dang shugs// yang na dbang phyug dam pa kun// dpa' bo thams cad ster byed na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// 'khor los sgyur ba'i/
43a2: sgrub pa'i thabs so// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// nam mkha' la ni yongs su bsgom// gzi brjid phung po ye shes che// sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur// gnyis su med 'byung sems kyi mchog/ dkyil 'khor mchog
43a3: tu chad 'byung ba/ / de ni me yir shes par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// de yang 'khor lo 'dzin rgyal po// 'khor los sgyur ba legs 'bar ba// de la de bzhin rin chen bdun// 'khor lo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan
43a4: 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ / nyi ma ring bkra shis bsgom// gzi brjid phung po sku chen po// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba// 'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs dpa' bo ni// snang ba shar blta bur gnas// de yi phyag rgya
43a5: rtag tu bsam/ / nam mkha'i rnam par legs par gnas// chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pa// 'od zer phreng bas rnam par khyab// de dang bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgom// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// kun du kun nas thams
43a6: cad du/ / dngos po kun las 'byung bar 'gyur// ye shes tshe dang stobs dang shugs// kun du 'gro ba nyid dang ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad nyid dag dang / rdo rje can kun/ di dang ni gzi rdzi mchog kun po gyur nas// zi brji phung po 'dra bar 'gyur// de la sngags kyi
43a7: tshig tu gyur pa ni/ / oM ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a na ba lo ka ti mu rti te dzo rA shi dz+wa la dz+wa la d+haka/ d+ha ka/ da rad ra/ bini da bin da tA hUM phaT phaT swAhA// rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM te dze rA saM swA hA/ snying po'o// oM dz+wal te dze rA si hUM phaT swA hA// nye
43a8: snying po'o/ / dag pa'i sngags tshig 'di rnams kyis// nyi mi'i ye shes rab tu gsal// kun tu 'gro ba bsgrub par bya// rig po 'dzin pa nyid thob 'gyur// gzi brjid phung po'i gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// // kun nas snang ba /
43b1: bya mchog/ yi ge gsum pa stobs po che// gser gyi kha dog legs 'bar zhing // gtsug tor steng son 'od gsal ba// sngags pa rang bdag gis bsgom bya// kun nas snang ba lta bur 'gyur// oM AHhUM gsang sngags rtse mo dam
43b2: pa 'di/ / sgom pa tsam gyis thams cad du// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi// 'gro kun kun nas snang bar 'gyur// kun nas snang ba'i gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// chos kyi 'khor lo phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par
43b3: bzhag pas bsgom/ / sangs rgyas kun nyid kun gyi mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor byed// 'khor lo 'di ni rtsibs bcu gnyis// rtsibs bcu gnyis pa yongs su gnas// rnam gsum gsum ni yongs bskor ba//
43b4: bya ba'i don du dag pa ster// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku chen po// nam mkha'i khrugs na gnas pa ste// chos kyi dbyings ni khyab pa ni// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom// 'gro ba brtan dang g.yo ba ni// 'di kun rten
43b5: cing 'brel 'byung ba/ / 'di ni chos kyi phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// de yi sngags su gyur pa ni// oM d+hA na bA ta ya Nen+ta tsakre Na/ badz+ri Ni hUM/ gsang sngags 'di ni dpal ldan mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo
43b6: gnyis med 'chang / / skad cig tsam gyis thams cad du// dam pa'i chos ni rab skor byed// chos kyi 'khor lo sgrub pa'i thabs so// pad ma rA ga'i rnam pa 'dra// sangs rgyas sku gzugs legs 'bar ga/ rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mchog
43b7: bsgrubs na/ / nyon mongs rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// snying gnas rdo rje gzugs brnyan 'dra// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// de yi snying la rdo rje me// dri ma med pa skyes par 'gyur// nyon mongs rtag tu yongs zad cing // dgra
43b8: rnams kun las rgyal bar byed/ / bden pa bzhi ni rtogs pas na// bden pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur// sngags ni oM kle sha e sa ni hUM phaT/ 'di ni nyon mongs rdo rje'i sngags// drag cing drag po'i gzhan gnon pa'o// sangs rgyas
44a1: nyid kyang ster byed na/ / dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// nyon mongs rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs so// // dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas rang bzhin stobs po che// bdud bzhi las ni rnam
44a2: rgyal ba/ legs par mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom// bden pa bzhi yi khu tshur che// lus dang ngag deng de bzhin yid// khu tshur sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gnyis med skye ba'i mtshan nyid de// rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom par bya// rang nyid
44a3: sangs rgyas yin no zhes/ / brtan dang g.yo ba'i 'gro ba ni// 'di dag thams cad ma skyes par// rdo rje khu tshur pa sgoms na ni// rdo rje khu tshur 'dra bar 'gyur// de la sngags su gyur pa ni// oM bi dza ye haHde bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur che//
44a4: shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba// sngags pas rtag tu bsgoms na ni// shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'thob// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// // dngos po thams cad gyen 'phags pa// gdod
44a5: nas zhi zhing mtshan nyid med/ / sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku chen po// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su'o// rdo rje rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsgom// 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis// 'di yis 'jig rten thams cad kyi// 'khor los skur ba nyid du ni// 'jig
44a6: rten kun gyi thams cad du/ / kun nas phun sum tshogs pa kun// bkug nas gus pas sbyin par bya// sngags ni oM dz+wa la dz+wa la byi bya ud ga toSh+NI Sha d+hun d+hu na hU~M// steng 'gro'i gtsug tor zhes bya bar// sangs rgyas dpa' bo kun gyis
44a7: gsungs/ / 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' min// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// sangs rgyas rang bzhin phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas
44a8: bsgom/ / tshad skyob gdugs dkar chen po ni// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// zla ba'i kha dog cher 'bar zhing // chu yi dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa// dri med pun da ri kar gnas//
