65b3: chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje gzi brjid zhes su grags// rdo rje nyi mas blo gros ldan// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar bya// de yi nang
65b4: du bri bya ba/ / rdo rje nyi ma 'od chen po// rdo rje nyi ma'i steng du ni// gru gsum rnam pa las byung ba// de yi dbus su gzi brjid che// 'bar ba yi ni me lta bu// pad ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// ze 'bru yi sa ni shan du mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni// rdo rje gzi brji
65b5: stobs po che/ / bzang po'i mtshan dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// rgya skyegs khu ba mtshungs pa'i mdog/ phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o// de yi sngags su yongs grags pa// kun nas sangs rgyas mtshungs pa nyid// dbyangs
65b6: yig bcu gcig pa yi mtha'/ / nyi mi'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sngags kyi phreng bas yongs su bskor// rang gi phyag rgya'i mtshan ma ldan// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya// rdo rje gzi brjid dkyil
65b7: 'khor ro/ / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan ming // bdag nyid chen po rdo rje'i tog/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan//
65b8: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// mchog tu 'bar ba yi ni rlung // zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa 'dra// rin chen rgyal mtshan yongs bsgreng ba// de yi dbus su sems dpa' che// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// zhal
66a1: bzhi pa la gzi brjid che/ / in dra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od// rin chen char pa rab tu 'bebs// phyag bzhi pa la snang ba che// de yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che// sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la// me yis rab tu gsal byas pa// tog gi phyag rgyas
66a2: yongs su bskor/ / sngags kyi phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris na ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya// rdo rje tog gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya pa// rdo rje ba na bzhi
66a3: grags pa/ / rdo rje bzhad pa mtshungs pa'i 'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de dbus zlum po ni// in dra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od/
66a4: de bzhin chu ni gzi brjid can// phyag rgya 'khor los rnam par mdzes// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// ston ka'i zla ba 'dra ba'i 'od// 'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa//
66a5: dbang phyug thams cad yang dag ldan// de yi gsang sngags gsang chen po// rgyu yi don du bsgrub par bya// stong pa mngon brjod bsam mi khyab// rang ming rtogs pas mtshan pa'o// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab
66a6: mchod bya/ / rdo rje bzhad pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya // gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dngos grub dkyil 'khor yang dag gi/
66a7: de yi steng du'ang pad ma che// pad ma me las yang dag byung // gru gsum mchog tu mdzes pa po// sum mdo ris kyis rnam par brgyan// chos dbyings yi ge'i de kho na// thams cad gzi brjid bdag nyid dge/ de yi bdag gi de nyid ni// 'phro ba'i
66a8: mar ka ta 'dra/ / phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// gnyis pa'i mdog tu gyur pa ni// pad ma rA ka mtshungs pa'i 'od// ji srid dag gi 'khor lo ni// smra ba'i dbye bar rab tu gnas// thams cad so sor gsal bar byed//
66b1: sprin gyi dkyil 'khor mchog rmad byung // de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya// rdo rje smra ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mcho// yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ dkyil 'khor snga mi'i sbyor ba yis//
66b2: dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// de yi dbus su go cha che// rin chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de yi dbus su brtson chen po// rdo rje bsrung ba yang dag bri// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// kha dog sna tshog
66b3: gzi brjid che/ / thams cad bsrung ba mchog tu dge/ phyag rgya sngags dang yang dag ldan// gsang ba chen po'i go 'phang mchog/ de yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che// sha Sha'i sde yi mthar gnas mchog/ mgon po'i rgyur ni mngon par brjod//
66b4: steng du na das brgyan par byas// kun nas kha dog du ma yis// yongs su bskor bar bsgom par bya// sngags kyi phreng ba yongs su ldan// glog gi phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mchod pa thams cad rab
66b5: bsgrub pa/ / rdo rje bsrung ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// // de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta thabs bzhis ni mdzes par bya// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// khu tshur dkyil
66b6: 'khor bri bar bya/ / dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// rdo rje pad ma yid 'ong ba// gzi brjid chen po gsar gyi mdog/ 'ad ba ma brgyad pa yid 'ong ba// de yi steng du gzi brjid che// rdo rje khu tshur stobs po che// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhig//
66b7: sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa po// kun da dung dang zla ba dkar// khu tshur de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// sku dang gsung dang thugs khu tshur// rdo rje nyid du mnyam nyid mchog/ gnyis su med pa mchog gsal ba// khu tshur gyis ni sdud par ba'/
66b8: de sngags mchog tu dga' ba ni// brjod du med nyid stsol mdzad pa// sde tshan lba ba'i gsum pa ni// 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i sku// 'di yi sngags la rnam par gnas// de lta'i dkyil 'khor
67a1: bris nas ni/ rdo rje khu tshur mchod par bya// rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor ro// // de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar ba ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// sangs rgyas byang chub stsol bar
67a2: mdzad/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'jig rten pa yi dkyil 'khor mchog/ de bzhin gru bzhir bris nas ni// sgo khyud la sogs rnam par spang // rtse gsum ban+ti sa dang ni// dung dang pad ma sogs pas brgyan// thog mar dbang phyug chen po dgod
67a3: rtsa gsum pa yi phyag rgyar ldan/ / khyu mchog la zhon ma gi gsum pa// stag gi lpags gyon phyag bzhi pa// thal bas byugs shing mgo bo'o// ral pa'i tshogs ni rab 'phyang ba// chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
67a4: la/ / phyag 'tshal ba ni 'di bri'o// de'i sngags ni// oM tI sa suM hUM phaT// gsang sngags 'di na che ra gsang ba// bdag nyid chen po dbang phyug che'i// dbang phyug chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor chen po de nyid la dbang byug chen po'i
67a5: gnas su nag po chen po gzhag par bya'o/ / lag pa stong gis gar byed pa dang // ldan pa'i dga' byed dbang phyug dang lhan gcig phyag bzhi pa spyan gsum pa'o// lag pa stong gis gnas pa'o// rang gi sngags ni// oM ma hA kA la hU~M b+h+yo
67a6: oM nan di ke shwa ra hU~M b+h+yo/ 'di bzlas na dngos grub thams cad byed do// dga' byed dbang phyug dang // nag po chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nyid kyi ni tshi ga yis// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi thig gdab bya// der ni pad ma yang dag bri// pad ma'i dbus su
67a7: sbrang rtsi byed/ / la sogs ming po gsum bri'o// gzhu yi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin// sbrang rtsi byed dang rgyal ba byed// de bzhin nyid du'ang sgrub byed// me tog mda' dang yongs su ldan// rang gi ming rtogs mtshan ma can// sngags ni/ oM ra d+hu krid
67a8: sno oM swA oM d+ha na swa/ gsang sngags 'di ni 'dod gzugs can// dbang du byed pa thams cad sgrub// sbrang rtsi rdo rje la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor re// kyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bris nas dbus su thig bzhi gdab bo/ dbus su tum bu ru'o// shar gyi 'dab mar
67b1: rgyal ba'o/ / lho ru rnam par rgyal ba'o// ba du mi thub pa'o// byang du gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o// de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor bris nas go rims ji lta ba bzhin du gsang sngags dgod par bya'o// oM trai bu ru trAM/ oM dza ye hUM/ oM bi dza ye hUM/ oM a dziH/
67b2: hUM/ oM a pa rA dzi te trA~M// dga' ba 'di dag lag g.yon du// khu tshur g.yon pas rab grub stsol// 'di yi phyag rgya nyid gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtags// lag par dgod pa rab bshad bya// go rims ji lta ba bzhin du/ dum
67b3: bu run mthe bor dgod/ / bsdigs mdzub la ni rgyal ba gnas// rnam rgyal gung mo nyid la'o// mi thub de bzhin ming med la// gzhan gyis mi thub mthe chung la// lag pa'i dbus su yi ge oM// dgod bye de nyid lag pa'i rgyab// rdo rje phreng bal
67b4: mthar thug tu/ / dgod par bya ba mchog tu bshad// sbyor dang rnam par dbye ba yang // phyag rgya kun spyod yongs su bsdu// so sor bstan par bya ba nyid// sor mo rnams la khyad par du// dbang dang dgug dang rmongs la sogs// rengs byed
67b5: la sogs go rims bzhin/ / las rnams dag ni thams cad du// sngags pas mnyam par gzhag ste bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal
67b6: 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mtshan rnams kyis legs par mdzad de// bcom ldan 'das mnyes par mdzad pa// byang chub sems ni rdo rje cha// sangs rgyas bzhin gshegs pa kun/
67b7: dgra bcom 'dod chags bral ba dang // legs pa chos kyi 'byung gnas mchog/ blo gros dag pa ye shes che// thams cad mkhyen pa kun rig mchog/ mchog gi dbang phyug dpa' bo che// thog ma tha ma med khyab bdag/
67b8: ma 'dres ma 'dres pa yi don// shin tu phra ba mchog sbyin rgyal// rdo rje can chen rnal 'byor che// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/ mi bskyod pa dang mi zad mgon// chos dbyings gzhan dang gzhan min pa// rin chen 'byung gnas
68a1: rdo rje mchog/ dbang bskur kun gyi bla ma'i zla// theg chen che ba'i mchog gi mchog/ dpa' bo mchog tu dpa' ba'i mchog/ zab cing yangs la phra ba dang // thams cad thams cad de bzhin gshegs// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po//
68a2: che// tshad skyob dkar po stobs po che// gzi brjid phung po gzi brjid che// phul byung phul las phul du byung // rgyu med mchog gi mchog dpa' mchog/ gzimachog gzi brjid byed mtshungs pa// rgyal ba rgyal ba mchog nyid dang // legs pa'i rgyal
68a3: po bdag nyid che/ / rdo rje sems dpa' sems chen po// rdo rje rgyal po lcags kyu cha// rdo rje chags pa mda' chen po// rdo rje legs pa legs grub mdzad// rdo rje rin chen che mchog mchog/ rdo rje gzi brjid legs brjid mdzad// rgyal mtshan chen
68a4: po rini chen tog/ rdo bzhad pa legs bzhad mdzad// 'jig rten dbang phyug pad ma che// shes rab ye shes legs rno mdzad// chos kyi 'khor lo chos chen po// sems dpa' smra ba legs bzhad mdzad// sna tshogs las ni rgyal po che// rdo rje
68a5: bsrung ba legs bsrung mdzad/ / khro bo chen po gnod sbyin che// rdo rje mtshams sbyor mtshams sbyor sel// phyag 'tshal sangs rgyas kun khyod la// dang po'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/ legs so rdor can rnal 'byor che// de bzhin gshegs//
68a6: pathams cad dge snying po'i rgyan zhes mtshan gsol pa// 'di dag thams cad legs par gsungs// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub sems// ye shes snying po shin du mdzes// gsang ba chen po mchog tu gasrung // swa bya shin tu rnyed dka' ba
68a7: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mdo/ / brjod du med cing yi ge bral// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rgyas pa 'di yongs su rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan
68a8: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol pa btab bo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
68b1: chen pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das ma yang snyoms par zhugs so// de nas
68b2: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po 'di skad ces nyid la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes rdo rje la zhugs par gyur to/ / gas nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
68b3: kyi snying po shes rab ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin gsal bar mdzad cing brtan par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs de las 'thon te/ / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa ma lus shing lus pa
68b4: med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad nas sems can thams cad kyi'ang shes rab dang ye shes rnam par sbyangs te/ / byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas bkug cing rjes su mnyes par byas nas legs par mdzad nas rnam par
68b5: gnas te/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin legs par yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas mngon par dbang bskur te gzi brjid dang / tog dang / bzhad pa dang // de dag la nges par sbyar te mchog gi dbang phyug chen po las rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
68b6: chos rtogs pa la yang rab tu gnas nas rnon po dang / rgyu dang smra ba'i sems dpa' rnams la'ang thugs brtan par mdzad de yongs su dag nas yang pad mo'i sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin la rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i dbang phyug chos nyid gzhi med pa
68b7: la sbyar nas sna tshogs pa'i las kyi bdag po dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa bsrung ba dang khro bo dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje mtshams sbyor ba rnams sems can gyi khams mtha'
68b8: ngag yongs su smin pa dang byin gyis brlabs te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs khar rjes su zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes la bzhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o/
69a1: la// zag med shes rab ba dag/ sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi// shes rab shin du dri med sems// sems dpa'i lus su bdag gyur to// dri med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dngos dang dngos med rnam dpyad na// e ma'o chos ni bsam
69a2: med nyid/ / bdag gi dbang du rnam par gnas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kha nas 'thon nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug gi lus su mngon par sprul te// bcom ldan 'das rnam par
69a3: s nasngang mdzad la yongs su bskor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nye 'khor kun du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang byin gyis brlabs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi
69a4: dbang phyug chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mdor bstan pa'i chos kyi tshig bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'jam dpal
69a5: gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni legs so// legs so// legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
69a6: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsal pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhin ning gi lus dang / phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi
69a7: rjes su blta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// lus la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su blta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la
69a8: zad pa'i rjes su blta zhing rnam par spyod do/ / lus la mi gnas pa'i rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do// nang gi tshor ba dang phyi'i tshor ba dang phyi ning gi tshor ba dang / nang gi sems dang / phyi'i sems dang / phyi nang gi sems
69b1: dpa nang gi chos dang / phyi'i chos dang / byi nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su blta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par gsal cing rnam par
69b2: spyod do/ / chos la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su blta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la zad pa'i rjes su blta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la mi gnas pa'i rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do// rtag tu shes rab kyi pha rol
69b3: hUM phyin pa lus dang / ngag dang / sems dang / chos mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas so// oM k+Sha/ oM tsat+tA ra smr-i tu bas+tha nA nA hU~M/ yang dag par spod pa bzhi ni sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
69b4: 'dun pa skyed cing stsol lo/ / brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems rab tu 'dzin to// smon lam yang dag par 'debs so// sdig to mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa la sogs pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams
69b5: skyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed do/ / 'bad do brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems rab tu 'dzin to// smon lam yang dag par 'debs so// dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing rgyas par bya ba dang / yangs par bya ba'i phyir dang / bsgom pa yod
69b6: su rdzogs pa'i phyir 'dun po skyed do/ / 'bad do brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems rab tu 'dzin to// smon lam yang dag par 'debs so// chos rnams thams cad don dam par mi spong ba dang / mi spong ba ma yin pa'i ched du rtogs par
69b7: bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos 'di skad bka' stsal to/ / oM sa myaka pra hA Na sarba ta thA ga tA sa ma tA ma d+hiSh+Tha aHraHhUM/ yang dag par spong brjod pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
69b8: sgo'o/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom par byed do// brtson 'grus dang sems dang / spyod pa'i ting 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
70a1: sgom par byed de/ / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa don dam pa dang // kun rdzob kyi sgo'i chos thams cad sgyu ma sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du 'jug go zhes bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bas bka' stsal to//
70a2: oM r-i d+hi p+tad bA ra mi tel ba pa ra hU~M hUM/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// dbang po lnga ni dang pa'i dbang po dang // brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang
70a3: po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la dbang sgyur bas spros pa med pa'i dbang po 'di dag bka' stsal to// oM in dra yA ba b+ho d+ha pradz+nye i sheny+dza nA man+tana?
70a4: yag tA ya AHhUM/ dbang po mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// stobs lnga ni dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang // shes rab kyi stobs so zhes
70a5: ka' stsal to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa stobs thams cad rtogs pa// spros pa thams cad dang thab gdo mnas dgapas 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA ba la aHhUM hUM baH stobs 'phel ba
70a6: zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi ni// byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms so// oM brah+ma b+hi hA rA d+hiSh+ThA na kau maM druk+Sha hU~M trAM/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi
70a7: pha rol du phyin pa 'di bka' stsal to/ / tshangs pa'i gnas pa byin gyis rlob pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / don so so yang dag par rig pa
70a8: dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du so so yang dag par rig pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bka' stsal to// oM pra ti sam+bi daHswa hUM/ shes rab kyi tha
70b1: rol du phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/ / rjes su dran pa drug gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa'o//
70b2: chos thams cad gcig tu rjes su dran pa ni chos thams cad don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid med pa rnam par spyod pas mnyam pa nyid kyi sgo zhes bya ba 'di ting nge 'dzin la dbang sgyur bas bka' stsal to// oM
70b3: sarba a nu smi ti bu d+hi saM ba dA di shi hUM hU~M hUM/ rjes su dran pa drug gi shes rab po// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang // brtson 'grus/
70b4: yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang // dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang // shin du sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang // btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/
70b5: byang chub kyi yan lag mnyam pa nyid skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa paka' sum to// oM sar+b+ba tA sad+ha bo d+h+r-i ga sa ma hA su pra tiSh+Thi te dru gi 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /
70b6: yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i dag dang // yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang // yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i stsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang // yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// lam zad mi shes pa'i byang chub kyi
70b7: sems chen po la 'jug pa legs par so sor rig pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so/ / oM Ar+yASh+TAM ga mArga mA Da/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// ting nge 'dzin
70b8: gsum ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang / gsog dang gsob kyi rnam pa dang / rang bzhin med pa'i rnam pas chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu/
71a1: rtogs pa sems rtse gcig pa ste/ 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces brjod do// de la mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ gang la mtshan mar mi byed pa dang / 'dod pa med pa dang / shes pa med pa dang / zhi
71a2: ba'i rnam pa dang / rnam par bral ba'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa sems rtse gcig/
71a3: pa ste de ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// chos thams cad rtogs nas smon par mi byed de// lha 'am lha las gzhan gad yang rung ba don du mi gnyer zhing gsol ba 'debs par yang mi 'dod pa ste/ dngos po thams cad
71a4: lating nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo yis kyang ngo / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis ting rin gyi sgo gsum nye bar rtogs par bya'o// o la mA d+ha r+m+ma 'dis stos tsu nas dag na ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i deb sa dag las kyi rnam par smin
71a5: mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa so sor mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas/
71a6: rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mngon par shes pa lnga mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / zag pa dang zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid so sor rtogs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
71a7: oM sha pa la sa ma te thA/ stobs bcu mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes
71a8: dad ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ / bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna
71b1: tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las
71b2: yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par tha pa lnga pa / te rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zang
71b3: ma yod de zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ / de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs
71b4: gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ / rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa
71b5: brgyad pa'o/ / chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa/ bsam gtan med cing bsam gtan med pa ma yin pa dang // snyoms par 'jug pa med pa ma yin pa 'di bka' stsal to// oM sa man+ta/
71b6: b+ha dre sarba thA ba pi shud d+he d+haM Sha khaM gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang / bral ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na chos 'di rnams
71b7: mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan ci yang rung ste 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par
71b8: rjes su ma mthong ste rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas de la bdag med pa thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra
72a1: bsgrag go/ / tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge slong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// bdag zag pa zad/
72a2: de zhes dam bcas nas de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su'ang rung ste// 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//
72a3: gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la brten na bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro// gang yang bdag gi lam 'phags pa'i nges par 'byung ba'i lam du bshad pa de yis nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur te
72a4: dag par sdug bsngal zad pa dang / yang dag par sdug bsngal mthar bya bar gal 'gyur zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am// lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu
72a5: yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba la sogs pa ji ltar gyur pa thams cad yongs su spros te brjod par bya'o/ / mi 'jigs pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid de dar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro// oM bai shar
72a6: sa ma tA prA p+ta a A/ aM AHmthar gyis gnas pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'dod pas dben pa sdig tomi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga'
72a7: ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes
72a8: pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms su gnas te/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin can bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis
72b1: del dran pa dang ldan pa'i bde bal rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi
72b2: bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med/ btang snyoms pa dang / dran pa yongs su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das
72b3: te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha'
72b4: yas skye mched la yang dag par 'das te rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung
72b5: zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de
72b6: rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med mni skye mchod las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad po dang mnyam pa nyid rjes su thob nas dngos
72b7: por rtog par mi byed/ / dngos po med par rtog par mi byed/ chos thams cad gnyis su med par rtogs so// 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mnyam pa nyid do// oM a na n+taHbi mo k+Sha mu khe shaM/ dngos po thams cad
72b8: mthar gyis gnas pa'i rnam par thar pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / de la pha rol du phyin pa bcu gang zhen 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du
73a1: phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
73a2: thabs kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / spros pa med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i don gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi do /
73a3: gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pad ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / las kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa te/ brtan pa'i rjes su rtogs pa'i
73a4: sbyor bas so/ / oM sarba bA ra mi ta a r+yA pa ri pU ra Ni/ oM prA hAM taM/ thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de las bcu po gang zhe na/ rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i sa dang / dri ma med pa zhes bya ba dang / 'od byed
73a5: pa zhes bya ba dang / 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba dang / spyad dka' ba zhes bya ba dang / mngon du gyur pa zhes bya ba dang / ring du song ba zhes bya ba dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi sprin zhes bya ba dang / sa thams cad don
73a6: gcig ste 'di ltar ye shes kyi don to/ / ye shes kyang ci yang med pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ yi ge med pa/ don yod pa/ gdod ma nas dag pa/ dra ma med pa/ 'od gsal brjod pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i don to// oM b+ha mi bi sho d+ha na sar+b+baR+sha pa ri bA ra Ni paM b+h+yAM
73a7: sa yongs su spyong ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po skyed pa dang / gzhon nur gyur pa dang las dang po pa dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dang / ska ba nas
73a8: skye bar sbyor ba dang ldan pa dang / bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par gnas pa dang / mi gnas pa dor ba ste/ don dam par gnas pa gcig yin
73b1: pa'i phyir te 'di ltar gnas pa med pa'o/ / oM sarba bya ba stan bi ga ste hU~M/ rnam par gnas pa med pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang bcu gang zhe na tshe la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / yo
73b2: byad la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang po'o// dbang ba dang mi dbang ba rang bzhin gyis
73b3: rnam par grol ba thams cad la dbang ba dbang phyug thams cad la dbang rjes su thob pa/ chos thams cad legs par so sor rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro// oM sar+b+ba pa shi te trA hU~M hU~M/ thams cad la dbang ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de
73b4: la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o// rba co mi mnga'o// dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga'o// thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa mi mnga'o// 'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga'o// ma brtags pa'i btang
73b5: snyoms mi mnga'o/ / 'dun pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// dran pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// /
73b6: rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// 'das pa'i dus la mthogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs
73b7: pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // gsung gi phrin las thams cad
73b8: ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste ye shes kyi rjes su 'brad do/ / thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // 'di chos rjes smra ba'i sgrar 'phro lags// // rgya dpe la gtugs shing slob dpon rab zhi bshes
74a1: gnyen gyi 'grel pa dang yang bsnun nas/ zhus dag byas shing / mi bcos su mi rung ba re re tsam 'grel pa dang bstun nas bcos shing zhu thug g.yar khral du blangs nas/ bu ston gyis bgyis pa'o// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'
74a2: la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de las bcu rnams ci zhe na/ rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i sa dang dri ma med pa zhes bya ba dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba dang / 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba dang / thub par dka' ba zhes bya ba dang / mngon du gyur ba zhes bya ba dang / ring du song ba
74a3: zhes bya ba dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros shes bya ba dang / chos kyi sprin zhes bya ba'o// sa rnams thams cad don gcig pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ ye shes kyi don no// ye shes kyang don dam par ci yang med pa nyon mongs pa med pa 'gyur ba med pa
74a4: don yod pa gdod ma nas dag pa dri ma med pa 'od gsal brjod du med pa'o zhes pa'i don gang yin pa'o/ / oM b+hU mi bi sho d+ha ni san+na rU pa ri pU ra Ni baM b+h+rUM/ sa yongs su spyod pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
74a5: kyi rnam par gzhag pa bcu rnams ci zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa dang byis par gyur pa dang / las dang po po dang rnal 'byor spyod pa dang skye bskyed pa dang sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / phyir
74a6: mi ldog pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa ni don dam par na rnam par gzhag pa dang bral ba ste/ rnam par gzhag pa gcig nyid kyi phyir na 'di lta ste/ rnam par
74a7: gzhag pa med pa'o/ / oM sar+b+ba bya bas+thA na bi ga to hUM/ rnam par gzhag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang bcu rnams ci zhe na/ tshe la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang /
74a8: mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / stobs la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba'o// dbang rnams thams cad kyang don dam par dbang med pa rang bzhin rnam par dben
74b1: pa kun rdzob tu dbang phyug thams cad la dbang rjes su thob pa ste chos legs par so sor rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ / oM sanA ba shi tit+taM b+h+rUM hUM/ dbang thams cad pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres papar
74b2: brgyad rnams ci zhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa dang / ca co med pa dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / thugs mnyam ze ro ma gzhag pa med pa dang / tha dad pa nyid kyi 'du shes med pa dang / so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang /
74b3: 'dun pa nyams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba nyams pa med cing rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa nyams
74b4: pa med pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa dang / da ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzig pa 'dug pa dang / sku'i
74b5: phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / yid kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'bra
74b6: pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni yul thams cad du/ dus thams cad kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa ste/ stong pa nyid la yang dag par rjes su rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir na shes rab yongs su dag pa'o// oM A we
74b7: Ni ka bu d+hud+d+had+ha r+b+ba sam te AHbI ra hUM baM/ ma 'dres pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis rnams ci zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor los mtshan pa nyid de 'di'i phyag dang zhab
74b8: kyi mthil dag la 'khor lo rtsibs stong can lte ba dang bcas pa mu khyud dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ / phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil legs par gnas pa ste zhabs kyi mthil thams cad kyis sa gzhi la reg cing de yang 'di'i mtho ba ni dma'
75a1: pa dang dam 'a ba ni mtho ba'o/ / phyag dang zhabs kyi sor ma dang pa'i rgyal po lta bur dra bas 'brel ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phyag dag dang / zhabs de dag gser gyi mdog can gyi ri mo'i phreng ba rnams kyis rkang pa brgyad pa bzhin du
75a2: mdzes pa'o/ / phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon shachags pa nyid de// bcom ldan 'das 'di'i phyag dang zhabs dag ras bal 'jam po bzhin dang / skyes nas zla ba lon pa'i byis pa bzhin du gzhon sha can dang / kA tsa li ni da ltar 'jam pa reg na bde ba'o// bdun
75a3: mtho bar 'gyur te phyag gnyis dag dang / zhabs gnyis dag dang / phrag gong dag dang / mgrin pa'i phyogs gcig go// sor mo ring ba ste 'di'i zhabs kyi sor mo rnams rim gyis ring ba nyid do// rting pa yangs pa ste 'di'i rting ba che zhing zhabs kyi rjes su 'tsham par
75a4: yangs par 'gyur ro/ / sku che zhing drang ba nyid de 'phye bo ma yin zhing zhom pa ma yin/ ma tshang ba ma yin 'thas pa ma yin/ lags par skyes pa rnam pa thams cad pa bdun dang ldan pa'i sku ste mtho ba 'di'i srid dang rjes su mtsham pa'i zheng du 'gyur ro// zhabs 'bur mi mngon pa
75a5: nyid de 'di'i pus mo dang long bu mtho bar 'gyur ro/ / ba spu'i rtse mo gyen du phyogs pa ste 'di'i ba spu rnams rtse mo gyen du phyogs par 'gyur zhing ba spu rnams g.yas phyogs su 'khyil la 'khor ba mig sman gyi mdog can rnams te/ de rnams kyis gser
75a6: kyi mdog can gyi sku mngon par gsal bar byed/ / byin pa ri dgas e na ya'i lta bu ste bcom ldan 'das kyi byin pa dag zlum pa ri dgas e ne ye rnams kyi lta bu'o// phyag ring zhing mdzes pa ste rgyas shing ma btud pa nyid du phyag mthil dag gis rang gi pus
75a7: mo'i lteng la reg pa'o/ / 'doms kyi sba basbubs su nub pa ste/ sbubs kyis rab tu g.yogs pa glang po che'i gsang gnas lta bur gyur ro// sku mdog gser 'dra ba ste/ 'di'i kha dog giser lta bur 'gyur ro// pags pa srab pa ste shin tu 'jam pa gser
75a8: shog ltar 'jam pa'i pags pa can du 'gyur zhing rdul med pa'i na bza' 'dzin pa'o/ / spu re re nas skyes pa ste/ 'di'i ba spu'i khung bur spu rnams re rer 'gyur ro// smin ma'i dbus na mdzod spu can te 'di'i smin ma dag gi dbus na ras skud legs pa lta
75b1: bu dung bcag pi'i kha dog can g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bar 'gyur te/ mdzod spu nyid kyis zhal gser gyi kha dog lta bu shin du gsal bar byed do// sku stod seng ge lta bu ste/ di'i sku steng du yangs pa seng ge'i lta bur 'gyur ro// pung mgo zlum pa ste yongs su
75b2: zlum pa'i mgrin pa can du 'gyur ro/ / thal gong rgyas pa ste/ 'di'i nye bar rgyas par 'gyur zhing gser shog bzhin du rnam par gsal ba'i mgrin pa can no// yan lagaso so rnams su ro rnams myong bar byed do ces pas na/ bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa nyid de/
75b3: rtsa rnams yin la de rnams kyi mchog tu rlung dang / mkhris pa dang bdakan la sogs pa rnams kyis ma krugs pa nyid kyi phyir yang dag par gsol ba'o// shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zhe dgab pa ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mchu dang zheng dag mnyam pa'o// dbu gtsug tor
75b4: dang ldan pa ste/ dbu zlus par 'gyur zhing gtsug tor gdugs lta bus yas bkab pa gtsug tor yang shin tu mtho ba'o// ljags ring ba ste snyan gyi mtha'i bar du ljags kyi rtse mos reg par byed cing / dbu sgo'i mthar thug par yang / dpral ba'i mthar ldag
75b5: kyis khebs pa'o/ / tshangs pa'i dbyangs te 'khor stong phrag du mar dbyangs nang du ji lta ba de ltar phyi rol du'ang thos shing bya ka la bing ki'i bzhin du snyan pa nyid du 'gyur ro// 'gram pa seng ge'i lta bu ste/ 'gram ba dag seng ge'i bzhin du zlum por 'gyur ro//
75b6: tshems dkar ba ste dung dang kun da dang zla ba'i kha dog can gyi tshems rnams so// tshems mnyam pa ste ha cang dma' ba ma yin mtho ba ma yin mi mnyam pa ma yin pa'i rtse mo can gyi tshems rnams su 'gyur ro// tshems thags bzang ba ste tshems/
75b7: rnams par med pa'o// tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba ste/ tshems 'og tu nyi shu dang steng du tshems nyi shu'o// sman mgron mthing ste spyan dag gi sngon po gang yin pa de shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur te ri mo dmar po rnams dang / ma 'dres pa nyid kyi phyir
75b8: la/ gang dkar po yin pa de dkar po kho na shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// rdzi ma pa'i lta bu ste/ spyan gyi rje ma rnams khrum cho ga gi bzhin du gong 'og ma yin pa de rnams 'og kho na dang / gang steng ma yin pa de rnams snyed kho nar gnas pa ma 'dzings
76a1: pa legs par gzhol ba'o/ / sems can 'ga' zhig rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi mdog can du mthong ba 'ga' zhig rnams kyis shel gyi mdog can du mthong ba// 'ga' zhig rnams kyis pad ma rA ga'i kha dog dang ngag zhig
76a2: rnams kyis in tra nI la'i kha dog can dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis drung dang kund dang zla ba ltar dkar ba dang / 'ga' zhig gis kha dog sna tshogs pa dang / 'ga' zhig gis nam mkha'i kha dog can
76a3: dang / 'ga' zhig gis khru phyed dang bcu gsum pa'i tshad dang / ji srid du dpag tshad 'bum gyi tshad dang / dpag tshad bye ba'i tshad dang / ji srid du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'khrum rgya mtsho'i sprin mtha' yas pa rnams su snang bar mdzad pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can
76a4: dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa dang / ji srid du me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgya mtsho rnams snang bar byed cing / chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du ste/ sangs rgyas
76a5: thams cad kyi yul gdul bya'i dbang las thams cad snang bar byed cing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dbyangs kyis rnam par rig par mdzad pa dang / stong gnyis dang gsum dang / ji srid nam mkha'i mthar thug pa'i bar thams cad 'od dang dbyangs kyis
76a6: snang bar byas nas rnam par rig par mdzad pa dang / chos dang zang zing dang / don 'thun pa dang / don bya ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi rnams kyis sems can rnams la phan 'dogs shing / phan lhags nas byang chub chen po la rab tu dgod par mdzad do// skyes bu
76a7: chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis mnyam pa nyid kyis chos rnams thams cad mnyam zhing mnyam pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan mngon par bsgrub par lta'o dbang gi mtshan ma yin pa mngon par 'grub pa ni ma yin no// byang chub mtshan
76a8: nyid med pa nyid kyi phyir chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med pa ste/ 'di lta ste stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can no// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang stong pa nyid du mnyam pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub dang / chos
76b1: rnams thams cad kyang mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can/ stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can/ zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can rnams so// zhes pa'o// oM sarba tra thA gta bar la k+ShaHsa ma tAd+ham te oM mtshan thams cad
76b2: mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / dpe byad brgyad bcu rnams ci zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sen mo grangs kyi mdog lta bur gyur rten mo rlos pa dang na ma gro ba dang ben pon pas rdzu pa gyur
76b3: dang / sor mo rnams rims kyis phra ba dang / sor mo rnams rgyas pa dang / rtsa mi mngon pa dang / rnams mdud pa med pa dang / long bu mi mngon pa dang / zhabs mi mnyam pa med par mtshungs pa dang / glang po che'i skabs su gshegs pa
76b4: ngadang / seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa dang / g.yas phyogs su ldog cing gshegs pa dang / drang por gshegs pa dang / mdzes par gshegs pa dang / rim gyis gshegs pa dang / che zhing yangs la yongs su gyur pa'i pus mo'i
76b5: lha nga can dang / mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gom pa snyoms pa dang / sku rnam par dag pa dang / sku 'jam pa dang / sku rnam par dang ba dang / sku zhum pa med pa dang / sku rkub med pa dang / kun du spyod pa gtsang ba dang / khyu mchog ltar
76b6: kun nas rab tu dang ba can dang / gzigs pa yongs su dag cing mngon par 'dod pa la mnyam pa'i 'od can dang sku zlum pa dang mu skabs phyin pa dang / sku ma brnyongs pa dang / sku rked gzhu'i lag cangs lta bu dang / ste zab pa dang ste mi lo dang /
76b7: ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang / lte ba thogs pa med pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag shin du rnam par 'byes pa dang / lpags pa skyon dang bral ba dang / gnag pag dang sme ba med pa dang / sku brtan pa dang / phyag shing bal lta bu dang /
76b8: phyag yangs pa dang / phyag gi ri mo snum pa dang / phyag gi ri mo mi yo ba dang / mchu bim ba lta bu dang zhal ha cang mi ring ba dang / mnyen zhing srab la dmar ba'i ljags dang / glang po che'i nga ro can dang / snyan cing mnyen pa'i dbyangs dang
77a1: zla bun su ma tshogs pa dang / dbyangs 'jam pa dang / shangs mtho ba dang / mche bzlum pa dang / mche ba dkar ba dang / mche ba byin gyis phra ba dang / smyan gtsang ba dang / sun yangs pa dang / spyan mthon mthing dang / jim gnag pa dang / srinas sdug
77a2: pa dang / sman ma 'jam pa dang sman dkar gnag 'byes shing pang mi'i 'dab ma lta bu dang / smin tshugs ring ba dang / smin ma'i spunag pa dang / smin ma'i spu phra ba dang / smin ma rjes su 'thun pa dang / kha dog mi nyams pa dang / snyan mi mnyam pa med pa dang / snyan
77a3: skyon dang bral ba dang / dbang po thams cad mnyams shing skyon dang bral ba dang / yongs su rdzogs shing mthol mchog tu gnas pa'i zhal gdong dang / dpral ba can dang / dbu shin du rgyas pa dang / dbu sgra gnag pa dang / dbu skra sdug pa dang / dbu wa'angs
77a4: bdagang / dri shim pa dang / dbu spa mnyam pa dang / bu sgra snum pa dang / dbu sgram 'khrums pa dang / dbu skra ma 'khrugs pa dang / dngal be'u dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil bas brgyan pa dang / rgyal mtshan yang dag par gnas pa dang / dpral ba dung lta bu
77a5: dang / dbu mchog tu mtho ba dang / gtsug tor yar 'phags pa dang / dbu gdugs kyi rnam pa can dang / kun nas mdzes pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni tshad med pa'i dpe byad can mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa gsal byed dang gsal
77a6: byed ma yin pa mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa/ chos thams cad gsal byed med par mnyam pa nyid la rab tu legs par gnas pa mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad sgyu ma'i chos dang ldan pa la legs par rab tu gnas pa// dus gsum
77a7: gyidape byad mnyam pa nyid rdo rje ga bu mnyam pa nyid thob pa stong pa nyid kyi chos thams cad dang / dpe byad mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ gnyis su med pa'i don la legs par yang dag par zhugs pa rnams so zhes bya'o// oM ana? bye ny+dzanas ma ta sranga? tiSh+Ta
77a8: ta badz+ra dz+nyA na d+hU laM aM/ dpe byad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po can la legs
77b1: so zhes bya ba rnams kyis mnyes par mdzad do/ / oM byang chub sems ched khyod legs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mchog/ sangs rgyas chos ched khyod legs so// ting 'dzin dbang du 'jug pa yi/ rdo rje ye shes khyod legs so// rdo rje sems
77b2: ched khyod legs so/ / tshad med ched du khyod legs so// shes rab dam pa'i ched du yang / mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad/ sangs rgyas snga mas ma gsungs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs
77b3: pa rnams thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba bzhi yis mngon par dgyes par mdzad do/ / sangs rgyas kun khyod la phyag 'tshal// chos kyi sku yi mchog gi mchog/ gdod ma'i sngags kyi don nyid la/ rdo rje ye shes stobs chen la/ shin du sgrib med zhib
77b4: la/ rdo rje chos rnams/ legs gnas gatheg pa chen po'i go 'phang thob thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyi lha// gdod nas dag pa dpa' bo che/ dbang phyug dam pa mchog gi mchog/ dam chos mchog tu 'gyur ba med/ bde gshegs de rnams la phyag 'tshal
77b5: zhes pa'o/ / na mo sU te/ AM mA~M hU~M hU~M na mo sU te swA hA/ 'di ni brjod pa tsam zhig gis/ sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod pa'o zhes pa'o de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bos nas 'di skad ces
77b6: gsungs so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad dngos grub thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor skyed par mdzad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad slar yang 'dus pa mdzad nas
77b7: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das khyod nyid kyis rigs thams cad 'khor lo skyed par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos
77b8: gsol ba btab pa'i gsung gis de ma thag kho nar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bos te bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying po nyon cig ces te/ de nas 'di las yang dag bshad// byang chub
78a1: dkyil 'khor bla na med/ / rdo rje ye shes gsang ba mchog/ sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi'o// dben pa'i sa gzhi nyams dga' ba// me tog phreng bas rnam brgyan pa// kun du sna tshogs cha bzang ba// kun du sna tshogs sdom par ni// kun
78a2: nas sna tshogs bya ba rnams/ dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// ri yi mchog gam grong khyer ni// me tog 'bras bus rnam brgyan pa// der gnas sngags pas dngos grub mchog/ gal te 'dod na yang dag bri// gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa'i gnas/
78a3: ri ste rnams su kun nas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi bya ba rnams// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// ma mo'i gnas dang zhi ba'i gnas// dur khrod lha yi gnas su ni// rdo rje 'dzin dpal bya ba rnams// don dam par ni bsgrub par bya// pad ma'i skyed
78a4: mos tshal kun dang / / chu bo 'dus pa rnams su yang // phyag na pad ma dpal bya ba// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// rgyal po'i pho brang nyams dga' dang // rgyal po'i skyed tshal rnams su ni// rdo rje rin chen de yi ni// rin chen bya ba rnams bsgrub
78a5: bya/ / rtags gcig pa dang ba glang gnas// chu klung 'dus pa rnams su yang // sna tshogs bya ba thams cad rnams// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dang // lha rnams gnas mchog kun du'o// nam mkha' 'am
78a6: ni phyogs gzhan du/ / gang du mnyam par gzhag pa der// rtag pa bsod nams mchog gyur pa// bya ba thams cad bsgrub par bya// phyogs kun mnyam nyid gnas dkyil 'khor// shes rab can gyis thig gdab bya// shar lho nub dang byang rnams kyi//
78a7: phyogs su dkyil 'khor thig brgyad po// de yi phyi ru 'khor lo ni// kha dog lnga pa cher 'bar ba'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis mdzes pa ste// sna tshogs gos dang me tog phreng // rnga yab sogs kyis rnam brgyan pa// dkyil 'khor
78a8: kun la gnas pa yis/ / sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// sangs
78b1: rgyas gzugs brnyan bri bar bya/ / shar du bcom ldan 'khor lo can// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag ldan// 'khor lo bsgyur ba thams cad ni// sgeg par bcas pa kun bri bya// lho ru gtsug tor dkar po ni// rin chen 'bar ba yang dag ldan// gtsug
78b2: tor dkar po'i ngos su ni/ rdo rje gzi brjid la sogs bri// byang du brtson 'grus chen po ni// gzi brjid phung po stobs po che// sna tshogs rdo rje sogs bcas pa// rim pa kun nas bri bar bya// rdo rje rna la 'byor can gyis ni// dbang phrug mgon po
78b3: nub phyogs su/ / gtsug tor rgyal ba brtson 'grus che// rdo rje chos sogs dang bcas pa// thams cad sngags pas bri bar bya// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na'o// dbang ldan phyogs su 'phags pa gnas// me mtshams su ni cher
78b4: 'phags so/ / bden bral bu ni rnam rgyal nyid// rlung du de bzhin rnam 'phro ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// sems dpa' kun gyi mdun du ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// gsal zhing 'bar 'khrigs 'od zer can// mtha
78b5: pas dkyil 'khor rnams su ni/ / mchod pa rnams ni gzhag byas te// sgeg mo la sogs mchod pa che// de bzhin gzugs sgra la sogs dang // bdug pa la sogs gsang chen no// sgo skyong ba ni bzhi yin te// phyi yi dkyil 'khor gan+da
78b6: rnams su/ / kun du bzang po sogs rnams bri// de ltar dkyil 'khor bri bya ste// mchod pa byas nas snga ma bzhin// de bzhin 'jug pa sogs byas la// sgrub pa'i thabs ni brtsam par bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug sogs// dkyil 'khor/
78b7: mngon sum mthong ba las// snga ma rtag pa ji bzhin du/ phyi nas de bzhin bri bar bya// bsod nams ji bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams// thams cad mtshon gyis rab brtags pa// rang gi lhag pa'i lha ngo bos// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar gyur//
78b8: rang lha'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor gyis// dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu grub// cho ga dman dang lhag pas kyang // 'grub par 'gyur te skyon ma yin// kun du sna tshogs skal bzang pa// kun nas sna tshogs 'khor lo can// 'khor los sgyur ba
79a1: bdag nyid che/ / rin chen bdun gyi mchod pa che// yongs su rdzogs pa'i zla ba ltar// dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi 'byung shes bya// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyi// dkyil 'khor 'di ni bshad byas pa'o// phyag na pad ma bdag nyid che'i/
79a2: pad ma'i rnam par rtag shes bya// rin po che yi rin chen rnams// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs rnams pa'o// dkyil 'khor dman zhing dam tshig rnams// dor bar byas pa de nyid ni// gsang ba shes pa ma yin na// sgrub pa'i babs ni 'grub mi 'gyur// phyir 'badab
79a3: khams cad kyi/ dkyil 'khor thams cad lta ba na gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// gdon mi za bar rtag tu bya// bla ma la ni yon phul nas// rjes su rim pas bsgrub par bya// brtan pa'am ni g.yo ba yi// rdzas rnams ji snyed thams cad de//
79a4: ba me tog 'bras bu sogs// bu mo lags par brgyan byas dang // 'dod pa'i chung ma phul byas nas// slar yang rin gyis bslu bar bya// grong dang de bzhin gtsug lag khang // kun dga' la sogs rgyal srid mchog/ gang la sbyin bya nung
79a5: zad yod/ / 'tsho ba de ni sbyin par bya// bdag gi dngos po yongs gtong ba// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mched pa'o// bla ma la ni yon phul nas// gsang ba dam pa rmad byung ba// mngon par dbang skur de nas bya// 'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong
79a6: la/ / slob ma gzhag nas yan lag kun// phyag rgya kun nas bcings byas nas/ khams kun rang bzhin rtsa ba dang // sa bon 'bras bu dud pa yi// bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur te// sangs rgyas phreng ba'i dbang bskur las// spyi bo dang
79a7: ni dpral ba dang / / gzhogs dang de bzhin rgyab tu yang // sangs rgyas rin chen chen po kun// cod pan mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'o// pal ldan sangs rgyas gtsug nor bu// gdugs dkar snang na gnas pa'o// rgyal srid kun gyi dbang bskur gyis//
79a8: yang dang yang du dbang bskur bya// dpal kun gyis ni mngon mtho ba// zhes bya'i dbang bskur bshad pa'o// khams kun rang bzhin glang po dang // rta ni mchog tu 'bar ba 'am// seng ge'i gdan gnas dbang bskur ba// dpal gyi sngags ni
79b1: rjo byed ci/ dpal gyis mngon mtho zhes bya ba'i/ dam pa'i don gyi dbang bskur ba/ kra shis pa mni dpal bkra// gang yang bris nas dbang bskur ba/ sangs rgyas dpa' ba thams cad kyis// nam rgyal dang bsrung nas bshad do//
79b2: ngan nu dang bum pa che// gzhan gyis mi thub sman blugs pa// kun nas dbang bskur chad du ni// rtag tu shes rab can gyis brtag/ gzhan gyis mi thub dbang bskur mchog/ dkyil 'khor gang gang bris byas / phyag rgya gang dang gang bkod pa// de
79b3: nide dang de btag bya/ / de rnams phyag rgya dam par bshad// dbang bskur ched du sangs rgyas rnams// lha de rnams ni yid du'ong// sman gyi dam pa mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bshad// tsan dan dang ni rgya spos dang // gapur
79b4: bzhin gur gum dang / / a ka ru dang lha yi shing // tsan dan dumar po nyid dang ni// si hI byed de bzhin mchog/ kun nas sa had pa dang // gi ri kar tu tshangs mchod sbyin// sman gyi dam pa rnams su bshad// lhag gnas kun gyi sbyor
79b5: yis/ / sangs rgyas mchod pa rab 'jug cing // dang po rdo rje dbang bskur ba// shes rab thams cad rab 'jug byed// rin chen dam pa'i dam pa ni// gser la sogs kyis thams cad nas// sman kun dang ni sa bon kun/ 'bru rnams thabs
79b6: ga sa man / / gang pa ga sa la byal// nga grwa da dol las sa
79b7: d+ha ming rnyed pa yongs su dogs so/ / rigis gzusatshul ba sa sang pos kyi byor sogs// bu gas ldan pa da la ldan co pa rje yis/ de sngam zung ba ma rdzogs pa/ zhin sa gnapas ngonas
79b8: sa sa #/ bod skad dadu /
80a1: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di ga bdag gis thos padus gcigan/ chom
80a2: ldan las riras gyi tham pa thams cad kyis nan nanas na byang chub sems dpang bye ba khrag zin 'bras drug dum dang thabs gcig tu brdzags te/ nas bcom ldan das shA'i bdang l+h+wam yin da ya pa rnam
80a3: lding dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi 'am ci dang / srin po dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad dang / 'byung po dang / log 'dren dang / sha za dang / snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i mamo tshogs shin tu mang zhing rgya che ba dpag tshad lnga'i dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa/
80a4: stag dang / dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcus bskor cing mdun du bdar nas chos ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyis yongs su bskor// rig bi'i tshogs dang / phyag rgya'i tshogs cwa
80a5: cad dang / rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas// bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste/ bar snang las babs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas
80a6: nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di dag ni nga'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i sgo yin no// sangs rgyas dang /
80a7: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// oM byang chub kyi sems kyi rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM kun du bzang po'i spyod pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i nog/ oM yid bzhin gyi nor bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu
80a8: byin pa'i sgo'o/ / oM 'gog pa med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM skye bar 'gyur ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM rnam par shes pa thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM 'bar ba chen po'i
80b1: chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ / oM brtson 'grus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM thams cad du 'gro ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM rdo rje thams cad brtan pa'i sems shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o//
80b2: oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid ye shes rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM las rnam par sbyong ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
80b3: sgo'o/ / mo nges par gnod mdzes rdo rje rten pa shes rabakyi rol byin pa'i sgo'o// oM 'dod pa la 'dod chags rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM mgyogs pa'i rdo rje can shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM d+hU thams
80b4: cad 'gro ba shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i sgo'o/ / oM hri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM a zhes bya ba'i sgo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM a
80b5: ma ba hUM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ / oM oM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung
80b6: rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/ / oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
80b7: chen po lagan rdo rje dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
80b8: pa'i sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho/ / // skad gsar chad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya gu d+ya ma Ni ti la ka nA ma sUH/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gsad ba nor du
81a1: thig le zhes bya ba'i mdo/ / bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi rdul rnyog pa med pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i byin/
81a2: gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs pa khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i cod pan khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs
81a3: pa thams cad legs par khong du chud pas las sna tshogs mdzad pa/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa/ thugs rje chen po rnam par snang mdzad rtag pa dus gsum
81a4: gyi dam tshig la rnam par gnas pa'i sku/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsten cing bstod pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i rtse mo khang bu brtsegs pa// kha dog rnam
81a5: par bkra ba'i dril bu dang ldan pa/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i dar gyi ba dan dang / me tog gi chun po dang / dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pa dang / zla bas nye bar mdzes pa'i 'og min gyi lha'i rgyal po'i khang bzangs na bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa'
81a6: bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs gcig pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang // rdo rje khu tshur dang / byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang ldan pas chos kyi
81a7: 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye
81a8: ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal du med cing bgrang ba las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'di lta ste/ dper na til gyi gang bu ltar 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su gang bar mthong
81b1: do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re las kyang gzhal du med cing grangs las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing mthong bar gyur cing sangs rgyas kyi shing de dag thams cad na yang chos kyi tshul 'di nyid ston par mdzad do// de na/
81b2: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad nam mkha'i khams thams cad la sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje rtag tu bzhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yang dag par bgrod pa'i rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad thugs su chud pa'i tshe//
81b3: shes sems dpa' nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po nam mkha' thams cad la 'phro ba'i rang bzhin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes mngon
81b4: par yongs su mkhyen pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag gi rang bzhin dag pas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa nam mkha'i thams cad la khyab pa'i gzugs thams cad legs par gzigs pa'i ye she
81b5: kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'dul ba'i spyod pa'i mchog tu gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod pa'i ye shes mdzad pa dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub
81b6: chen po'i thugs/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'gags pa'i dam tshig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags pa'i ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi legs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
81b7: pa thams cad kyi rin po che chen pos dbang bskur ba'i rin po che dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'o'o dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rin po che'i tog dang / de bzhin
81b8: gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad gang chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dag pa chen po'i chos dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang / ye shes chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khod/
82a1: lo chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gsung chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las sna tshogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsrung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
82a2: cad yongs su skyod pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dgo pa phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shwa dang ldan pa ste/ kun tu bzang dang don yod pa/ 'chi med rab tu dga' ba'i gtso// nam mkha'i snying po gzi
82a3: brjid che/ / rin chen tog ste cher 'dzum pa// spyan ras gzigs dang dbang phyug che// 'jam dpal kun gyi snying po dang // brjod bral sna tshogs pa yi las// dpa' bo gtum po dmabor dzin/ rdo rje lcags kyu mda' tshim pa// rin chen nyi ma rgyal
82a4: mtshan 'dzum/ / chos mdzod mdzes pa'i 'khor lo gsung // las dang chos dang 'jigs byed 'dzin// thog ma tha ma med zhib// ma rungs khro dang bzod pa che// gnod sbyin srin po dam pa brtan// gzi chen dpa' bo khyab bdag che// u mi la
82a5: bdag po skye dgu'i mgon/ 'dug sreg rgyal 'dod thub pa che// 'jig rten skyong dang mkha' dang sa// 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum pa// 'byung chen sems can don rab mdzad// thams cad sems can pa chen po// 'khor ba mya
82a6: ngan 'das dang brtag/ yang dag mtsho dang mchod chen po// sangs rgyas dag pa theg pa che// srid pa gsum po'ang de yin no// de dag la sogs pa'i yon tan bye ba brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag/
82a7: du mas yongs su bskor te dkyil 'khor chen po de la bzhugs nas chos ston par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
82a8: mdzad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten te 'khod nas thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i bcom ldan 'das mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i thig le zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par bka' stsal du gsol/ / gang gis sems
82b1: can rnams la gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig de bdag gis bshad par bgyi lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjel
82b2: 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje gsang pa'i dam pa gang gis sems can thams cad nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba de bshad par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na
82b3: rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po gang gis bdag gsang ba'i bdag par 'gyur ba bka' stsal du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad
82b4: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar zhugs par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad mi phyed par mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs
82b5: pa'i sku de dag thams cad dang mi phyed par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid la ched du brjod pa 'dis ched du brjod pa/ / e ma'o bdag ni thabs chen po// rab tu gsang ba thig le yi// ting 'dzin gang phyir grub
82b6: pa yang / gsang ba nyid ni zhu bar byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas 'thon nas phyag tu 'khod par gyur pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dra/
82b7: rab tu gsang ba'i thig la zhes bgyi ba ci lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na
82b8: rdo rje rab tu gsang ba'i thig le 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba'o/ / ches shin tu gsang ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid sbyin pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan par byed
83a1: ba'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba rjes su rig pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su byon pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum mo//
83a2: 'di ni gsang ba'i mdzod do// 'di nyid pad ma'o// 'di nyid rdo rje'o// 'di nyid dam tshig ste/ de nyid kyis na lag na rdo rje / dam tshig mi shes pa'i mdun du smra bar mi bya'o// de'i phyir lag na rdo rje des 'ga' la yang ma bshad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
83a3: chen po lag na rdo rjes slar yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir gang 'ga' zhig la smra bar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la legs so/
83a4: zhes bya ba gnang ste/ legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// legs so rdo rje chos khyod kyis// rdo rje las khyod rab legs so// mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad pa// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi
83a5: gsang / / theg pa chen po mdor bsdus pa// dag pas rnam par bsgrubs tsam gyis// bde blag tu ni sangs rgyas thob// bde ba zad med mi zad pa// skye ba 'di la 'grub par byed ces so// lag na rdo rje de nas shin du gsang ba'i thig le las kyang mchog
83a6: tu gsang ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo sde 'di legs par sba bar bya'o/ / sems can gang kha cig nye bar skrag pa dang bcas pa yod la// gang kha cig dad pa dang ldan pas theg pa chen po glang po che'i phrag tu zhon pa dag yod de// de dag las
83a7: dang po la ni gsang sngags dang phyag rgya dang gsang ba thams cad bshad par mi bya zhing gsang ba thams cad bstan par mi bya'o/ / dad pa can dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur ba thob pa dag la de dag thams cad bshad par bya'o// legs
83a8: par gsang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi thig le 'di ni ches shin tu gsang ba rab tu gnas pa'i slob dpon la bshad par bya'o/ / gang zhig rgyud 'di bshad pa tsam na sems can dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang / gang dag ches shin tu dga' ba skye ba de dag
83b1: ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan par shes par bya'o/ / de dag la 'thad pas gdams pa dang bcas pa bstan par bya'o// sems can gang kha cig nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa de dag la lo rgyus tsam yang mi bya'o// de nas
83b2: byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir de dag la lo rgyas tsam yang mi bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
83b3: bdag pos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / lag na rdo rje nyon cig/ sems can de dag gis lha'i ris ma mthong zhing dam tshig la rab tu smod par byed pa de dag la gal te smras na/ lo rgyus tsam gyis kyang dmyal bar rab
83b4: tu ltung bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rdo rje kun nas 'bar rab tu 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa 'dis rigs thams cad sreg par
83b5: byed do/ / bcom ldan 'das de dag ni tshul bzhin ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par bgyi'o zhes so// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dra
83b6: bdag gis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa de dag gi nang du bshad par mi bgyi lags na/ de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis shin du ches gsang ba'i thig le zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i snying po dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig
83b7: ji srid bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad bskyed pa'i don du bka' stsal du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos spro ba myong ba pa po'i ting nge 'dzin
83b8: gyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad gcig tu mdzad do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren
84a1: bdam cig rjes byaba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi byed par dum la mnyam par gzhag nas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dun pa 'dam cig ma lus shing lus pa med pa sems can gyi khams thams cad 'thugs
84a2: pa bde ba dang yid bde ba bskyed pa'i don du ji srid ting 'dzin dam pa 'grub pa'i don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ so so'i sgrub pa'i thabs rgya che bas mdor bsdus te cho ga rgyas par gyur
84a3: pa ni lag na rdo rje dang po re shig sngags pas lag pa gnyis a'i rnam pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsam par bya'o/ / a'i rnam pa de dri ma med pa'i gzugs la dkar ba bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin can te/ de nyid yongs su gyur pa las zla
84a4: ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje lho phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i
84a5: phyir lag pa gnyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du blta bar bgyi/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa grub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
84a6: nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ 'dir lag pa gnyis zla ba la rdo rje phra mo nas kyi tshad tsam dkar po 'od zer dang ldan pa sngags 'dis bsgom par bya ste/ hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na//
84a7: rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi// rdo rje des ci zhig bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos lag ni rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag ni rdo rje
84a8: nyon cig/ rdo rje thal mo dam du bcings nas gsang sngags 'dis rang gi spyi bor dgrol bar bya'o// / oM swa b+hA ba bi shud d+haHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho ha~M// de nas bdag nyid shel dag pa'i rang bzhin dri ma med cing gsal
84b1: ba'i gzugs pu sngags pas bsgoms par bya'o/ / de nas sdom pa gzung ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming che ge mo nas bgyi ba dus 'di nas gzung ste ji srid snying po byad
84b2: chub la thug gi bar du/ ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ byang chub tu ni ngas mdzad pa'i// byang chub sems ni blan med// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang / dge ba'i chos ni sdod pa dang / sems can
84b3: don byed tshul khrims gsum/ / so sor brtan par bdag gis gzung // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i// sdom pa deng nas brten par bzung // rdo rje dril
84b4: bu'i phyag rgya yang / / de nyid so sor gzung bar bgyi// slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi// rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la// sbyin pa rnam pa ni rtag tu sbyin// nyini re bzhin ni dus drug tu// rin chen rigs chen rnal 'byor bya// dam tshig
84b5: yid du 'ong ba'o/ / byang chub chen po las byung ba'i// pad ma'i rigs chen dag pa la// byi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum// dam chos so sor gzung bar bgyi// las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni//
84b6: nyid so sor gzung bar bgyi// mchod pa las kyang ci nus pas/ khas kyi rigs mchog chen po yi// byang chub sems ni bla na med// dam parab tu bskyed pa dang / sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ bdag gis sdom pa me lus gzung // ma bsgral ba rnams
84b7: bdag gis bsgral/ / ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dkrol// dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing // sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos
84b8: byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / sdom pa bzung te phyag rgya chen po la gnas nas sngags pas chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o// 'di dag thams cad phyi rol dang nang du rtog pas brtags/
85a1: pa las gzhan 'ga' yang mi gnas so zhes de ltar snying la gnag ste 'di skad ces/ 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag cing nga bzhin gyi 'odogs la la gdod mnas ma skyes pa nyid de nas brjod par bya'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dang /
85a2: chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ji ltar bsgom par bgyi ba cung zad bka' stsal du gsol// de nas
85a3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos sems so sor rig pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka'
85a4: stsal to/ / lag na rdo rje khyod kyis sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa'i bdag nyid nam mkha'i dkyil ma lus pa khyab pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mdzes pa dpag tshad brgya stong las lhag pa/ a la sogs pa'i rnam
85a5: pa'i yi ge/ a A/ i I/ u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e AM/ oM IM/ aM aHzhes bya ba/ de dag yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa bsgom par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bdag nyid zla
85a6: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bsgoms pas bdag nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par mthong ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod de don yod grub pa'i gzugs su gnas so// yang bcom ldan
85a7: 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs khar 'khod de ched du brjod pa 'dis ched du brjod pa/ / e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// thog med grub pa'i don yod bdag/ ji ltar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te// bdag nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas// de
85a8: nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyab kyi rmi ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod de bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po la gdol ba ba pa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ de nas yang bcom
85b1: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i zla ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa shugs nas/ / ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu rgyas pa'i tshad kyi de bzhin
85b2: gshegs pa thams cad nyid kyi thugs kar zhugs par mdzad do/ / zhugs nas kyang gcig tu mi byed par gyur te/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad rab tu rgyas pa'i tshul du rnam par gnas so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
85b3: po lag na rdo rje byang chub kyi zla bde bshad par bya'o/ / zla ba de'i steng du bdag nyid byang chub kyi zla ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya ste shin du dri ma med pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i gzugs rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'i mchog
85b4: gnas ngan len thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ / bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad myong ba'i don dang / ji srid nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i dri ma med pa sngon mthong ba'i zla ba lta bu ka la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi yon
85b5: tan 'jug pa ste/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+hanya/ Ta tra Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ shaSha sa ha/ a laM k+ShaHka la sogs pa'i yi ge 'di dag skar ma la sogs pa'i gzugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu mi byed par gyur pa wa
85b6: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du bsam par bya'o/ / yang lag na rdo rje zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de la nam mkha'i khams thams cad rab tu rgyas pa'i tshad kyi rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa zhi ba/ 'od zer dang bcas pa bsgom par bya'o// de nas yang gsang ba'i
85b7: bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje de ji ltar bsgom par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin
85b8: gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang gcig tu 'dzin nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje de
86a1: sems dpa' rdo rje'i gzugs su bsgom par bya ste/ nam mkha' khams thams cad rab tu rgyas pa'i tshad kyi rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par klubs pa/ lus thams cad sangs rgya
86a2: kyi gzugs brnyan gyi tshul gyis gang zhing dang ba/ lag pa g.yon pas dril bu 'dzin pa// g.yas pa'i lag pas rdo rje snying khar brten pa// zhal cung zad bzhad par sngags pas bsam par bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
