129b1: gser gyi mdog can 'bar dang bcas// na bza' dag ni dkar po bsnams// kun tu rnam par snang mdzad pa// ting nge 'dzin du gnas par bri// mgon po yi ni byang phyogs su// spyan ras gzigs dbang dpa' bo ni// pad ma dkar
129b2: po'i stan la 'dug/ dung dang kund zla ba 'dra// dbul 'od dpag med bzhugs pa// bzhin ni bag tsam 'dzum par bri// de yi g.yas su lha mo ni// sgrol ma grags pa chen mo de// dge zhing 'jigs pa sel ba ste// sngo bsangs mo la
129b3: sna tshogs gzugs/ / bud med daral bab pa'i tshad// thal sbyar me tog ud pal thogs// 'od zer dag gis kun skor cing // gos ni dkar po gyon par bri// g.yon du lha mo khro gnyer can// sngags de'i phreng ba lag na sbyangs// mig
129b4: gsum pa la thor tshugs can/ / kha dog mdog ni dkar po la// 'od zer dkar po ser po dang // dmar po rnams kyis bskor bar bri// khro gnyer can dang nye bar ni// mthu chen lag na pad ma thogs// brtse ba chen po gos dkar gyon// 'od
129b5: zer dag gis bskor ba yi/ / dpa' bo yang dag bri bya ste// de yi pad mkham phye// de'i drung du blo can gyis// rig sngags lha mo grags ldan ma// gser gyi kha dog lta bu can// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// lag pa g.yon pas bri
129b6: yang ku'i/ / snye ma yid 'ong 'dzin par bri// sgrol ma yi ni nye 'khor du// blo dang ldan pas gos dkar mo// thor tshugs can la gos dkar gyon// lag na pad ma thogs par bri// de'i 'og tu sngags pa yis// rigs sngags rgyal po stobs
129b7: po che/ / kha dog nyi ma 'char ka bzhin// pad ma dkar pos rnam par brgyan// 'bar ba'i phreng can mi bzad cing // spu dag seng ge ltar 'dug pa// spyan ras gzigs dbang blo ldan gyi// rta mgrin can zhes grags pa bri// sangs rgyas rnams
129b8: kyi lho phyogs su/ / byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams kyi// phyag rgya yid bzhin nor bu zhes// grags bskal pa chen po can// re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa// pad ma dkar la 'dug par bri// mgon po rnam snang mdzad chen gyi//
130a1: lho yi phyogs su rdo rje 'dzin// re ba thams cad kong byed pa// mdog ni bri yang skul bu// ljang ser ram ni mang gang ltar// sngob sangs mgon po brgyan can// sams dpa' chen po rgyan kun gyis// rnam pa
130a2: brgyan cing mtha' yas par/ / 'jug pargya chen rdo rjer bcas// 'od zer dag gis bskor bar bri// de yi g.yas su lha mo'i ming // mA pa k+Shi zhes bya bad// rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// lag na rdo rje thogs pa bri// de yi 'og tu lham
130a3: ni/ / rdo rje rtse mo stobs chen de// po nya rnams kyis yongs bskor cing // bzhin ni bgacam 'dzum par bri// g.yon rol du ni sngags pa yis// rdo rje lugu rgyud cas pa// lag na rdo rje lu gu chud// rang gi po nya rnams kyis bsko 'i yang ku
130a4: ldang sar mdo/ / rdo rje'i mtshanams legs mtshan gyi// 'gan rdo rje'i 'og logs sa// tho blag tso ba zhes byab// bgags can dgrani'i byed pa// tho bo 'jig tan gsum du grags/ mig gsum mche ba bzhi pas// na
130a5: dbyar gyi rang sbyin 'dra/ / rab tu rgod pa'i sgra yang 'byin// rdo rje'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// 'khor ni mtha' yas thob po// dbang phrug rnams kyis yongs bskor ba// lag pa stong phrag brgyad ga ni// mtshan cha sna tshogs thogs shi
130a6: gdeng sa/ / khro bo chen po 'di 'drab// pad ma'i steng na 'dug par bri// de'i nub du song nas ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa mang po dag/ lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs// kha dog sna tshogs stobs po che// 'od zer dag gis yongs bskor ga/
130a7: sems cadan kun don byed par bri// gsang sngags mgon po'i 'og logs su// bder bral gyi ni phyogs kyi char// mi g.yo zhes bya la gan ni// ral gri zhags pa legs par thogs// zur phung spyi bo'i g.yon du 'phyang// tu
130a8: brgyan cing mig gcig yo/ / rang gi 'od kyi nang na gnas// khro dang bcas pa brag la 'dug/ bzhin ni khro ga nyer rab tu bsnyed// byis pa'i gzugs can 'khrang bag bri// bris nas blo ldan drung phyogs su// song nas bcom ldan
130b1: 'das kyi ni/ / khro bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal// 'bang ba'i phreng can mi zad pa// lag na rdo rje rtse bran rgyan// bka' lung nod pa ltar 'dug cing // zad pa'i dus dang 'drar gnas pa// nan tan du ni bri bar bya// de ltar nang du brib
130b2: rgyas dang bcas par bshad pa yin/ / de nas sngags pa phyir byung nas// nges pa gnyis pa'i dgapa// shang gyi phyogs kyi nang du ni// tsa ni gnyis su phye ba la// sgo khrung kyi nin ma du// sngags pas rgyal pa shASh+Ta thag// gas
130b3: kha dog 'bar dang bcas/ / mtshan mchog sum bcu rtsa gnyis ldan// mgon po na bza' dur smrig bsdams// khyab bdag bstan pa'i don mdzad pa// pad ma dkar po'i stan la bzhugs// chos 'chad tshul du bzhugs par bri// de yaM g.yas
130b4: su lha mo ni/ / sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba ste// lha mo cung zad 'dzum pa'i zhal// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang ba// mtshungs med sku ni rab tu dang // de ni shAkya thub pa'i yum// de yi g.yas su lha mo ni// rig sngags mdzod spu zhas grags
130b5: pad ma'i steng na 'dug pa ste/ / dung zla kun da lta bu'i mdog/ lag na yid bzhin nor bu thogs// re ba kun rdzogs byed pa bri// de nas sngags pas g.yon rol du// shAkya seng ge skyob pa yi// gtsug tor gzi can brtson
130b6: 'grus che/ / gdugs dkar po dang rgyal ba'i gtsug/ gtsug tor rnam par rgyal nyid dang // gzi brjid phung po skal chen dang // rnam par 'thor zhes rnam grags pa// lnga po yang dag bri bar bya// shAkya tog ni mthu chen gyi//
130b7: gtsug tor lnga po 'di dag ni// gnas ni lnga rnams nyid du ni// rab tu bsgrims te bri bar bya// de yi byang du song nas su// gnas gtsang rnams ni bri bar bya// dbang phyug kun tu me tog dang // 'od kyi phreng ba nyid dang ni// yid mgyogs
130b8: dang ni rnam grags te/ / de dag thams cad legs par bri// mdzod spu yi ni g.yas logs su// gtsug tor chen po cher 'byung dang // de bzhin gyon du 'byung nyid dang // sgra dbyangs mtha' yas pa yang ste// gtsug tor gsum po
131a1: kho na ni/ bsgrims te yang dag bri bar bya// gtsug tor lnga po stobs chen rnams// dkar po ser skya ser por bya// gsum po gzhan ni dkar po dang // ser po dang ni dmar por bya// kun kyang 'od zer mang po can/
131a2: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi// de dag smon lam stobs chen de// re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o// de nas sngags pas me phyogs su// me ni drang srong che rnams dang // bcas shing me yi nang na 'dug/ thal ba'i sor ris gsum
131a3: gyis mtshan/ / dpa' bo thams cad rab tu dmar// snying gsum mdo ris mtshan can// me lce 'bar ba'i dbus na 'dug/ bgrang phreng kun ni thogs par bri// de nas lho'i phyogs kyi char// gshin rje'i gtso bo lag pa na// dbyug pa thogs
131a4: shing ma he zhon/ / kha dog dbyar gyi char sprin 'dra// ma mo rnams dang dus mtshan dang // 'chi bdag rnams kyis bskor bar bri// bden bral phyogs su bden bral ni// lag na ral gri 'jigs pa bri// de nas kyang ni blo ldan pa// myur du
131a5: byang gi phyogs song ste/ / lha'i rgyal po ri rab la// 'dug cing lha rnams kyis bskor ba// lag na rdo rje cod pan can// rgyan kun gyis ni brgyan par bri// de nas de yi shar du ni// chu lha lagan zhags thogs bri// de yi yang ni shar phyogs
131a6: su/ nyi ma shing rta'i steng 'dug bri// de'i g.yas dang g.yon du ni// rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ba bri// de yi g.yas su tshangs pa ni// gdong bzhi pa la thor tshugs can// oM zhes bya ba lhur len pa// dang pa pad ma stan 'dug bri// de yi nub tu bri ba//
131a7: ni// sa yi lha dang dbyangs can dang // khyab 'jug skom byed de bzhin drung // bde byed de bzhin zla ba ste// nub phyogasu ni gnas nas ni// rab tu nan tan byas te bri// bris nas sngags pas de nas ni// yid la 'khrul ba med pa ru// gsang sngags
131a8: mgon po'i 'og logs su/ / khro chen gzhan gyis mi thub ces// bya ba nyid dang lha mo ni// gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang ni// sa bdag lag na bum pa thogs// gus par yang dag gnas par bri// klu chen dga' bo bsnyen dga' dag/ shAkya seng ge
131b1: skyob pa yi/ / sgo drung gnyis su mngon phyogs par// rab tu bskams te bri bar bya// gzhan yang shAkya thub pa yi// rgyud rnams kun las dkyil 'khor du// sngags dang phyag rgya gang bshad pa// de dag kyang ni mkhas pas rmi/
131b2: sngags bde nas phyir byung nas// cha gsum pa ni nges pa la// rdo rje dam pa sbyin pa ni// gur gum lta bu'i mdog can te// spyi bo zung bud lnga dang ldan// byis pa gzhon nu gzugs can la// u pal sngon po rdo rje can// lag
131b3: pa g.yon na thogs pa ste/ / pad ma dkar po'i sman la 'dug/ rab tu 'dzum pa'i bzhin du gnas// 'od zer mtshan nyid bzang po yis// kun tu 'khor bar sngags pas bri// de yi byang du gzhon nu ni// dra ba'i 'od can lag pa na// rin
131b4: chen dra ba thogs pa ste/ / sna tshogs pa yi rgyan gyis brgyan// pad ma dmar po'i stan la 'dug/ rgyal ba'i sras la blta ba bri// rdo rje dam pa sbyin pa yi// g.yon du pho nya mo lnga bri// sgra can dang ni nye sgra can// sna tshogs ma dang nor can ma//
131b5: de bzhin 'gug ma zhes bya ba// 'di dag blo ldan pho nya mo'o// de dag gi ni 'og zad du// phyag brnyan ma ni lnga rnams dang // gzhon nu dra ba'i 'od can gyi// 'khor gnyis po yang bri bar bya// de nas sngags pas lho phyogs su// byang chub sems
131b6: dpa' grags chen po/ / sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel gtse// yid bzhin nor bu thogs pa bri// de yi cha gnyis bor nas ni// dpa' bo ngo mtshar can dang ni// sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// ngan song thams cad spong ba dang //
131b7: bzhin skyong sems blo gros dang // blo can snying rjes gdungs pa dang // byams pa mngon du 'byung ba dang // gdung ba thams cad zhi byed dang // de bzhin blo gros bsam yas te// mkhas pa brgyad po bri bar bya// byang gi phyogs su song nas ni/
131b8: sa yi snying po 'bar dang bcas// bzod dang nges pa phun tshogs bri// de yi stan ni mkhas pa yis// 'byung khungs kun dang ldan pa yis// rin chen kun gyis nyer brgyan pa// de yi steng na rin chen bzhi'o// pad ma yang dag gnas pa ni// yid
132a1: du 'ong ba bsam bya ste/ / byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po// de yi steng na 'dug par bri// de yi 'khor ni yon tan gtso// mtha' yas shin du grangs med de// de yi nang na byang chub sems// rin chen 'byung gnas rin chen/
132a2: lag/ sa 'dzin nyid dang lag na ni// rin chen phyag rgya can dang ni// lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa nyid// grags chen 'di dag bri bar bya// de bzhin sngags pas nub phyogs su// dpa' bo nam mkha'i snying po ni// gzi brjid chen po gos dkar
132a3: gyon/ / lag na ral gri thogs bsam te// rgyal sras pad ma'i stan steng na// legs par 'dug par bri bar bya// bdag nyid chen po de'i 'khor du// grags pa dag kyang bri bar bya// de'i 'khor dpa' bo chen po ni// nam mkha' dri med blo gros
132a4: mkha'/ blo gros rnam dag nyid dang ni// spyod pa yi ni blo gros dang // blo brtan pa zhes bya ba ste// de dag rab tu bsgrim bri zhing // rtag tu dpa' bo 'di rnams dang // lhan cig go rims bzhin du bsam// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na
132a5: rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams la bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la ring zhig tu mig mi 'dzums par bltas ste// ched du gleng ba 'di gleng zhing tshig tu smras pa// 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams// /
132a6: ud du ma 'bar ra'i me tog bzhin// brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig/ 'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo // gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba// de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste// bskal pa bye ba du ma ru// sdig pa bgyis par gyur pa gang //
132a7: de kun dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra ba// mthong bas byang bar 'gyur lags na// grags pa mtha' yas sngags spyod pa'i// tshul la gnas na smos ci 'tshal// skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas na ni// go 'phang bla na med par 'gyur// gang dag spyad
132a8: pa mchog 'di la/ / blo gros shin du mi g.yo ba// de dag gis ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun// sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu gcad// de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang rdo rje 'dzin de dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'thun par tshig smras pa//
132b1: gsang sngags spyod pa dbang byung ba// dpa' ba chen po lags sa legs/ khyod kyi yid la gang bsam pa// mnyanam thams dam rgyan 'grus// sngags rgyud rtags pa gas pa pa/ byang nub sams dnga' gzhan nams dang /
132b2: spyad 'bras bu la gnas pa// bdag cag thams cad dbang du gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// tshon zhes bgyi ba de gang lags// ci slad 'di ni tshan zhes bgyi// tshon ni ci ltar dgye bar bgyi//
132b3: gang zhig thog mar btang bar bgyi// rta babs rnams dang de bzhin du// sgo khyud rnams kyi tshad dang ni// sgo yi tshad kyang ci 'drang bgyi// mgon po yis ni bshad du gsol// lha bshos me tog byug spos dang // bum pa rnams kyang rgyas par
132b4: gsungs/ / slob ma ci ltar gzung ba dang // de ni ci ltar dbang bskur dang // bla ma la ni yon dbul dang // sbyin bsreg gnas kyang bdag la gsungs// gsang sngags mtshan nyid ci 'dra lags// ting nge 'dzin du bzhed pa gang // de skad gsol
132b5: nas bcom ldan 'das/ / chos kun dbang phyug thub pa yis// rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad gsungs// yid cig tu ni tshur nyon cig/ theg chen 'bras bu 'byung ba yi// gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyi mchog/ sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis
132b6: ni/ / gang dag dris pa bshad par bya// sems can 'ams ni zhen byed cing // 'di ni chos dbyings ro yin par// sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngon gsungs te// de phyir 'di ni tshon zhes bya// tshon ni nang nas dgye bar bya// byi rol nas ni tshon me
132b7: da/ / dkar ba thog mar btang bar bya// de yi 'og tu dmar po ste// de nas ser po btang bar bya// de yi 'og tu ljang khu btang // kun gyi nang rol nag po ste// tshon gyi cho ga de ltar bshad// rta babs rnams kyi tshad kyang ni// dkyil 'khor dang
132b8: ma dang mnyam mo/ / sgo khrud dag kyang de dang mnyam// pad ma sor ni bcu drug bshad// dang po'i sgo ni snying po yi// dkyil 'khor dang ni mnyam zhes bya// 'jigs med dag gi rim gyis ni// bskyed de de las lhag shes bya// sgo rnams
133a1: kyi ni bar bar du/ / sgo bsrungs rnams ni bzhag par bya// ting nge 'dzin ni mdor na sems// yang dag mgu ba yin par bshad// sems dpa' chen po khyad par ni// yid gcig bsdus la mnyan par bgyis// sangs rgyas
133a2: kun gyi ting 'dzin ni/ / stong pa nyid ces rgyal bas gsungs// de ni sems yongs shes pa las// thob par 'gyur gyi gzhan las min// de dag nyid ni spangs pa ste// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi yin par 'dod// stong pa chen po zhes bya ste/
133a3: kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byed pa'o// de bas rnam pa thams cad du// stong nyid rtag tu dran par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad dang thabs gcig tu yang dag par mos nas// nyan thos dang
133a4: rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin so so'i tshul du gsungs so/ / de'i tshe yang sangs rgyas thams cad dang rgyud gcig pa'i stobs kyi shugs shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas
133a5: yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ / byang chub snying por 'dug nas su// bdud ni rnam pa bzhi bcom pas// de nas dpa' bo chen po zhes// tshangs las sogs pa lha tshogs rnams/
133a6: 'jigs pa thams cad med pa'i sgra// dga' bzhin du ni sgrogs par byed// de phyin chad ni nga dpa' bo// dpa' bo chen po zhes su grags// skye ba med pa des rtogs pa// tshig gi spyod yul rnams spangs shing // nyes pa thams cad med
133a7: pa ste/ / rgyu dang rkyen dang bral ba yin// stong pa'i ye shes mkha' 'dra ba// mun pa kun dang bral gyur cing // shin du dri med de kho na// ci ltar 'byung ba de las byung // kun mkhyen tsam gyi tshul du gnas// kun mkhyen sangs rgyas mtshan
133a8: nyid do/ / nga yi de nyid dam pa 'di// 'jig rten snang bar byed pa ste// byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis ni// yig 'bru rnams su bstan nas su// sems can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir// ngas ni thams cad rab tu bshad// de nas
133b1: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ / dmar gyur nas mig gdangs te// thams cad mkhyen la mgo bo yis// phyag 'tshal nas ni tshig 'di smras// sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs dang ni// shes rab bsam yas ngo mtshar che// spos pa kun dang bral
133b2: ba yi/ chos rtogs nas ni rang byung rnams// 'jig rten kun gyi re ba kun// yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ston// gsang sngags mtshan nyid de lta bu// bden pa gnyis la legs gnas pa// sems can kun gyis shes na ni// 'jig
133b3: rten kun gyi mchod gnas 'gyur/ / de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsol nas// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la mig mi 'dzum pa'i blta bas bltas nas cang mi smra bar
133b4: 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas
133b5: pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul ni/ / dogs pa dang ni bral ba ru// 'jig rten mtshan nyid shes nas ni// dgos pa'i sa la gnas de rnams// sangs rgyas sa la gnas pa yin// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems
133b6: dpa' sa brgyad pa'i dbang phyug rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul ni/ / chos rnams thams cad mi dmigs shing // srid dang skye ba rnams spangs pa'i/ 'jig rten sgyu ma ltar shes nas// 'jig rten 'jig rten dbang du 'dod// gsang ba
133b7: ba'i bdag po gzhan yang nyan thos dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i sa la gnas pa rnams skye ba dang 'jig par rtogs nas mtha' gnyis bshig pas rgyu mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ / shin du dngos po med pa'i ye shes mi spyod de 'di ni nyan
133b8: thos rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul lo/ / gsang ba pa'i bdag po rang sangs rgyas rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam par bshig nas brjod du med pa'i chos kyi tshul la gnas pa rnams ni// chos thams cad brjod du med do snyam pa'i ye
134a1: shes 'jug ste/ / ngag shin du 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par reg par byed pa 'di ni rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul lo// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang 'dzi pa rnams
134a2: rgyu las 'bras bu dang las las 'byung ba'am/ / ldog par rtog cing gzhan gyi dbang gis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin kun du skye bar 'gyur te 'di ni 'jig rten pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul lo// gsang ba pa'i bdag po//
134a3: 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul// yin te de la gnas pa yi// sangs rgyas dang ni rang sangs rgyas// byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams dang // nyan thos des pa sdig bcom par// grags pa gang dag yin pa dang // 'jig rten pa'i
134a4: lha gang yin/ / gsang sngags spyad pa'i cho ga'i tshul// sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas// dpa' bo de tshe 'char par byed// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang pa pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa// gsang
134a5: pa pa'i bdag po/ / gsang sngags rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi mtshan nyid nyon cig/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces gsang ba ba'i
134a6: bdag po de la/ / rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsang sngags ni// tshig dang ming dang brda' yis mtshan// tshig de dbang du gyur pas na// gsang sngags don rnams thams cad sgrub// kha cig skul ba'i tshig dang ldan// kha cig dang ming
134a7: thog mar smos/ / hUM dang phaT dang ldan pa ni// gtsug tor rnams kyi yin par bsgrags// zung zo tshom shig ces pa dang // spun song drol cig ces pa ni// phyag brnyan rnams dang khro bo yi// gsang sngags yin par 'dren pas gsungs/
134a8: na maHswA hA la sogs ldan// ting nge 'dzin ni rtogs pas mtshan// zhi ba'i yi ga rnam par dag/ re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i// gsang sngags sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa'i yin// nyan thos
134b1: rnams kyi gsang sngags ni/ / gcig po gzhan ni gcig la gnas// rang sangs rgyas kyi'ang de bzhin te// khyad par dag ni bshad bya ni// ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par las// las tshe rnam par sbyong zhes bya// gsang ba pa yi bdag po gzhan
134b2: yang gsang sngags rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma byas/ byed du ma bcug/ rjes su yi rar ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid de/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma
134b3: b+hung yang rung / / chos rnams kyi chos nyid de ni ye nas gnas pa ste/ de yang 'di ltar gsang sngags rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi chos nyid do// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// de la gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa/
134b4: thams cad gzigs pa 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe/ chos nyid de tshul sna tshogs dang dgongs pa sna tshogs kyis// sems can bsam pa sna tshogs pa rnams la tshig sna tshogs pa rnams yig 'bru sna tshogs dang / yul gyi nges pa'i tshig tu
134b5: brjod pa sna tshogs dang / dbyangs sna tshogs su go ba rnams su byin gyis brlabs te/ gsang sngags kyi tshul 'chad do// ci ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gsang sngags kyi tshul yig 'bru dag tu byin gyis rlob can/ gsang ba pa'i
134b6: bdag po/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bden pa'i tshig gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang rdzu 'phrul gyi
134b7: rkang pa bzhi dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang pha rol du phyin pa drug dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che bdun dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad gang dag yin pa dang // gas
134b8: ba pa'i bdag po/ / mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs dang / sngon gyi smon lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
135a1: chos kyi dbyings kyi byin brlabs kyi stobs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas// sems can rnams la rgal bci lta ba bzhin du gsang sngags kyi cho ga yang dag par rab tu ston to// gsang sngags kyi tshig de yang gang zhen/
135a2: gzod nas pa skyes pa'i phyir a ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// dgongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir ka ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// nam mkha' dang 'dra bar dmigs su med pa'i phyir// kha ni chos thams cad kyi ni'o// 'gro ba thams cad dmigs
135a3: su med pa'i phyir ga ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ / gcig tu 'thungs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir g+ha ni chos thams cad kyi ske'o// 'chi 'pho thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir tsan chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// grib ma thams cad dang mtshungs pa'i
135a4: phyir cha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ / skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir dzan chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// dri ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir dz+nyA ni chos thams cad kyi zlo'o// nga rgyal dmigs su med pa'i phyir na ni chos thams cad kyi sgon/
135a5: bskyed pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// 'khrug pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir Da ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// bslu ba yongs su bral ba'i phyir D+ha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// de bzhin nyid dmigs su
135a6: med pa'i phyir ta ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ / gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir tha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// 'dul ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir da ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir d+ha ni chos thams
135a7: cad kyi sgo'o/ / don dam pa'i bden pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// lbu ba dang 'dra bar snying po med pa'i phyir pa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// ngag gi lam dang bral ba'i phyir ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//
135a8: srid pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir b+ha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// 'chi ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ma ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// theg pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ya ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// rdul thams
135b1: cad dang bral ba'i phyir ra ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ / mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir la ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// rang bzhin gyis zhi ba'i phyir sha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// rang bzhin gyis blun pa nyid kyi phyir/ ni chos thas
135b2: cad kyi rna'o/ / bden pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i byar sa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// rgyud dmigs su med pa'i phyir tani chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// nga dang nya dang / dang na dang mni ting nge 'dzin thams
135b3: cad la dbang sgyur ba ste mthu thams cad dang ldan pa/ / rab tu myur bar dgos pa'i don rab tu sgrub par byed pa yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// gsang sngags kyi tshul ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di ni re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par/
135b4: byed pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cakyi rnam par zin pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa// rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa// gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi don nges pa dus gsum las shin du 'das pa/ nam mkha'
135b5: ltar dri ma med pa ste/ bsam yas sems kyi sa la gnas// las dang bya ba dag las byung // spyad pa'i sa ni rjes thob nas// bsam yas 'bras bu sbyin par byed// 'di ni de nyid dam pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bstan// gas
135b6: sngags cho ga 'di shes nas/ / sngags pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sgra zhes bya ba de nyid mchog/ gsang sngags rnams kyi gsang sngags mtshan// sngags pas yid la sems na ni// 'chi 'pho med pa'i gnas 'thob bo// de nas
135b7: bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa// bcom ldan 'das pa
135b8: mtshar lags so/ / de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag gsang sngags kyi tshul 'del dad pa'i sems can de dag kyang thun mong ma lags pa'i yon tan dang ldan par
136a1: 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad kyi cho ga bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po// phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsam/
136a2: to// de nas sngags pa de yis su// me tog ser po dkar po dmar// yid du 'ong bas nan tan du// lha rnams la ni mchod pa bya// pad ma 'am yang na ud pa la// nA ga ge sar bu na ga/ tsam pa a she ga ti la ka/ pa ta la dang sa la'ang
136a3: ru / / de la sogs pa'i me tog rnams// yid du 'ong zhing blta na sdug/ bkra shis pa la sngags pa yis// mkhas pas nan tan mchod par bya// tsam dan ta gar spri ka dang // gur gum dang ni ru rta'ang rung // spos mchog rab tu bzang po ni//
136a4: sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba dbul// a ga ru 'am sgron shing ngam// ga bur dang ni tsan dan dang // sa la'i thang chu bkra shis pa 'am// shi ri ba sa ka yang rung // gzhan yang bdug spos sna tshogs pa// bkra shis 'jig rten rnam grags pa//
136a5: yid 'ong sngags pas cho ga bzhin// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nas gzhan yang sems dpa' che// lha bshos las kyi cho ga nyan// 'o thug 'bras chen zho sbyar nas// la phug dang ni khur skya dang // gor bod kar yid 'ong dag/
136a6: kha 'da'i bca' ba bzang po dang // bu ri ka dang ka ri ka/ de bzhin mthu shi ra dang // phen a shog bar ti dang // ba ra ba ta yang dbul bar bya'o// de la sogs pa'i bza' ba dang // shing thog rnams ni sna tshogs dang // hwags
136a7: dang li khar rnams dang / / bu ram sbrang rtsi mar dag dang // btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang // zho dang 'o ma rgyas par dbul// mar me rnam pa sna tshogs pa// gtsang zhing shin du bzang po yi// 'bru mar rab tu dri zhim pas// rab tu bkang
136a8: ste dbul bar bya/ / phyogs su gdugs dang ba dan rnams// ba dog sna tshogs rab tu bsgred // rta babs bzang po rnams kyang ni// dril bu dang baHsa rab tu dbul// yang na yid kyi mchod pa ni// thams cad nan tan bskyed de bya/
136b1: de nas bum pa brgyad dam ni// bcu drug rgyas par blangs nas su// smad dang rin chen thams cad thugs// spos kyi chus ni rab tu bkang // ldum bu dag gis kha brgyan te// de bzhin 'bras bus kha yang dgang // me tog slas/
136b2: la sogs pas brgyan// shin du bzang po bsrung ba byas// mgrin pa ras kyis bcings pa rnams// mkhas pas rnam par dgod par bya// lha yi gtso bo rnams la ni// ras ni zung re zung re dbul// sems dpa' chen po phal
136b3: rnams la/ / ya re dbul bar rab tu bsgrags// mchod pa de ltar byas nas ni// slob ma dkyil 'khor drung bkug ste// sngags pas chu yis bsang gtor bya// dri dang me tog sbyin par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa dran byas nas//
136b4: byang chub sems kyang 'dzin du gzhug/ des na rgyal ba'i rigs dge la// thams cad rab tu skyes par 'gyur// chos kyi dbyings las byung ba yi// phyag rgya de dag rnams la bcing // chos kyi 'khor la'ang bcings nas ni// rdo rje
136b5: sems dpas byin gyis brlab/ / de nas sangs rgyas kun gyi ni// dam tshig sdom brtson can gyis bcing // de tshe sngags kyi cho ga bzhin// ras la lan gsum gdab par bya// snying rjer gyur pa'i yid kyis su// de dag gi ni gdang yang
136b6: dgapa/ / dam tshig lan gsum bzlas nas ni// spyi bong yi gar zhes pa// glang kyi 'khor bcas brjid dang ldan// 'bar ba'i phreng ba rnam par 'phro// zla ba 'char ka lta bu yi// kha dog dkar po gzhag par bya// skyob pa kun gyi spyan sngar ni//
136b7: de nas me tog 'dor du gtsug/ me tog gang la bab pa de// sngags pas de la sbyin par bya// dkyil 'khor dang po'i sgo drung du// sgo khyud kyi ni dbus kyi cha// dkyil 'khor gyi ni sgo gnyis kyi// bar du slob ma bzung bar bya// der gnas pa la
136b8: cho ga kun/ / rim pa bzhin du legs par bya// slob ma sdig dang bral ba kun// de ltar legs par bcud nas ni// de dag zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// sbyin sreg cho ga bzhin du bya// snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i
137a1: rgyab rol gyi/ / dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus kyi char// ma yengs pa yi sems kyis bya// ma thab khru gang tsam gyi ni// tshad du rab tu bsgrags pa yin// kharan sor bzhi tshad du bya// dbus su rdo rje rab tu brtag/ de nas
137a2: sngags pa'i g.yas logs su/ / sbyin sreg gi ni yo byad gzhag/ g.yon gyi phyogs su slob ma rnams// co ga tsog por ni 'khor du gzhug/ sdom brtson bdag nyid sa steng du// ku sha bting ba'i stan la 'dug/ yang na tshon rtsi dmar po
137a3: mchog/ rab tu bzang po blangs nas su// de yis me yi gnas rnams kun// sngags pas mdo ru bri bar bya// ku sha dag gis g.yas phyogs nas// thams cad khor yug dgram pa ni// mang pos bskor ba'i tshul du dgram// spos kyi chu yis
137a4: bsang gtor bya/ / de nas sems can pan byed pa'i// me ni thab khung nang bsams te// brtul zhugs bzang pos bgang blugs mchog/ gsang sngags 'di yis sbyin par bya// na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nan/ ag ne ya sA hA// de nas slob
137a5: ma re re nas/ / mkhas pas lag pa g.yon pa yis// g.yas pa ma the bong bzung nas su// mnyam par bzhag pas sbyin bsreg bya// yid ni mnyam par bzhag nas su// bsreg lugs re re las kyang ni// gsang sngags cho ga bzhin zlos
137a6: shing / nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin bsreg bya// na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAn// aH ng+ka sh+ma na dgang shAn de kar prasha ma d+ha ra mA ni ra dzA ti/ a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba d+ha ra mA sa ma ta pra ba ta swA hA// sbyin bsreg rjes la sngags pa yis// slob ma rnams la yon bslang ba//
137a7: gser dang dngul dang rin chen dang // rta dang de bzhin glang po dang // rnga mo ba lang ma he gos// gzhan yang dngos po ci yang rung // de tshe slob mas gus par ni// dad pa rab tu ldan pa yis// sems la dga' ba bskyed nas su// bla ma la ni yon/
137a8: dbul lo// yang na ci nas bla ma de// rab tu mgu bar 'gyur bar bya// de ltar byas nas bdag bsrungs te// slob ma de bos bsgo ba ni// 'di ni bsod nams zhing yin zhes// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// skyob pa rnams ni kun gyis
137b1: gsungs/ ma dag yon tan rgyas pa yi// dge 'dudu la ni kun gyis byin// dge 'dun la phul 'bras bu che// skyes bum khas pa gang dag gis// dge 'dun la ni yon phul na// longs spyod chen po mi zad pa// 'jig rten 'an
137b2: paskye bar 'gyur/ de bas thams cad 'thun par ni// sems pa dga' ba brgyad nas su// sangs rgyas brtags pa'i dge 'dun la// ci dris par ni mchod ston pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems
137b3: dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ / sems dpa' chen po dbang bskung ba// sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa// rgyas pa du ni bshad par bya// yi gcig sdus te legs par nyon// gsang ba ba'i bdag po// de
137b4: la slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ / mdun du bar khru ngo bor nas// phyi rol gyis dkyil 'khor gnyis pa gru bzhi pa sgo gcig pa bri'o// grwa bzhir rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhi dgod de// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste// spros pa med par gnas
137b5: pa dang / / nam mkha' dri ma med pa dang // dri ma med pa'i mig dang // gos sna tshogs gyon pa rnams so// dbus su pad ma chen po 'dab ma brgyad pa ze ba dang bcas pa bzhag ste/ 'dab ma bzhi la byang chub sems dpa' grogs su gyur pa
137b6: sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthu can bzhi bri bar bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang // dran pa dang shes bzhin can dang / phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa can dang / snying rje can no// 'dab ma gzhan rnams la ni phyag
137b7: brta ba ni briste/ / bzhi gang zhen 'di sa s+ho// sems kyi byed par la spyod pa dang / 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs byed dang // ma chags pa dang / rnam par grol ba'o// dbus su ni chos kyi dbyings bsamagyis mi khyab pa'i ga sa
137b8: bzhag go/ / de nas rin po che'i bus pa pa ni rin po che dang spu thams cad byugs pa/ kun tu bzang po dang byams pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam pa sel ba dang / ngan song thams cad spong ba rnams kyis byin gyis
138a1: ba/ brlabs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ro// pad ma 'dab ma de la ni// sngags pa bdag gis de bzhag nas// spos dang me tog gis mchod de// mar me mchod yon sbyin par bya// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa/
138a2: dan dang / rnga sgra yid du 'ong ba dang // bkra shis rgya chen snyan pa yi// tshig gis legs par mngon dga' bya// skyob pa rnams kyi spyan snga ru// de ni bsgrims te dbang bskur ro// spos dang me tog bzang po yis// de la yang ni
138a3: mchod pa bya/ / de nas gser gyi thung ma ni// thogs te mdun du 'dug nas su// slob ma'i snying la 'bab pa'i tshig/ 'di skad ces ni smra bar bya// sngon gyi mig mkhan rgyal po yis// 'jig rten ying tog bsal ba bzhin/
138a4: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i// ling tog rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal// de nas me long blangs nas su// chos kyi mtshan nyid bshad par bya// chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// dang zhing dag la rnyog pa med// gzung du med cing
138a5: brjod du med/ / rgyu dang las las byung ba ste// ngo bo nyid med gnas med pa// de ltar mtshan nyid bshad par bya// de ltar chos 'di shes nas su// sems can don ni mnyam med byos// 'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye// de nas rkang pa'i
138a6: bar 'og tu/ / chos kyi 'khor lo bzhag par bya// de nas lag pa g.yas par yang // shin du bzang po'i dung byin te// chos kyi dung ni bla med pa// kun du rgyas par bus nas su// de ring phan cad 'jig rten la// skyob pa rnams kyi 'khor
138a7: lo bskor/ / som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing // dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis khyod// gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul gyi mchog/ 'jig rten 'di la rab tu shod// de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la// phan 'dogs byas pa bzo zhes bya// rdo rje
138a8: 'dzin pa de kun yang / / khyod la rnam pa kun du bsrung // de nas slob ma de bslang la// sngags pa snying rjer gyur pa yi// yid kyis nang du bcug nas ni// de la dam tshig bstan par bya// de ring phan cad bu khyod kyis// dam pa'i chos dang byang
138b1: chubs pas/ / khrag ga byar yar dbyed da// yongs su da ma gyu// da kyis sar sna nga gdang // sams can gdod pa sa na'o// kA de gsangs rgyas kyis// zugs pacang ba nyid sa bshad
138b2: rang gi srog bsrung ba/ / de ltar khyod kyis 'di dag bsrungs// slob mas bla ma'i rkang ba la// dad cing gus pas phyag byas nas// shin du nges pa'i yid kyis ni// de dag thams cad las blang ngo // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gsang pa
138b3: pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po 'di'i dam tshig la zhugs par gyur pa de'i bsod nams kyi
138b4: tsam zhig mngon par 'dus bgyis par rig par bgyi/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste de bzhin
138b5: gshegs pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'dus byas pa ci tsam pa/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams mngon par 'dus byas pa yang de tsam du rig par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag go/ rnam grangs 'dis
138b6: kyang khyod kyi 'di ltar blta ste/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag ni de bzhin gshegs paregs dang thugs las skyes pa'i sras yin par reg par bya'o// gas kyi bu dang rigs de dag phyogs gang na gnas pa dang
138b7: bzhi gshegs pas chen po dgongs mi dgos par 'gyur ro/ / gsang ba pa'i bdag pa'o// de sa bas na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis de dgal mchod par bya'o//
138b8: bzhi gshegs pa la blta bar 'dod pa rnams kyis de dag la blta bar bya'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin de dag dang kun du babang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po de rnams kyis mgrin
139a1: gcig tu tshig smras pa/ / bcom ldan 'das deng slan cad rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de rnams la rim gror bgyi zhing mchod par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de
139a2: dag nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su blta bar bgyi ba lags so/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag la gzigs nas// gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje
139a3: dang / rdo rje 'dzin de rnams dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas par 'jug pa rgya chen
139a4: po las byung ba sna tshogs kyi gzugs kyi nor bu dang 'dra ba/ / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa thogs pa med pa'i rtog pa la gnas pa/ dus gsum du chags pa med pa'i
139a5: stobs dang ldan pa dag yod do/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'dzin de rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag gis mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das
139a6: de'i dus la bab po/ bde bar gshegs pa de'i tshod la bab po// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe ljags kyi dbang po 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rnam par sprul pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
139a7: kun du g.yogs nas/ / chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi tog rgya chen po yongs su dag pa'i rtse mo la blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas 'di ltar de bzhin
139a8: gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ chos kyi dbyings khyab pa sems can gyi khams ma lus pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo stobs chen mo bsrung ba chen mo 'di gsungs so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
139b1: sarba thA ya ga khyab thas 'byangs zas pa / ma trab la sa rbata thAg bu rkyen du/ rAhA t+yata r+pa ma thatas te swAhA// sangs rgyas mangs pa thams cad kyis// dag sngags 'ad gsungs ma lan// dmasas
139b2: rgyas zhing 'di dag/ rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur// byang chub sems dpa' de kun gyis// ngo mtshar gyur pa'i mig gdangs nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan sngar ni// yid du 'ong ba'i tshig spras pa// e ma 'o sangs rgyas thams cad
139b3: kyis/ bsrung ba rab tu stobs chen 'di// sems can thams cad bsrung ba dang // bskyab cing sba ba'i phyir gsungs te// gang gi snying la bsrung gnas pa// de dag la ni 'jigs pa med// gsang sngags mthu chen dran byas na// bgegs dang log 'dren
139b4: thams cad dang / srin po 'jigs pa'i gzugs can ni// de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po byin gyis brlabs nas/ de'i tshe chos kyi dbyings kyi mdzod kyi snying po can zhes byab
139b5: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu dam tshig la 'jug pa'i rig sngags byung ngo // na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAn/ a sa ma tris me sa ma ye swA hA// de nas de ma
139b6: thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du dam tshig la 'jug pa'i rig sngags sgra gang shig thos nas mkhas pa rnams chos thams cad las 'da' bar mi 'gyur
139b7: bgrag par gyur to/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dbyings kun du 'byung ba'i gsang sngags gsungs pa// na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAn/ d+harma d+hA tu swa b+ha pa ad mako ha// chos kyi dgengs byin gyis brlab pa'o//
139b8: na maHsa man+ta badz+ra nAn/ badz+ra At+ma ko ha// rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa'o// na maHsa man+ta badz+ra nAn/ badz+ra ka pa tsa hUM// rdo rje go cha'o// na maHsa ma na bud+d+hA nAn/ ta thA ga ta tsak+Shur bya ba lo ka ya swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs
140a1: pa stan no/ / nams man ta bud tanan/ babud d+hagan d+ha u0f7f ba k+Shat+tha/ byug sras kyi sngags so// rnams man d+han/ mar+d+has mA gta swA hA/ me tog gi sngags so// nam maman+ta bud d+hanan
140a2: d+ha tA nu ga ta swA hA/ bdug spos kyi sngags so// na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAn/ sarba ta thA ga ta ra tsi s+phar Na a ba b+hA sa ga ga no ta ra b+h+ya swA hA// mar me'i sngags so// na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAn/ ga ga na sa ma sa ma swA hA// mchod yon
140a3: gyi sngags so/ / na maHsa man+ta bu d+ha nAn/ ga ga nanan d+ha s+pha ra Na bi shud d+ha d+harma ni dza ta swAhA/ gtsug tor gyi sngags so// na mangs man+ta bud d+ha nAn/ pra tsaNaDa badz+ra dz+wa lA bi sU ra hU~M/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i go cha'o// na maHsa
140a4: san ta bud d+ha nAn/ dz+wa la mA lin ta thA ga tar tsi swAhA// kun du 'bar ba'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nan/ ma hA ta thA ga ta dza~Mdz+dza s+ya d+ha ma pra tiSh+Thi ta swA hA// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags kyi'o// dkyil 'khor du dgod pa'i sngags kyi
140a5: mdzod do/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phyag na rdo rjes zhus pa bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na// dkyil 'khor bri ba'i tshe na no// bgegs rnams zhi bar 'gyur ba lags// gsang sngags sgrub pa'i tshen
140a6: yang / / log 'dren rnams ni ma mchis 'gyur// gsang sngags rnams kyang ci ltar bsgrub// de yi 'bras bu ci 'drar 'gyur// de skad gsol nas de yi tshe// bcom ldan rnam snang mdzad chen gyis// 'di skad ces ni bka' stsal to// sems dpa'
140a7: chen po legs so legs/ / khyod kyis yongs su dris pa gang // thams cad khyod la bstan par bya// sngon cad ser sna bsten pa'i phyir// bgegs ni rang sems las byung ga/ de yi rgyu ni gzhig pa'i phyir// gang du sems dang sems byung ba'i//
140a8: rtog pa thams cad spong ba dang // rnam par rtog pa las byung ba'i// spros pa thams cad 'gag 'gyur ba'i// byang chub sems shes bshad pa yin// sngags pas byang chub sems dran zhing // mi g.yo ba ni yid la bzlas// de yi phyag rgya
140b1: bdas na / / bgags rnams thams ca 'dag par 'byung / gsang ba ba'i bdag go/ depa rlung ba'i ba nyon mo// ma zhes bya bar bdag brgyud te/ tu zhes bya bar 'di la bzlas// drung gaphyogs su gnas nas ni// sal sra
140b2: thig le dag/ bdun nyid legs par byas nas su// kham por gyis ni dgab par bya// kham por ri rab chen po ru// yang dang yang du bsam par bya// de yi steng du ma zhes pa// gla kor bcas pa rgyas par bas ma// rlung bcing chen por
140b3: swA / / blon gyi la ba rnams kyis da // sems dpa' chen po chu 'i yang // mi gcig bsdus te mnyan par gyis// sngags pas shes bya ba ni// thams cad dmang po stobs can pas pa// 'bar ba'i phreng can mi bzad pa// khro ba lanan
140b4: ral gri thogs/ / sa la sprin gyi gzugs bris nas// ral gri'i phyag rgyas gdab par bya// phyogs kun nas ni langs pa'i sprin// de ma thag tu 'jig par 'gyur// yang na sngags pa mi g.yeng bas// de dag phur bus gang ba bya ste// mkhas pa
140b5: rdo rje gyur nas su/ / thams cad rdo rje daphung bus btab// yang na bgags rnams thams cad ni// zhi bar bya ba yang bshad de// sngags pa dkyil 'khor dbus gnas nas// mig yo stobs chen gsang sngags ni// shin du mi bzad gsang /
140b6: sngags kyi// dkyil 'khor dag la gnas par bsam// de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// rkang pa g.yon pas spyi bor gzir// 'on tang de ni zhir 'gyur ba'am// dogs pa med par 'chi bar 'gyur// de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas su//
140b7: zhe rtse drug dang bsres pa yis// blugs nas sngags pas bskams nas ni// gdon de myur du tshig par 'gyur// de ni me la bskams pa dang // dug gis bskus na nges par ni// tshangs pa 'am 'on te brgya byin yang // de'i mod la myur du
140b8: 'tshig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na// bdag gis 'di ltar 'jal to// bcom ldan 'das/ rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi
141a1: gnas la gnas na lha rnams byin gyis rlob par byed do/ / de nyid du gnas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' las kyang 'gal bar mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar rang gi rigs la gnas pa de ni gsang sngags
141a2: thams cad kyi dam tshig lags so/ / byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis kyang rang gi gnas la gnas nas don thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
141a3: stsal pa/ / gsang ba ba'i bdag po// de de bzhin to ci skad smras pa de bzhin no// gsang ba ba'i bdag po// gzhan yang gang gis kha dog gang gsungs pa// de nyid de'i dkyil 'khor te// lha'i gzugs ni de lta bur// sngon gyi sangs rgyas
141a4: rnams kyis bstan/ / de la gsang ba ba'i bdag po ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can blo zhan pa ma dad pa gang dag bstan pa 'di la dad par mi 'gyur zhing yid gnyis dang som nyi mang ba/ thos pa tsam snying por 'dzin pa// sgrub pa la mi phyogs
141a5: pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni bdag nyid kyang ma rung la// gzhan yang phung bar byed pa yin no// 'di skad du 'di ni phyi rol pa rnams la yod de sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa ni ma yin no zhes smra bar 'gyur gyi// mi blun po de dag
141a6: gis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa/ chos thams cad la mnga' ba rnyes pa/ sems can gyi don rtogs par thugs su chud pa des/ sngon sems can rnams la phan par bzhed nas/ 'di dag thams cad bshad do zhes
141a7: bya bar ni mi shes so/ / chos rnams kyi ni chos kyi mtshan// blun po ngas ni de mi shes// chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid ni// stong pa nyid du yang dag gsungs// sngags pa rtag tu der gnas nas// rab tu nges par las bya'o// bgegs
141a8: zhi bar bya ba rim par bye ba rgyas pa'o/ / de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin de dag dang / kun du bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal nas/ snying rje chen po
141b1: 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i sgo tsa ltar rtogs parang rang gi tshig tu brjod pa'i tshig gis gsang sngags rnams smra bar 'dod nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab po/ / de nas
141b2: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa' di dag dang / rdo rje 'dzin de dag la mi nyams pa'i chos nyid du byin gyis brlabs nas bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi dbyings ci ltar rtogs pa bzhin
141b3: sems can gyi khams rnam par spyod pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams smos shig/ de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
141b4: stobs thogs pa med pa'i gsang sngags smras pa/ nam sa man ta bud d+ha nA// sa man tA nu gti ba ra dza d+harma nir dza ta maN+Da ma hA swA hA/ kun du bzang po'i'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas byams pa chen po ku/
141b5: du 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi snying po smras pa/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nAn/ a rdi tan dza yA sarba sad tA yA sha yA na gtaswat+ma/ byams pa'i'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' nam mchi
141b6: snying po rnam par dag pa'i yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsang sngags smras pa/ na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAn/ A kA sha sa ma tA nu ga ta bi tsid tre ba ra d+ha ra swA hA// nam mkha'i snying po'i 'o// de nas
141b7: byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba snying rje chen po'i snying stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsang sngags smras pa/ na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAn/ A swa tA dz+nyA tI te ad b+hu ga tat+taM
141b8: tA rA rAM swA hA/ / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kun du spyan ras gzigs shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi snying po 'khor
142a1: da cas pazlas pa/ / ram suman A/ s+yAm+b+ha T+Ta / ma m+b+ha/ nas// TIgs dpa // rnams pan/ na// dang sa sa/ na 6/
142a2: sa pan// mu rnan 'gro na ThA ni phASh+Ta/ m-i ma ma ma// mas man hrA / sanag sarnasan n+yArtsA/ ma swAthA/ can can pa ga// rnams man bu nan/ ga zi gsas mthug/
142a3: sa gas napa la// dmas me zung smra na/ ldan pa na ma sa // sa byung chumam mas dpa'am ga nga rnam gnyis pa sumanas bya la
142a4: sa nas sang sngags rnas gnas sam ma9/ nam na ma ga/ nas kyang chub sems dpa'ang ma dpal can nga srung sa sangs rgyas kyi ky-i kyis sa sarnam pa
142a5: ya mas pa 'gas nga panasas da 'di na bdun sa / mau sa cag dgas /
142a6: sa ma rnam ma
142a7: dus / /
142a8: ma ni/ ma ma/ na sa pa yang sa/ rje gyig// rnams pa / ma da /
142b1: brtan thams cad kyi'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa rin po tsha 'byung nas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs nas/ nyid kyi snying po 'khor dang bcas pa dag gsungs pa/ namaHsa pan da bud d+hAn+tan/ sarba/
142b2: kle sha ni shud+d+hA na sar+b+ba d+ha ra ma ba shi ta thA btag gnas mas pa swA hA/ shAkya thub pa'i'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAn/ bar d+he ba ra prA ba te hUM/ mdzod spu'i'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAn/ baM baM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ gtsug tir thams
142b3: cad kyi'o/ / na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAn/ D+hi b+hI ring ring dzI dz+r-i swA hA/ khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i'o// na maHsa mnata bud d+hA nAn/ a pa ri dza ti dz+wa la na ti d+ha Di ta swA hA/ gzhan gyis mi thub mo'i'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAn/
142b4: bri thi g+he se swA hA/ sa'ile/ na maHsa man ta bud d+hAn+dan/ biShA bi sAhA/ khyab 'jug gi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nA na/ rud+hA ya swA hA/ drag po'i'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA rA na/ pA ya be sA hA/ rlung lha'i'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAn
142b5: rasA t+yai swA hA/ dbyangs kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAn/ rAk+Sha sA d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ bden bral gyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAn/ pe ba satwA ya swA hA/ gshen rje'i'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nA na/ mri ta ye swA hA/ 'chi bdag gi'o//
142b6: na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nA na/ kA la rA tri ye sA hA/ dus mtshon gyi'o// na maHsa panata bad+d+hA nAn/ matri b+h+ya swA hA/ ma mo rnams kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud+d+hA nAn/ shakrA ya sA hA/ brgya byin gyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud+d+hA nAn/ a ba pa/
142b7: bta ye swAhA/ chu lha'i'o// na maHsa mnata bud+d+hA nAn/ A dit+yA ta ya sA hA/ nyi ma'i'o// na maHsa man ta bud+d+hA nAn/ pra dza pa ta ye sA hA/ tshangs pa'i'o// na maHsa man ta bud+d+hA nAn/ tsan dA ya swA hA/ zla ba'i'o//
142b8: na maHsa ma na ta bud+d+hA nA na me g+ha sha ni ye swAt+ma/ dga' bo dang bsnyen dga' bo'i'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bstan pa don yod par grub par bzhed nas sangs rgyam dang byang chub
143a1: sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsungs pa/ na maHsam na ta bu dz+nyA nA na/ ga gan ba ra la k+Sha ne ga ga nas ma sarba bo dag ta ti sa ra sam b+ha be dz+wa la na mo a mo g+hA nA na sAH/
143a2: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum nam mkha'i spyan no// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bgegs thams cad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gzi brjid 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
143a3: snyoms par zhugs nas bgegs chen po 'joms pa'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs so/ / na maHsa man ta badz+nyA nA na/ tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra ga ta mA 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i 'o// nam/ sa man ta badz+rA nA na ta ha ha bi
143a4: sma ye sar+b+ba ta thA ga na bi Sha yaM sam b+ha ya ti lo kya bi dza ya hUM dzA sA hA/ khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nA na/ he tu prar+tha ya bi ga te d+ha ra ma ni ra dza ta hUM/ nyan thos rnams kyi'o// na maHsa man ti bud d+hA nA nag
143a5: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi'o/ / namaHsa mnata bud d+hA nAn/ sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sad tA/ hri da yan ni be sha ni na ma sarba bid+ha swA hA/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying po'o// na maHsa mnata bu d+hA nA na/ lo ka le ka rA yA/
143a6: sarba de ba nA ga yak+Sha gan d+ha ra ba a su ra/ ga ru Da gi na na ra/ ma ho ra ga hri da ya na/ n+ya ka ri Sha ya bi tsid tra ga ti swA hA/ lha la sogs pa spyi'i snying po'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAn/ sarba thA bI ma ti bi ki ra Na/ d+har+m+ma d+hA tu ni ra dzA ta sang sang ha swA hA/ byang chub sems/
143a7: dpa' thams cad kyi'o// rnams man ta budad+hA nAn/ dud d+hA nA ma hA pa ra Na khA Da ya sa dz+nyAn ta bA ga ta a dz+nyA ku ru sAH/ sgo srungs gdul dka' ba zhes bya ba'i'o// namaHsa men ta bud d+hA nAn/ he ma hA pra tsa Ni ri i b+hi mu la gri pA khA da ya g+ni tsi rA ya si sa ma
143a8: ya ma nu sma ra sA hA/ sgo srungs mngon du phyogs pa'i'o// namaHsa man ta bud d+hA nA na/ sarbarba e nu ga te/ b+han d+ha sI mA na ma hA sa ma ya nir dzA te s+pha ra Ne a pra ti ta te d+ha ka d+ha ka tsar tsa ra/ b+hanaHb+han+d+ha/ da shidi sha na sarba
143b1: ta thA ga ta/ a nu te pra bar d+harma ba la d+ha bi dza ye b+ha ga ba te/ bi ku ri pi ku le le lu bu pri swA hA// 'tshams chen mo gcod pa'i'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nA na/ a byang chub kyi'o// A spyod pa'i'o// oM rdzogs par sangs rgyas
143b2: ba'i 'o/ / a mya ngan las 'das pa'i'o// na maHsa man ta badz+ra nAn hA/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i'o// namaHsa man ta badz+rA nAn ta/ 'phags pa mi g.yo mgon gyi'o// namaHsa man ta bud d+hA nAn a/ sgrib pa thams
143b3: cad rnam par sel ba'i'o/ / na maHsa man ta bud d+hAn nas/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nA na ga/ phyag na rdo rje'i'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nA na ma/ 'jam dpal gyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nA na ga nam mkha'i
143b4: spyan gyi'o/ / na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nA na ri/ chos kyi dbyings kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nA na khI/ dpa' bo chen po'i'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nA na dzaM/ chu'i dbang po'i 'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nA na taM/ lha mo sgrol mo'i'o// na maHsa man
143b5: ta bud d+hA nAn hi/ khro gnyer can ma'i'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nA na baM/ gos dkar can gyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nA na saM/ mthu chen thob gyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nA na haM/ rta mgrin gyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nA na yaM/ grags/
143b6: 'dzin pa'i'o// las man da bung d+hA nAn sa/ phyag na rin chen gyi'o// nam sa man+ta bud d+hA nAn d+de/ Na ba'i 'od gyi'o// namaHsa man ta bud d+hA nA naH/ shAkya thub pa'i'o// namaHsa min da bud d+hA nAn dz+nyAn+ya r+yagatsug tor gsum gyi'o// na ma sa mam/
143b7: ta bud d+hA nAn la/ gdugs dkar po'i'o// da maHsa man ta bud d+hA nA na shaM/ gtsug tor rgyal ba'i'o// na maHsa man bud d+hA nA na saM/ gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i'o// na maHsa man da bud d+hA nAn gr-i/ gzi brjid phung po'i'o// mas mnang bud d+hA rAr/
143b8: rA/ rnam par 'thong ba'i'o// maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAn sra/ gzhan gyis me thub pa'i'o// namaHsa man+ta bud d+hA rAn pa'i sa'i'o// namaHsa man ta bud d+hA nAn ki li/ A can ma'i'o// namaHsa man ta bung d+hAnA na daM le/ nye sgra can ma'i'o// namaHsa man ta buMrA
144a1: dAn mi li/ sna tshogs mi'i'o// namaHsa man ta bud d+hA nAn ti li/ nor ldan ma'i'o// namaHsa man bud d+hA nAn ta sa nAn/ ngo mtshar can gyi'o// namaHsa mnata bud d+hA nAn ras nAn/ sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs paspyan
144a2: sbyin pa'i'o/ / na maHsa man bud d+hA nAn daR+sha nAn/ ngan song thams cad spyod pa'i'o// namaHsa man ta bud d+hA nAn/ bi ha sa nAn/ yongs su skyong sems blo gros kyi'o// na maHsa men da bud d+hA nA na rbi/ byams pa chen po mngon par 'byung ba'i'o//
144a3: namaHsa mnata bud d+hA nAn yaM/ snying rje gdungs pa'i'o// namaHsa man bud d+hA nAn i/ gdung ba thams cad ni bar byed pa'i'o// namangs man ta bud d+hAnAn aM/ khasam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros can gyi'o// namaHsa man bud d+hA nAn/ rin chen
144a4: 'byung gnas kyi'o/ / ma sa mnata bud d+hA nAn/ phyag na rin chen gyi'i'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hAnAn gaM sa 'dzin gyi'o// na maHsa man ta budad+hA nAn a/ gzungs thob pa'i'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAnaT+Te/ phyag na rin chen phyag rgya'i'o// na maHsa
144a5: man ta bud d+hA nA na naM/ bsam brtan pa'i'o// na maHsa man ta budad+hAnAnar+tha/ rnam mkha' dri med kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAn rI/ nam mkha' blo gros kyi'o// namaHsa man ta bud d+hA nA na ga taM/ blo zos rnam par dag pa'i'o// namangs man ta bud
144a6: d+hAnAr n+ti/ spyod pa'i dro bros kyi'o// namaHsa man da bun+d+ha nAn b+h+yAM/ brtan pa'i blo gros kyi'o// maHsa man ta bud+d+hA nAn rdzing sring ted dgra/ phyag brnyan rnams kyi'o// nam sa mnang bud+d+hAnAn/ kA ter yaka/ byang chub sems dpa' cis dgasungs pa rnams
144a7: kyai'o/ / na maHsa man ta bud+d+ha rAr ma no ma yAMd+har ma sa ma b+ha bi bi ba be ka tha ne sa das ne/ gnas gtsa mi pa rnams kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud+hA nAn/ ba ke ri/ srin po rnams kyi'o// namaHsa man ta bud+d+hA nAn d+hI ta/ mkha' 'gro sa rnams kyisa?/
144a8: nam sa mnata bu d+hAnAn pa k+Sha be d+ya d+ha de/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi'o// nams mnan bud+d+hA nAn/ mi tsi mi che/ sha rnams kyi'o// nam sa man ban+dan+dan/ gu dgud mi e/ 'byung po rnams kyi'o// nams man bun+dan+dan/ u0f7f
144b1: raTaM/ praT praT/ lha ma yin rnams kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bu d+ha nAn/ gar lan/ bir lan/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bu d+ha nAn/ ha sa nan bI a sa nAn/ mi 'am ci rnams kyi'o// na maHsa man ta puH
144b2: nAn/ i tsa lA ra na ma ne me/ mi rnams kyi'o// gsang ba ba'i bdag po/ ngas de la sogs pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags bshad de/ de la gsang sngags thams cad kyi// snying po des pas mnyan par gyis// a zhes bya bas
144b3: sngags kun gyi/ / snying po yin par yang dag bshad// de la gsang sngags kun gnas te/ de ltar sngags rnams rnam par des// rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa
144b4: las/ / spyi'i gsang sngags kyi mdzod rim par phye ba rgyas pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po// gsang sngags ci ltar sgrub pa dang / bsgrubs pa'i 'bras
144b5: bu gang yin pa 'di nyon cig/ yi ge dang ni yi ger sbyar// de bzhin gzhi las gzhir gyur pa// shin du bsdams pas yid la ni// bzlas brjod 'bum phrag gcig bya'o// yi ge byang chub sems yin te// gnyis pa sgra zhes bya ba yin// gzhin
144b6: rang gi lha bzhag pa/ / rang gi lus kyi gnas la bya// gzhi gnyis pa ni rdzogs sangs rgyas// rkang gnyis mchog tu shes par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa// sngags pas de la gnas par bsam// yi ge rnams ni go rims bzhin// de yi dbus
144b7: su legs par dgod/ / slar sdud pa'i tshig gis non// srog dang rtsol ba rnam par sbyangs// srog ces bya ba rlung du bshad// rtsol ba dran pa zhes bya ste// de gnyis bsdams pa byas nas su// sngon du bsnyen pa legs par bya// de nas sngags
144b8: pas zla gcig tu/ shin du bsdams te bzlas brjod bya// gsang sngags sngon du spyad pa ni// gzhi gcig nas ni gcig tu 'jug/ grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sngar spyad pa zhes bshad pa yin// de phyin cang ni gang cung zad
145a1: me tog spos la sogs dbul zhing / / sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bya'i phyir// de tshe byang chub tu yang bsngo// sngags pas 'jigs med de lta bu// zla gnyis pa la bzlas brjod pa// de nas zla ba nya ba'i tshe// mi de srub la 'jug par bya/
145a2: rini dang ni ba lang lhas// de bzhin 'bab chu'i mdo dag dang // lam gyi bzhi ma mtshan gcig dang // mamo'i gnasas ma ni gnas su// dkyil 'khor nan tan zi byab// thams cad rdo rje'i khang bar byas// des ni derang gnas bsrungs byas nas// nub pa
145a3: la ni nan tan bya/ / der ni mtshan mon ma phyed ngam// yang na nyim 'chang ba'i tshe// 'di lta'i lhas rnams 'brung 'gyur te// blo dang ldan pas de shes bya// hUM zhes pa dang rnga sgra dang // de bzhin sa ni g.yo ba dang // yid du 'ong ba'i tshig kyang rung // don nam
145a4: mkha' las grag na/ / mtshan ma dag ni de rnams kyis// yid bzhin rjes grub shes bya ste// sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog rnams kyis// de yi 'bras bur yang dag bshad// de ltar sngags kyi tshul gnas pa// de ni nges par sangs rgyas 'gru//
145a5: de bas rnam pa thams cad du// sngags nyid rtag tu na par bya// sngon gyi sangs rgyas mthuchen gyis// don dran par byab nga bshad// rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul babyin gyis rdob pa las/
145a6: rten pa'i dngos grub bslab pa rim par phye ba'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa la gzigs nas// re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa// dus gsum mtha'
145a7: yas pa'i sgo nges pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i chos kyi tshig rnams gsungs so/ / // mkha' ltar dri med ngo bo nyid med pa// rnam mang ye shes sna tshogs sbyin par byed// ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu stong pa nyid// rkyen la pa/
145a8: las zab cing blta bar dka'// khyad par 'gro ba rnams la rtag pa ru// rnam par bsams pa'i 'bras bu mchog sbyin byed// ci ltar nam mkha' chags med spyod yul can// 'gro ba kun gyi gnas su gyur ba ltar// de bzhin rnam par
145b1: dag pa'i chos nyid 'di/ / srid gsum ma lus 'byor ba 'byung bar byed// mchog skyes mkhas pa gang shig 'dir pyod na// rdul ba kun dang spyod yul cig par 'gyur// rgyal bas ci skangad gsungs pa'i chos nyid ni// shin du rnam
145b2: dag thams cad snang byed pa/ / de las go 'phang rnyed dka' gzhan med do// yangs pa'i chos ni zab la 'grib med cing // mnyam med 'jig rten phan byed de la ni// rnam rtog rnam par spangs te sprad par gyis// de nas bcom ldan 'das
145b3: rnam par snang mdzad chen pos tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs nas/ / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor tshogs pa la gzigs nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams la bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu dag gang gis na sems
145b4: can rnams mthong ba'i chos kho na la dga' ba dang mgu ba thob nas bde ba la reg par 'gyur ba rang rang gi chos kyi dbyings kyi mthu brlabs su gyur pa/ / dngos grub bsgrub pa'i tshig rnams ston cig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin
145b5: rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal nas/ chos kyi rjes bka' ci skad stsal pa bzhin 'tshal lo zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nyid la gsol ba btab pa/ bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du dngos grub
145b6: bsgrub pa'i tshig rnams bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bstan du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang bdag cag rang gi rtogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bshad pa de ni rab tu bka' lags so// de lta lags pas ma 'ongs pa'i
145b7: 'gro ba rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis legs par rab tu bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis rdo rje 'dzin de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka'
145b8: sbal to/ / rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so// de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la phan yon che ba'i chos gcig yod pa ni 'di lta ste ngo tsha shes pa'o// ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo ni mthong
146a1: pa'i chos nyid la chos gnyis rab tu myung bar 'byung ste gnyis gang zhe na/ ma bya ba'i las mi byed pa dang dam pa rnams kyis bsngags pa'o// yang gnyis te khong dum chud pa jo su ga nga tus su chub sems dpa' rnams
146a2: radang lhan cig 'grogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba'o/ / yang gnyis te tshul khrims la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ba dang lha dang mi rnams su skye ba 'thob par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na legs par rab tu yid la zung shig dang 'di lta ste sgrub par sbyor gyi
146a3: tshig gang rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams/ gsang sngags rnams las myur du gsang sngags kyi dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ba// gsang sngags sgrub pa 'grub par sbyor
146a4: ba'i tshig rnams bshad do/ / de la dang por re shig dkyil 'khor mthong ba/ bla mas gsang sngags bsgrub par gnang ba/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ dad pa can ser sna med pa/ snying rje can dul brten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam par dbye ba la
146a5: mkhas pa/ / sdom pa bzung ba/ rang gi bslab pa la gnas pa// thabs la mkhas shing rab tu brtan// dus dang dus ma yin pa'ang shes// 'jigs pa med cing mkha' la gtong // bzod dang ldan zhing byams pa'i yid// gsang sngags spyod la rab tu
146a6: brtson/ / gsang sngags de nyid don la mkhas// bsam gtan byed la dga' ba yin// sgrub pa po ni sgrub la shis// gsang ba ba'i bdag po// de la 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug myos par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags yod de/ des 'dod par
146a7: spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad myos pas brgyal bar byed cing / me tog mang po sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sa phyogs nyams dga' ba rnams kyang ston la/ yongs su spyad pa dang nye bar spyad pa rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs kyang mngon par sprul nas/
146a8: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang sbyin la/ bdag nyid kyang yongs su spyod do// 'di lta ste lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la yid mgyogs zhes bya ba'i rig sngags yod de// des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sema?
146b1: can gyi dgos pa byed cing / nye bar spyad pa dang yongs su spyad pa thams cad kyang mngon par sprul nas/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la yang sbyin la bdag nyid kyang kun du spyod do// 'di lta ste mig 'phrul mkhan ni gsang sngags rnas
146b2: kyis kun dga'i ra ba dang / mcho dang 'bab chung dang mi la sogs pa rnam pa tha dad pas tshogs ston to// 'di ga ste dper na/ lha ma yin nams ni gsang sngags kyi skum rnams ston to// di lta ste dper na/ gsang sngags dag gis ni drug
146b3: dang rims la sogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ / 'di lta ste mamo zhes bya ba'i lha mo rnams ni gsang sngags kyis sems can rnams land 'go ba gtong ngo // 'di lta ste dper na/ gsang sngags kyis ni me'i tshab med par byas nas grang bar byed
146b4: par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu dag dpe'i tshig 'di rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi mthul mngon par dad par bya'o// gsang sngags kyi mthu de yang gang zhe na/ gsang sngags rnams las byung ba yang ma yin/ rjes las 'jug pa yang ma yin/
146b5: sbyor ba po las dmigs pa yang ma yin mod kyi rigs kyi bu dag/ 'on kyang gsang sngags kyi byin brlabs kyi chos nyid 'byung ba las 'da' bar yang mi 'gyur te/ dus gsum las 'das pa'i phyir dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba
146b6: thob mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa las mngon par grub pa'i phyir ro/ / rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngo bo nyid rtogs par khong du chud pas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gsang sngags kyi tshul gyis rjes su
146b7: 'jug par bya'o/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dus gsum du chags pa med pa'i stobs kyi gzhi byin gyis rlob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa'i snying po can zhes bya ba'i ting
146b8: de 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa ci snyed yod pa rnam par rig par byed pa'i sgra rnams las chos kyi dbyings kyi stobs/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
147a1: ba'i stobs/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mos pa las byung ba/ gnas skabs bzhi dbyings gcig las byung bas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad khyab par byas te nam mkha' dang mnyam par gyur nas byung ba/
147a2: namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA a/ oM ya// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi snying po de dag byung ma thag tu/ de nas yang chos kyi dbyings thams cad nges par sgrogs pa'i sgo dag nas/ yang dag par rdzogs
147a3: sangs rgyas kyi snying po'i tshig gis/ / mtshan rnam par rig pa'i dbyings kyi sgra cig nas gcig tu mngon par grag go/ byang chub sems dpas de thos nas// ngo mtshar gyur pa'i mig phye ste// kun mkhyen bsnyun dang bral ba la// tshig snyan
147a4: 'di skad ces gsol to/ / e ma'o gsang sngags spyad pa las// sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog rnams kyis// gang gis 'di kun khyab pa yi// ye shes yangs pa chen po byung // de bas rnam pa thams cad du// sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i
147a5: snying po la/ / nang gi bdag nyid rnam dag pas// rtag tu mngon par brtson par bya// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi snying po rnams sgrub pa byung ste/ bskyed mos tshal lam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ phug gam/ yid gang du
147a6: dben pa der byang chub kyi sems bsgom zhing / nam mtshan ma ma byung gi bar du 'dug par bya'o// de nas snying po de dag las gang yang rung ba gcig bzung ste/ the tsom med par gyur gyi bar du gzhi bsgrub par bya'o// de nas snying po snying kar
147a7: bzhag nas yid bsgrub par bya ste/ shin du rnam par dag pa/ dri ma med pa/ brtan pa rab tu mi g.yo ba/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ me long lta bu/ rab tu phra ba la mngon par blta zhing rtag tu goms pa'i sbyor bas rang gi lus rang gi lha'i lus/
147a8: su mthong gi bar du bya'o// gzhi gnyis pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me long gi dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi nang na pad ma'i rgyal po chen po la bzhugs pa phug na bzhugs pa lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa// thor tshugs
147b1: dang / dbu rgyan dang 'od zeng mtha' yas pas bskor ba/ rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba/ nam mkha' bzhin gzod ma nas zhi ba ste// de la sgra gnas par bsam zhing // mnyam par bzhag pas bzlas brjod bya// de nas
147b2: sngon du bsnyen pa ni/ / 'bum phrag gcig tu bya bar bshad// de nas zla ba gnyis pa la// me tog dri la sogs pa dbul// sems can rnams la rnam mang po'i// phan pa nye bar sgrub byed cing // rnyed dang ma rnyed rnams spangs te// zla ba gzhan la
147b3: bzlas brjod bya/ / de la de ru sbyor ba 'di// mnyam par bzhag pas bsam par bya// bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis ni// sems can thams cad bde gyur cig/ thams cad nad kyang med par shog/ yang na de bzhin gshegs bsngags
147b4: pa'i/ / 'dod pa phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ yang na sems can thams cad kyang // re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// sgrib pa med pa'i tshul gyis su// ma thogs par ni grub par shog/ dud 'gro gcig la gcig za ba'i// sdug bsngal
147b5: nam yang 'byung ma gyur/ / yi dgas rnams la zas skom sogs// thogs pa med par 'byung bar shog/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gang // mi bzad rnam pa sna tshogs pa// bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis ni// de dag myur du zhi bar
147b6: gyur/ / sems can sdug bsngal thams cad la// snying rje chen po bskyed nas ni// bsgrub pa de dang gzhan dag kyang // des ni yang dang yang du bsam// ci ltar bsams pa 'grub bya'i phyir// byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas gsum gyis// de dag thams
147b7: cad byin parla cing / / yid la sngags kyang bzlas brjod bya// bdag gi bsod nams stobs dang ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin stobs dang // chos kyi dbyings kyi stobs kyis su// sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pas// don nas
147b8: gang dag bsams pa kun/ / sems can khams ni ma lus 'dir// de dag thams cad ci rigs par// thogs pa med par 'byung 'gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rig sngags kyi rgyal mo stobs nam mkha' dang
148a1: ba nam mkha'i mdzod 'byung ba gsungs so/ / na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo ba shwa mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tad khaM yud ga te s+pha raN hi maM ga ga na khaM swA hA/ 'di lan gsum bzlas na ci ltar bsams pa'i don thams cad
148a2: thogs pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas zla ba nya ba'i tshe// mi de bsgrub la 'jug par bya// ri rtso dang ni ba lang lhas// chu mdo'am yang na du khrod dam// lam gyi bzhi mdo'am shing gcig drung // ma mo'i gnas sam zhi gnas su//
148a3: bgegs rnams thams cad myos 'gyur ba'i// dkyil 'khor des pas mnyan par gyis// kun du gru bzhi lham pa ste// sgo gcig pa la mu ran can// thams cad kha dog ser po yis// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mchog bris nas// rdo rje sbrel ba'i
148a4: tshul gyis su/ / rdo rje phan tshun 'brel bar bya// sgor ni sgo bsrungs gnyis bri ba// gdul dka' dang ni mngon phyogs gnyis// mig dmar khro dang bcas pa la// khros shing bsdigs par byed par bri// mdung rtse gsum bgrwa rnams su// nan tan
148a5: duni bri bar bya/ / dbus su rdo rje'i gdan yid 'ong// ba ni kun du blta ba bri// do'i steng bad ma chen po ni// 'dab ma brgyad pa zhe sar bcas// rgyal ba kun la phyag byas nas// smon lamanye bar sgrub byed cing // phyag na rdo rje thocan gyi// rdo rje'i phyas
148a6: rgyabacings nas su/ / der ni bsrung byas der 'dug ste// sbyangs pa'i rdzas ni blangs nas su// nang gi bdag nyid rnam dag pas// mtshan gcig thal byung bzlas brjod bya// der ni nam gyi phyed dus sam// yang na nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe// rdzas de
148a7: yongs su 'gyur ba ni/ / 'bar phreng can gyi gzi brjid bzhin// sngags pa rang gis de blangs na// nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur// bskal par gnas shing gzi brjid che// rgyal sras de ni 'dod na 'chi// 'jig rten khams ni gzhan du'ang
148a8: 'gro/ / gtso bo sna tshogs gzugs 'chang ba// rdzas las byung ba'i sngags bsgrubs pas// dpal ldan mchod pa rab tu byed// 'di ni nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i// rdzas kyi dngos grub yin par bshad// gsang ba ba'i bdag po// de la brtag pa
148b1: 'di rgyu mtshan du mdza nas/ / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thabs kyi pha rol du byon pa rtags par thugs su chud pa rnams kyi brtag pa
148b2: nyid rang bzhin gyis stong par mkhyen kyang thabs kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i stobs kyis 'dus ma byas pa gdags par btags te/ yongs su bsgyur ba'i tshul du mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mthu/
148b3: rlabs pa tshe sems can rnams la nges par ston te/ des de rnams yid rab tu dga' zhing tshe ring po yang rab tu thob nas/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag gis rtse dga' yongs su spyong ba// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la marjod
148b4: cing 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i lam 'di grub par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas/ gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul gyi cho ga thugs dgyes bzhin
148b5: du 'chad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang bskal pa du mar rtsol zhing 'bad de bya dka' ba rnams brtsams kyang 'thob par mi 'gyur ba de byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi tshe'i
148b6: cig kho na la 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / gsang ba ba'i bdag po/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal mtshan nom ral gri'am/ gdugs
148b7: sam/ / mchil lham 'am/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'am/ lig bu mig gam/ 'gi'u wang blangs te/ bzlas brjod sum 'byam byed par de ltar bsgrubs na de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// gzhan yang rigs kyi
148b8: bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs dang ldan pas yid la 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams sgrubs na/ de dag rang gi sems kyi dbang tsam kho nas yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gang dag rgyu las 'bras bu mngon par
149a1: 'dod pa'i mi blun po de dag ni/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po// gsang sngags rnams kyi gsang sngags mtshan nyid rab tu mi shes pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyu ni byed par ma gsungs te// 'bras bu 'ang de la yod ma yin/
149a2: rgyu ni rgyu yis stong pa na// de ni ci ltar rgyur yang 'gyur// de bas gsang sngags 'bras bu ni// rgyu dang las bras shes par bya// gang tshe mtshan ma med pa yi// ting 'dzin ci lta bzhin reg pa// de tshe sngags pas dngos grub ni// yid las yang
149a3: dag zung ba 'thob/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzhi rnams dngos grub tu bsgrub pa'i tshig gang gis rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi/
149a4: bu mo rnams mthong ba'i chos nyid la rab tu dga' zhing bde ba la reg par gnas la/ chos kyi dbyings las kyang 'gal bar mi 'gyur ba de yang bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings ni bsam gyis mi
149a5: khyab pa'i dbyings lags te/ de yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan to// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub
149a6: sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas ni chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa rtogs par khong du chud par bgyi 'tshal lo/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po legs so//
149a7: legs so// gsang ba ba'i bdag po/ gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su dri bar sems pa de ni yang legs so// de'i phyir nyon la lags par rab tu yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das
149a8: legs so zhes gsol nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba ba'i bdag po/ de la a zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa 'thung ste/ gtsug
149b1: lag khang ngam mug gam/ gnas gang yang rung ste yan lag thams cad lashes byu ba bzhag la bzlas brjod su 'brus bya'o// de nas zla banyapa tsho ci 'byor bas mchod pa byas la ci srod du byang chub sems dang kun du 'thang
149b2: 'am/ 'jam dpal la sa/ rdo rje 'dzin chen po gang yang rung bci 'ongs te/ mgol thug ga ma legs so zhes zer gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'i// de nas phyag byas te mchod lan phul na byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i ting nge 'dzin
149b3: thob par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du sems yang ba dang lus yang bgoms par bya zhing bzlas brjod byas na de'i lus rnam par dag pa dang sems rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// a zhes bya ba bar ba nag ste bzlas brjod byas na na pa nam/
149b4: par dag par 'gyur ro// 'on te srog gzung bar 'dod na a zhes bya ba srog dang lhan cig tu byas la dus gsum du bsam pa byas na yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro// de nyid kyi steng du glang kor gzhag na gnas pa dang 'gro ba'i dug thams/
149b5: cad 'byin to// de nas gzi can dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ a zhes byas pa bdag tu byas// ba las de bzhin mi dbang ngo // gcig pa pad ma bzhag par bya// gzhan la yang ni dung bzhag ste// gcig pa gcig ni gdong bltas na// de yi mod la dbang
149b6: du 'gyur/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa la gzigs nas gsang ba ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs
149b7: las byung ba zhes bya ba/ las bya bas rnam par rol pa spyod pa'i rol mo rim par phye ba rgyas pa khams bzhi yang dag par bsdu ba bsdus pa/ sems kyi rgyal po la gnas pa/ nam mkha' ltar kun du khyab pa mthong ba dang / ma mthong ba'i
149b8: 'bras bu mang ba/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mngon sum pa/ gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ las sna
150a1: tshogs dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la pan 'dogs pa yod kyis/ de nyon la legs pa rab tu yid la zung shig dang / ras khyod la bshad do// lag na rdo rjed la spyod pa das molas dang bya ba sa ngan par 'ang
150a2: pa'i 'bras bu bal che ba/ lus can kun gyi mngon sum pa gang she na/ chog shes pas thog mang ni/ bdag gi de nyid rim bzhin bya// sngags pa snga ma bzhin 'dug la// de bzhin gshegs padran byas te// bdag nyid a zhes bya ba ni/
150a3: klad kor bcas dang rgyas byas pa/ thams cad shin du ser zhing bzang / gru bzhi rdo rjes mtshan byas te/ sngags pas der gnas rdzogs pa yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso bo bsam// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// bdag gi
150a4: de nyid yin par gsungs/ / nam zhig sngags pas bdag gi ni// de nyid dogs pa med gyur pa// de tshe 'jig rten thams cad la// phan pa byed pa nyid du 'gyur// ngo mtshar sna tshogs dag dang ldan// mig 'phrul can gyi gnas la 'dug/
150a5: sngags pa nam zhig mnyam bzhag na// srid pa rab tu dog pa na// thog med dus nas mi shes pas// bsags pa'i las de kun zad 'gyur// bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// sems de nam zhig sgom byed pa// de tshe'ang sngags
150a6: pa rnal 'byor pa/ / chu yi pad ma lta bur ni// dge dang mi dge 'bras 'byung ba'i// las kyi rtog pas mi gos na// 'di bdag nyid ni rgyal mchog tu// bsgyur na smos kyang ci zhig dgos// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
150a7: mdzad bdud bzhi las rgyal ba rdo rje rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ / rdo rje'i yi ge'i tshig bdud bzhi las rgyal bar byed pa// rgyu drug las rnam par grol bar byed pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i
150a8: ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di rnams gsungs so/ / na maHsa man ta bu d+ha nAn/ a bi ra hUM khaM/ de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'dzin de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po
150b1: la sogs pa de dag dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gur nas mig mi 'dzums par thams cad mkhyen pa la spyibos phyag 'tshal te tshig 'di skad ces brjod do/ / byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams
150b2: dang / sangs rgyas kun gyi nor gyi dbyig/ 'dis ni gang dag sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams dang // rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos pa// mkhas pas de dag 'jig rten 'dir// sangs rgyas ye shes bla med pa// dpe med
150b3: ye shes thob nas su/ / rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs rnam 'phrul bas// sa steng kun tu rnam par spyod// de bas 'di dag so so yi// cho ga rgyas pa dag dang las// sna tshogs dgod pa thams cad kyang // bstan pa 'di la bshad du gsol// des ni
150b4: gsang sngags spyod pa yi/ / theg chen blan med pa la// sems can rnams ni dga' bzhin du// mthong ba'i chos la gnas par 'gyur// de skad gsol nas bcom ldan gyis// 'jam pa'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa// khyed rnams 'thun par
150b5: rtsegacig tu/ / mnyam par zhog la 'di nyon cig/ de'i tshe sa gzhi rdo rje chen por byin gyis brlabs te/ nyid kyi sku las byang chub kyi snying po nye bar bstan par bzhed nas gsungs pa/ a ni mchog tu shes bya ba// dbang chen dkyil 'khor ldan pa
150b6: phyi rol dang ni nang du yang / / rdo rje dkyil 'khor shes par bya// deng 'dug nas ni thams cad pas ma// rnal 'byor gnas shes bshad pa yin// a ni srog gi dam pa ste// 'gugs par byed pa'i mchog tu bgang // nam zhig kla kor gyis
150b7: mnan na/ / lus can kun gyis sel bar 'gyur// sngags pa rnam zhig zla gcig tu// rdo rje can gyis rgyabacings nas// dus gsum bzlas brjod byas na ni// mi shes grong khyer 'joms par 'gyur// lha dang lha min rnams kyis kyang // mi
